program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 21.06.2006 no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : juan riquelme , right , and kew jaliens go for the ball two-time world cup winners argentina reached a goalless draw with the netherlands to finish top of group c in a tight , furiously-paced game in frankfurt on wednesday . the dutch team , who like the argentines posted two victories over group rivals serbia and montenegro and ivory coast , finished in second place on goal difference and will play group d winners portugal in nuremberg on sunday .
the argentines will meet mexico in leipzig in the second round on saturday . argentina had a raft of chances throughout the match , and dutch coach marco van basten had two fine first-half clearances by defender khalid boulahrouz and one outstanding save late in the game by edwin van der sar to thank for a clean sheet . messi , tevez create havoc argentine strikers lionel messi and carlos tevez , along with midfield duo maxi rodriguez and juan riquelme , caused havoc in the dutch defense early on with their tight combinations of fast , accurate passing and blistering counter-attacking speed . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : netherlands ' khalid boulahrouz , left , and argentina 's lionel messi challenge for the ball teenage sensation messi made his mark in the eighth minute , playing a dangerous through ball into the area , which boulahrouz just managed to get his foot to ahead of the onrushing esteban cambiasso and nicolas burdisso . man-of-the-match tevez had a chance just after the quarter-hour , turning inside phillip cocu and unleashing a powerful left-footed shot just past the outside post of captain van der sar , who was winning his 112th cap to draw level on all-time appearances for the oranje with frank de boer . the netherlands ' best chance came a minute later , but dirk kuyt drilled a shot just wide . van der sar was then called into action in the 27th minute to punch away a swerving riquelme corner . from the ensuing corner kuyt brought down tevez on the edge of the box and the dutch fans had the imposing 1.91m frame of boulahrouz to thank again as he lunged to fend off the free-kick from tevez 's feet onto the post and away .
rodriguez then watched in agony as his blistering half-volley beat van der sar but drifted late and shaved off the post . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : flying van der sar saved the day for the dutch on the stroke of half-time , van der sar saved a messi shot after the barcelona striker was allowed far too much time in front of goal . the second-half started with riquleme taking advantage of the dutch defense standing off to fire a shot that narrowly missed goal , and rodriguez following up shortly after with a shot that flew high . van der sar saves the day but the dutch did manage to clamp down on the argentineans , wesley sneijder and cocu - winning his 100th cap - dropping into deeper positions to nullify the threat of the free-running tevez . but the netherlands were obviously lacking the creative spark provided by the rested arjen robben , giovanni van bronkhorst and mark van bommel . that said , the dutch pressure almost paid off in the 67th minute , cocu going close after good work by rafael van der vart .
with messi and riquelme both replaced by coach jose pekerman , the game fizzled out somewhat and swung towards the dutch . but it was fittingly left to the record-equaling van der sar to save the day for the dutch , defying his 35 years to superbly palm away a great strike by tevez in the 73rd minute . the oranje army again invaded frankfurt for the match with airlines in the netherlands laying on 32 flights to the german city on wednesday . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : oranje fans were out in full force officially only 6,200 fans came with a ticket but it was estimated that 25,000 fans would be in the 48,000-seater stadium and up to 40,000 more in the city . there was also a sizeable number of argentine supporters , many sporting the no. 10 shirt favored by diego maradona , with flags and scarves tied to their wrists .
maradona himself was seen in the stands along with his daughter , passionately cheering on the argentine side . the elephants claw back the other " group of death " game saw a spirited ivory coast coming from behind to beat serbia & montenegro 3-2 .
the elephants fought back from two goals down to clinch their first world cup win in an entertaining and fiercely-fought battle on wednesday in munich , played in pouring rain , to avoid ending bottom of group c. despite being eliminated from the world cup , both heavily-changed teams went at it hammer and tongs from the start before a capacity 66,000 crowd in a bid to restore their pride .
although ivory coast had the best of the play in the first ten minutes , their trio of newcomers at the back were caught out by long high balls from serbia and montenegro 's . serbia , seeking self-respect after a 6-0 drubbing by argentina , took the lead in the 10th minute with striker nikola zigic slotting in the ball after a long pass by dejan stankovic .
they built up on the result in the 19th minute after a botched clearance by ivory coast stand-in captain cyrille domoraud was seized by sasa ilic . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ivory coast players celebrate after their third goal the ivorians however made up in the 36th minute with arune dindane neatly netting a twice-taken penalty .
the strengthened ivorians dominated in the second half and dindane once again showed his class by heading in a kader keita cross in the 67th minute . the ivorians were n't finished as yet when kalou stepped up to score and seal a historic victory for ivory coast . dw staff / afp -lrb- sp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de argentina beat up serbia and montenegro argentina proved why some consider them a world cup title contender , displaying their speed and precision passing in a 6-0 rout of their group c opponents .
-lrb- june 20 , 2006 -rrb- dutch victory breaks hearts in ivory coast with everything at stake in the " group of death , " the ivory coast gave the holland a run for their money throughout a pulsating match that saw seven yellow cards before ending 2-1 in the netherlands ' favor .

no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 09.11.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 21.06.2006 no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : juan riquelme , right , and kew jaliens go for the ball two-time world cup winners argentina reached a goalless draw with the netherlands to finish top of group c in a tight , furiously-paced game in frankfurt on wednesday . the dutch team , who like the argentines posted two victories over group rivals serbia and montenegro and ivory coast , finished in second place on goal difference and will play group d winners portugal in nuremberg on sunday .
the argentines will meet mexico in leipzig in the second round on saturday . argentina had a raft of chances throughout the match , and dutch coach marco van basten had two fine first-half clearances by defender khalid boulahrouz and one outstanding save late in the game by edwin van der sar to thank for a clean sheet . messi , tevez create havoc argentine strikers lionel messi and carlos tevez , along with midfield duo maxi rodriguez and juan riquelme , caused havoc in the dutch defense early on with their tight combinations of fast , accurate passing and blistering counter-attacking speed . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : netherlands ' khalid boulahrouz , left , and argentina 's lionel messi challenge for the ball teenage sensation messi made his mark in the eighth minute , playing a dangerous through ball into the area , which boulahrouz just managed to get his foot to ahead of the onrushing esteban cambiasso and nicolas burdisso . man-of-the-match tevez had a chance just after the quarter-hour , turning inside phillip cocu and unleashing a powerful left-footed shot just past the outside post of captain van der sar , who was winning his 112th cap to draw level on all-time appearances for the oranje with frank de boer . the netherlands ' best chance came a minute later , but dirk kuyt drilled a shot just wide . van der sar was then called into action in the 27th minute to punch away a swerving riquelme corner . from the ensuing corner kuyt brought down tevez on the edge of the box and the dutch fans had the imposing 1.91m frame of boulahrouz to thank again as he lunged to fend off the free-kick from tevez 's feet onto the post and away .
rodriguez then watched in agony as his blistering half-volley beat van der sar but drifted late and shaved off the post . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : flying van der sar saved the day for the dutch on the stroke of half-time , van der sar saved a messi shot after the barcelona striker was allowed far too much time in front of goal . the second-half started with riquleme taking advantage of the dutch defense standing off to fire a shot that narrowly missed goal , and rodriguez following up shortly after with a shot that flew high . van der sar saves the day but the dutch did manage to clamp down on the argentineans , wesley sneijder and cocu - winning his 100th cap - dropping into deeper positions to nullify the threat of the free-running tevez . but the netherlands were obviously lacking the creative spark provided by the rested arjen robben , giovanni van bronkhorst and mark van bommel . that said , the dutch pressure almost paid off in the 67th minute , cocu going close after good work by rafael van der vart .
with messi and riquelme both replaced by coach jose pekerman , the game fizzled out somewhat and swung towards the dutch . but it was fittingly left to the record-equaling van der sar to save the day for the dutch , defying his 35 years to superbly palm away a great strike by tevez in the 73rd minute . the oranje army again invaded frankfurt for the match with airlines in the netherlands laying on 32 flights to the german city on wednesday . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : oranje fans were out in full force officially only 6,200 fans came with a ticket but it was estimated that 25,000 fans would be in the 48,000-seater stadium and up to 40,000 more in the city . there was also a sizeable number of argentine supporters , many sporting the no. 10 shirt favored by diego maradona , with flags and scarves tied to their wrists .
maradona himself was seen in the stands along with his daughter , passionately cheering on the argentine side . the elephants claw back the other " group of death " game saw a spirited ivory coast coming from behind to beat serbia & montenegro 3-2 .
the elephants fought back from two goals down to clinch their first world cup win in an entertaining and fiercely-fought battle on wednesday in munich , played in pouring rain , to avoid ending bottom of group c. despite being eliminated from the world cup , both heavily-changed teams went at it hammer and tongs from the start before a capacity 66,000 crowd in a bid to restore their pride .
although ivory coast had the best of the play in the first ten minutes , their trio of newcomers at the back were caught out by long high balls from serbia and montenegro 's . serbia , seeking self-respect after a 6-0 drubbing by argentina , took the lead in the 10th minute with striker nikola zigic slotting in the ball after a long pass by dejan stankovic .
they built up on the result in the 19th minute after a botched clearance by ivory coast stand-in captain cyrille domoraud was seized by sasa ilic . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ivory coast players celebrate after their third goal the ivorians however made up in the 36th minute with arune dindane neatly netting a twice-taken penalty .
the strengthened ivorians dominated in the second half and dindane once again showed his class by heading in a kader keita cross in the 67th minute . the ivorians were n't finished as yet when kalou stepped up to score and seal a historic victory for ivory coast . dw staff / afp -lrb- sp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de argentina beat up serbia and montenegro argentina proved why some consider them a world cup title contender , displaying their speed and precision passing in a 6-0 rout of their group c opponents .
-lrb- june 20 , 2006 -rrb- dutch victory breaks hearts in ivory coast with everything at stake in the " group of death , " the ivory coast gave the holland a run for their money throughout a pulsating match that saw seven yellow cards before ending 2-1 in the netherlands ' favor .
-lrb- june 16 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands review all the action from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 13.01.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 21.06.2006 no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : juan riquelme , right , and kew jaliens go for the ball two-time world cup winners argentina reached a goalless draw with the netherlands to finish top of group c in a tight , furiously-paced game in frankfurt on wednesday . the dutch team , who like the argentines posted two victories over group rivals serbia and montenegro and ivory coast , finished in second place on goal difference and will play group d winners portugal in nuremberg on sunday .
the argentines will meet mexico in leipzig in the second round on saturday . argentina had a raft of chances throughout the match , and dutch coach marco van basten had two fine first-half clearances by defender khalid boulahrouz and one outstanding save late in the game by edwin van der sar to thank for a clean sheet . messi , tevez create havoc argentine strikers lionel messi and carlos tevez , along with midfield duo maxi rodriguez and juan riquelme , caused havoc in the dutch defense early on with their tight combinations of fast , accurate passing and blistering counter-attacking speed . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : netherlands ' khalid boulahrouz , left , and argentina 's lionel messi challenge for the ball teenage sensation messi made his mark in the eighth minute , playing a dangerous through ball into the area , which boulahrouz just managed to get his foot to ahead of the onrushing esteban cambiasso and nicolas burdisso . man-of-the-match tevez had a chance just after the quarter-hour , turning inside phillip cocu and unleashing a powerful left-footed shot just past the outside post of captain van der sar , who was winning his 112th cap to draw level on all-time appearances for the oranje with frank de boer . the netherlands ' best chance came a minute later , but dirk kuyt drilled a shot just wide . van der sar was then called into action in the 27th minute to punch away a swerving riquelme corner . from the ensuing corner kuyt brought down tevez on the edge of the box and the dutch fans had the imposing 1.91m frame of boulahrouz to thank again as he lunged to fend off the free-kick from tevez 's feet onto the post and away .
rodriguez then watched in agony as his blistering half-volley beat van der sar but drifted late and shaved off the post . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : flying van der sar saved the day for the dutch on the stroke of half-time , van der sar saved a messi shot after the barcelona striker was allowed far too much time in front of goal . the second-half started with riquleme taking advantage of the dutch defense standing off to fire a shot that narrowly missed goal , and rodriguez following up shortly after with a shot that flew high . van der sar saves the day but the dutch did manage to clamp down on the argentineans , wesley sneijder and cocu - winning his 100th cap - dropping into deeper positions to nullify the threat of the free-running tevez . but the netherlands were obviously lacking the creative spark provided by the rested arjen robben , giovanni van bronkhorst and mark van bommel . that said , the dutch pressure almost paid off in the 67th minute , cocu going close after good work by rafael van der vart .
with messi and riquelme both replaced by coach jose pekerman , the game fizzled out somewhat and swung towards the dutch . but it was fittingly left to the record-equaling van der sar to save the day for the dutch , defying his 35 years to superbly palm away a great strike by tevez in the 73rd minute . the oranje army again invaded frankfurt for the match with airlines in the netherlands laying on 32 flights to the german city on wednesday . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : oranje fans were out in full force officially only 6,200 fans came with a ticket but it was estimated that 25,000 fans would be in the 48,000-seater stadium and up to 40,000 more in the city . there was also a sizeable number of argentine supporters , many sporting the no. 10 shirt favored by diego maradona , with flags and scarves tied to their wrists .
maradona himself was seen in the stands along with his daughter , passionately cheering on the argentine side . the elephants claw back the other " group of death " game saw a spirited ivory coast coming from behind to beat serbia & montenegro 3-2 .
the elephants fought back from two goals down to clinch their first world cup win in an entertaining and fiercely-fought battle on wednesday in munich , played in pouring rain , to avoid ending bottom of group c. despite being eliminated from the world cup , both heavily-changed teams went at it hammer and tongs from the start before a capacity 66,000 crowd in a bid to restore their pride .
although ivory coast had the best of the play in the first ten minutes , their trio of newcomers at the back were caught out by long high balls from serbia and montenegro 's . serbia , seeking self-respect after a 6-0 drubbing by argentina , took the lead in the 10th minute with striker nikola zigic slotting in the ball after a long pass by dejan stankovic .
they built up on the result in the 19th minute after a botched clearance by ivory coast stand-in captain cyrille domoraud was seized by sasa ilic . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ivory coast players celebrate after their third goal the ivorians however made up in the 36th minute with arune dindane neatly netting a twice-taken penalty .
the strengthened ivorians dominated in the second half and dindane once again showed his class by heading in a kader keita cross in the 67th minute . the ivorians were n't finished as yet when kalou stepped up to score and seal a historic victory for ivory coast . dw staff / afp -lrb- sp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de argentina beat up serbia and montenegro argentina proved why some consider them a world cup title contender , displaying their speed and precision passing in a 6-0 rout of their group c opponents .
-lrb- june 20 , 2006 -rrb- dutch victory breaks hearts in ivory coast with everything at stake in the " group of death , " the ivory coast gave the holland a run for their money throughout a pulsating match that saw seven yellow cards before ending 2-1 in the netherlands ' favor .
-lrb- june 16 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands review all the action from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 12.12.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 21.06.2006 no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : juan riquelme , right , and kew jaliens go for the ball two-time world cup winners argentina reached a goalless draw with the netherlands to finish top of group c in a tight , furiously-paced game in frankfurt on wednesday . the dutch team , who like the argentines posted two victories over group rivals serbia and montenegro and ivory coast , finished in second place on goal difference and will play group d winners portugal in nuremberg on sunday .
the argentines will meet mexico in leipzig in the second round on saturday . argentina had a raft of chances throughout the match , and dutch coach marco van basten had two fine first-half clearances by defender khalid boulahrouz and one outstanding save late in the game by edwin van der sar to thank for a clean sheet . messi , tevez create havoc argentine strikers lionel messi and carlos tevez , along with midfield duo maxi rodriguez and juan riquelme , caused havoc in the dutch defense early on with their tight combinations of fast , accurate passing and blistering counter-attacking speed . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : netherlands ' khalid boulahrouz , left , and argentina 's lionel messi challenge for the ball teenage sensation messi made his mark in the eighth minute , playing a dangerous through ball into the area , which boulahrouz just managed to get his foot to ahead of the onrushing esteban cambiasso and nicolas burdisso . man-of-the-match tevez had a chance just after the quarter-hour , turning inside phillip cocu and unleashing a powerful left-footed shot just past the outside post of captain van der sar , who was winning his 112th cap to draw level on all-time appearances for the oranje with frank de boer . the netherlands ' best chance came a minute later , but dirk kuyt drilled a shot just wide . van der sar was then called into action in the 27th minute to punch away a swerving riquelme corner . from the ensuing corner kuyt brought down tevez on the edge of the box and the dutch fans had the imposing 1.91m frame of boulahrouz to thank again as he lunged to fend off the free-kick from tevez 's feet onto the post and away .
rodriguez then watched in agony as his blistering half-volley beat van der sar but drifted late and shaved off the post . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : flying van der sar saved the day for the dutch on the stroke of half-time , van der sar saved a messi shot after the barcelona striker was allowed far too much time in front of goal . the second-half started with riquleme taking advantage of the dutch defense standing off to fire a shot that narrowly missed goal , and rodriguez following up shortly after with a shot that flew high . van der sar saves the day but the dutch did manage to clamp down on the argentineans , wesley sneijder and cocu - winning his 100th cap - dropping into deeper positions to nullify the threat of the free-running tevez . but the netherlands were obviously lacking the creative spark provided by the rested arjen robben , giovanni van bronkhorst and mark van bommel . that said , the dutch pressure almost paid off in the 67th minute , cocu going close after good work by rafael van der vart .
with messi and riquelme both replaced by coach jose pekerman , the game fizzled out somewhat and swung towards the dutch . but it was fittingly left to the record-equaling van der sar to save the day for the dutch , defying his 35 years to superbly palm away a great strike by tevez in the 73rd minute . the oranje army again invaded frankfurt for the match with airlines in the netherlands laying on 32 flights to the german city on wednesday . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : oranje fans were out in full force officially only 6,200 fans came with a ticket but it was estimated that 25,000 fans would be in the 48,000-seater stadium and up to 40,000 more in the city . there was also a sizeable number of argentine supporters , many sporting the no. 10 shirt favored by diego maradona , with flags and scarves tied to their wrists .
maradona himself was seen in the stands along with his daughter , passionately cheering on the argentine side . the elephants claw back the other " group of death " game saw a spirited ivory coast coming from behind to beat serbia & montenegro 3-2 .
the elephants fought back from two goals down to clinch their first world cup win in an entertaining and fiercely-fought battle on wednesday in munich , played in pouring rain , to avoid ending bottom of group c. despite being eliminated from the world cup , both heavily-changed teams went at it hammer and tongs from the start before a capacity 66,000 crowd in a bid to restore their pride .
although ivory coast had the best of the play in the first ten minutes , their trio of newcomers at the back were caught out by long high balls from serbia and montenegro 's . serbia , seeking self-respect after a 6-0 drubbing by argentina , took the lead in the 10th minute with striker nikola zigic slotting in the ball after a long pass by dejan stankovic .
they built up on the result in the 19th minute after a botched clearance by ivory coast stand-in captain cyrille domoraud was seized by sasa ilic . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ivory coast players celebrate after their third goal the ivorians however made up in the 36th minute with arune dindane neatly netting a twice-taken penalty .
the strengthened ivorians dominated in the second half and dindane once again showed his class by heading in a kader keita cross in the 67th minute . the ivorians were n't finished as yet when kalou stepped up to score and seal a historic victory for ivory coast . dw staff / afp -lrb- sp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de argentina beat up serbia and montenegro argentina proved why some consider them a world cup title contender , displaying their speed and precision passing in a 6-0 rout of their group c opponents .
-lrb- june 20 , 2006 -rrb- dutch victory breaks hearts in ivory coast with everything at stake in the " group of death , " the ivory coast gave the holland a run for their money throughout a pulsating match that saw seven yellow cards before ending 2-1 in the netherlands ' favor .
-lrb- june 16 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands review all the action from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 21.06.2006 no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : juan riquelme , right , and kew jaliens go for the ball two-time world cup winners argentina reached a goalless draw with the netherlands to finish top of group c in a tight , furiously-paced game in frankfurt on wednesday . the dutch team , who like the argentines posted two victories over group rivals serbia and montenegro and ivory coast , finished in second place on goal difference and will play group d winners portugal in nuremberg on sunday .
the argentines will meet mexico in leipzig in the second round on saturday . argentina had a raft of chances throughout the match , and dutch coach marco van basten had two fine first-half clearances by defender khalid boulahrouz and one outstanding save late in the game by edwin van der sar to thank for a clean sheet . messi , tevez create havoc argentine strikers lionel messi and carlos tevez , along with midfield duo maxi rodriguez and juan riquelme , caused havoc in the dutch defense early on with their tight combinations of fast , accurate passing and blistering counter-attacking speed . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : netherlands ' khalid boulahrouz , left , and argentina 's lionel messi challenge for the ball teenage sensation messi made his mark in the eighth minute , playing a dangerous through ball into the area , which boulahrouz just managed to get his foot to ahead of the onrushing esteban cambiasso and nicolas burdisso . man-of-the-match tevez had a chance just after the quarter-hour , turning inside phillip cocu and unleashing a powerful left-footed shot just past the outside post of captain van der sar , who was winning his 112th cap to draw level on all-time appearances for the oranje with frank de boer . the netherlands ' best chance came a minute later , but dirk kuyt drilled a shot just wide . van der sar was then called into action in the 27th minute to punch away a swerving riquelme corner . from the ensuing corner kuyt brought down tevez on the edge of the box and the dutch fans had the imposing 1.91m frame of boulahrouz to thank again as he lunged to fend off the free-kick from tevez 's feet onto the post and away .
rodriguez then watched in agony as his blistering half-volley beat van der sar but drifted late and shaved off the post . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : flying van der sar saved the day for the dutch on the stroke of half-time , van der sar saved a messi shot after the barcelona striker was allowed far too much time in front of goal . the second-half started with riquleme taking advantage of the dutch defense standing off to fire a shot that narrowly missed goal , and rodriguez following up shortly after with a shot that flew high . van der sar saves the day but the dutch did manage to clamp down on the argentineans , wesley sneijder and cocu - winning his 100th cap - dropping into deeper positions to nullify the threat of the free-running tevez . but the netherlands were obviously lacking the creative spark provided by the rested arjen robben , giovanni van bronkhorst and mark van bommel . that said , the dutch pressure almost paid off in the 67th minute , cocu going close after good work by rafael van der vart .
with messi and riquelme both replaced by coach jose pekerman , the game fizzled out somewhat and swung towards the dutch . but it was fittingly left to the record-equaling van der sar to save the day for the dutch , defying his 35 years to superbly palm away a great strike by tevez in the 73rd minute . the oranje army again invaded frankfurt for the match with airlines in the netherlands laying on 32 flights to the german city on wednesday . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : oranje fans were out in full force officially only 6,200 fans came with a ticket but it was estimated that 25,000 fans would be in the 48,000-seater stadium and up to 40,000 more in the city . there was also a sizeable number of argentine supporters , many sporting the no. 10 shirt favored by diego maradona , with flags and scarves tied to their wrists .
maradona himself was seen in the stands along with his daughter , passionately cheering on the argentine side . the elephants claw back the other " group of death " game saw a spirited ivory coast coming from behind to beat serbia & montenegro 3-2 .
the elephants fought back from two goals down to clinch their first world cup win in an entertaining and fiercely-fought battle on wednesday in munich , played in pouring rain , to avoid ending bottom of group c. despite being eliminated from the world cup , both heavily-changed teams went at it hammer and tongs from the start before a capacity 66,000 crowd in a bid to restore their pride .
although ivory coast had the best of the play in the first ten minutes , their trio of newcomers at the back were caught out by long high balls from serbia and montenegro 's . serbia , seeking self-respect after a 6-0 drubbing by argentina , took the lead in the 10th minute with striker nikola zigic slotting in the ball after a long pass by dejan stankovic .
they built up on the result in the 19th minute after a botched clearance by ivory coast stand-in captain cyrille domoraud was seized by sasa ilic . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ivory coast players celebrate after their third goal the ivorians however made up in the 36th minute with arune dindane neatly netting a twice-taken penalty .
the strengthened ivorians dominated in the second half and dindane once again showed his class by heading in a kader keita cross in the 67th minute . the ivorians were n't finished as yet when kalou stepped up to score and seal a historic victory for ivory coast . dw staff / afp -lrb- sp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de argentina beat up serbia and montenegro argentina proved why some consider them a world cup title contender , displaying their speed and precision passing in a 6-0 rout of their group c opponents .

live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands -pipe- news -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 02.06.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de news -pipe- 21.06.2006 live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands netherlands 0:0 argentina ivory coast 3:2 serbia & montenegro team line-ups the netherlands -lrb- 4-3-3 -rrb- 1-edwin van der sar ; 2-kew jaliens , 3-khalid boulahrouz , 13-andre ooijer , 15-tim de cler ; 20-wesley sneijder , 10-rafael van der vaart 8-philip cocu ; 7-dirk kuijt , 9-ruud van nistelrooy , 17-robin van persie coach : marco van basten argentina -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 1-roberto abbondanzieri ; 21-nicolas burdisso , 2-roberto ayala , 15-gabriel milito , 17-leandro cufre ; 5-esteban cambiasso , 8-javier mascherano , 10-juan roman riquelme , 18-maxi rodriguez ; 19-lionel messi , 11-carlos tevez coach : jose pekerman referee : luis medina cantalejo -lrb- spain -rrb- linesmen : victoriano giraldez carrasco -lrb- spain -rrb- , pedro medina hernandez -lrb- spain -rrb- ivory coast -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 23-boubacar barry ; 21-emmanuel eboue , 17-cyrille domoraud , 3-arthur boka , 6-blaise kouassi ; 5-didier zokora , 19-gneri yaya toure , 2-kanga akale , 18-abelkader keita ; 9-arouna kone , 15-aruna dindane coach : henri michel serbia & montenegro -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 1-dragoslav jevric ; 14-nenad djordjevic , 6-goran gavrancic , 20-mladen krstajic , 15-milan dudic ; 2-ivan ergic , 4-igor duljaj , 10-dejan stankovic , 11-predrag djordjevic ; 22-sasa ilic , 19-nikola zigic coach : ilija petkovic referee : marco rodriguez -lrb- mexico -rrb- linesmen : jose luis camargo -lrb- mexico -rrb- , leonel leal -lrb- costa rica -rrb- 1. min .
kick-off in frankfurt the dutch have made five changes due to yellow cards picked up in the fist two games .
argentina have also 5 different players on the pitch including the teenage sensation lionel messi .
2. min .
the dutch go on the attack .
van nistelroy is penalized for pushing an opponent .
3. min .
netherlands take control early on but argentina defend well and keep the dutch out .
5. min .
first corner of the game for argentina .
riquelme supplies the cross and van persie clears for another corner .
6. min. van der sar easily deals with the corner and sets up an attack. van nistelroy fails to make the most of it and it goes out for goal kick .
8. min .
messi plays a wonderful through ball to cambiasso and boulahrouz makes a last second stretch to clear for a corner .
10. min .
the game is being played in midfield at the moment as both teams try to build up attacks but as yet to no avail .
12. min .
first corner for holland. van persie takes it but blown for a foul by a dutch player .
15. min .
quarter of an hour played and not much goal mouth action to speak of .
a pretty slow start to the game .
17. min .
argentina string a number of passes together and tevez 's shot from outside the box goes wide of the post .
messi involved in the attack much to the delight of the argentina fans .
18. min .
holland have their first shot on goal .
well saved by abbondanzieri .
serbia and montenegro 1 zigic pute serbia and montenegro in the lead on 10 minutes .
21. min .
the dutch have control of the ball in midfield but still ca n't find that killer pass to split the argentina defense .
23. min .
argentina look more dangerous than the dutch going forward but still ca n't find a way through 24. min .
argentina substitution coloccini is on for burdisso after a knee injury 26. min .
tevez dribbles past two dutch defenders and wins a corner .
27. min .
riquleme fires in a bending shot from the corner and van der saar punches over the bar .
28. min .
yellow for kuyt kuyt is booked for pushing tevez as he makes another dazzling run .
28. min .
argentina hit the post off riquelme 's low free kick into the box .
29. min .
rodriguez blasts a shot from outside the box and misses by only centimeters .
argentina are in control and look like scoring .
serbia and montenegro 2 goal from sasa ilic on 20 minutes 32. min .
half an hour gone and argentina are dominating proceedings .
messi is in the thick of things seems to be relishing the opportunity to play a full game .
33. min .
argentina have another great chance but rodriguez shoots into the side netting from close range .
35. min .
sneijder has a crack from 35 meters out .
blocked by ayala .
36. min .
tevez wins argentina 's 7th corner as he takes on the dutch defense .
38. min .
the dutch have managed to slow the game down and gain more control .
40. min .
tevez wins another corner .
once again he takes on the dutch defense .
41. min .
messi tries a through ball into the box but tevez fails to read his intentions and van der saar claims it .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane scores on 36 minutes 42. min .
yellow card for ooijer ooijer gets booked for a tackle from behind on riquelme .
45. min .
one minute stoppage time added 45 + 1. min .
messi shoots from outside the box. van der saar makes a good save .
half time in frankfurt half time in the game between the netherlands and argentina .
the dutch put in a disciplined performance and defended well against the skillful argentineans .
tevez in particular troubled the dutch defense and messi showed glimpses of his great skill .
we can look forward to an interesting second half as both teams go looking for the win .
46. min .
second half kicks off second half kicks off in frankfurt .
47. min .
van persie takes a free kick from 35 meters out and blasts the ball high and wide into the stand .
48. min .
yellow for de kler dutch player de kler is carded for elbowing an opponent .
50. min .
a tactical game in the second half with tevez continuing to shine .
52. min .
kuyt floats a ball into the argentina box but well claimed by the keeper .
53. min .
messi and riquleme play a clever one-two to split open the dutch defense and riquelme 's shot goes just centimeters wide .
55. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez who shoots over the bar .
argentina are looking very dangerous and holland are struggling to keep them in check .
56. min .
dutch substitution babel is brought on to replace ruud van nistelroy .
57. min .
yellow card for cambiasso kuyt draws a foul 35 meters out and cambiasso is booked .
kuyt is holland 's most active player at the moment .
58. min .
van der vaart hits a poor free kick and draws jeers from the crowd .
60. min .
an hour gone and argentina still have the upper hand creating more chances and looking more likely to score but holland are defending well .
62. min .
the dutch have made a few poor passes at the back and handed the ball to argentina .
it could prove costly .
65. min .
riquelme takes on three dutch defenders and is barely stopped in the box .
65. min .
tevez tries an overhead kick in the box but fails to make proper contact .
67. min .
van der vaart makes a great run into the box and cocu 's shot is well blocked by abbondanzieri and pushed out for a corner .
holland 's best chance of the second half .
69. min .
cocu has another attempt on goal but his shot goes right and wide .
70. min .
nessi substituted cruz is brought on for messi who struggled in the second half against the strong dutch defense .
71. min .
the pace of the game has dropped considerably .
the dutch are happy to stay on level terms and argentina are looking forward to the next round .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane levels for ivory coast in 67th minute 73. min .
tevez draws a great save from van der saar 76. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez outside the box .
his shot is blocked .
78. min .
holland are defending in numbers trying to shut down the argentineans .
79. min .
de kler floats a cross in from the left .
foul called on babel .
80. min .
argentina substitution aimar is brought on to replace riquelme .
81. min .
both teams seem to have settled for a draw as we head into the final ten minutes .
84. min .
holland have more control of the ball but lack the drive to go forward .
85. min .
van der vaart tries another free-kick but once again he shoots wide of the goal .
88. min .
a cross into the argentina box misses the dutch and argentina stay on level terms .
90. min .
corner for holland is cleared well by argentina .
90. min .
yellow card yellow card for mascherano serbia and montenegro 2 kalou puts ivory coast ahead 90 + 2. min .
tevez almost breaks the deadlock but his shot goes over the bar in the dying seconds of the game .
full time in frankfurt the netherlands hold argentina to a goalless draw in a tactical game by two of the tournament 's top teams .
argentina had most of the play and the better chances but could n't make the most of their superiority .
the dutch will be happy not to have lost and look forward to their clash against portugal .
argentina now face mexico .
serbia and montenegro ivory coast come from behind to win 3:2 send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic 9798 radio news listen to world headlines from the top of the hour dw-world.de check out our latest interactive web features dw screensaver social bookmarking our rss feeds dw widgets integrated search dw on facebook newsletters netvibes.com the way you want it mobile optimized for pdas newsletters news in your inbox audio / video podcasts © dw 2011 deutsche welle is not responsible for the content of external websites .

live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands -pipe- news -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 09.11.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de news -pipe- 21.06.2006 live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands netherlands 0:0 argentina ivory coast 3:2 serbia & montenegro team line-ups the netherlands -lrb- 4-3-3 -rrb- 1-edwin van der sar ; 2-kew jaliens , 3-khalid boulahrouz , 13-andre ooijer , 15-tim de cler ; 20-wesley sneijder , 10-rafael van der vaart 8-philip cocu ; 7-dirk kuijt , 9-ruud van nistelrooy , 17-robin van persie coach : marco van basten argentina -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 1-roberto abbondanzieri ; 21-nicolas burdisso , 2-roberto ayala , 15-gabriel milito , 17-leandro cufre ; 5-esteban cambiasso , 8-javier mascherano , 10-juan roman riquelme , 18-maxi rodriguez ; 19-lionel messi , 11-carlos tevez coach : jose pekerman referee : luis medina cantalejo -lrb- spain -rrb- linesmen : victoriano giraldez carrasco -lrb- spain -rrb- , pedro medina hernandez -lrb- spain -rrb- ivory coast -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 23-boubacar barry ; 21-emmanuel eboue , 17-cyrille domoraud , 3-arthur boka , 6-blaise kouassi ; 5-didier zokora , 19-gneri yaya toure , 2-kanga akale , 18-abelkader keita ; 9-arouna kone , 15-aruna dindane coach : henri michel serbia & montenegro -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 1-dragoslav jevric ; 14-nenad djordjevic , 6-goran gavrancic , 20-mladen krstajic , 15-milan dudic ; 2-ivan ergic , 4-igor duljaj , 10-dejan stankovic , 11-predrag djordjevic ; 22-sasa ilic , 19-nikola zigic coach : ilija petkovic referee : marco rodriguez -lrb- mexico -rrb- linesmen : jose luis camargo -lrb- mexico -rrb- , leonel leal -lrb- costa rica -rrb- 1. min .
kick-off in frankfurt the dutch have made five changes due to yellow cards picked up in the fist two games .
argentina have also 5 different players on the pitch including the teenage sensation lionel messi .
2. min .
the dutch go on the attack .
van nistelroy is penalized for pushing an opponent .
3. min .
netherlands take control early on but argentina defend well and keep the dutch out .
5. min .
first corner of the game for argentina .
riquelme supplies the cross and van persie clears for another corner .
6. min. van der sar easily deals with the corner and sets up an attack. van nistelroy fails to make the most of it and it goes out for goal kick .
8. min .
messi plays a wonderful through ball to cambiasso and boulahrouz makes a last second stretch to clear for a corner .
10. min .
the game is being played in midfield at the moment as both teams try to build up attacks but as yet to no avail .
12. min .
first corner for holland. van persie takes it but blown for a foul by a dutch player .
15. min .
quarter of an hour played and not much goal mouth action to speak of .
a pretty slow start to the game .
17. min .
argentina string a number of passes together and tevez 's shot from outside the box goes wide of the post .
messi involved in the attack much to the delight of the argentina fans .
18. min .
holland have their first shot on goal .
well saved by abbondanzieri .
serbia and montenegro 1 zigic pute serbia and montenegro in the lead on 10 minutes .
21. min .
the dutch have control of the ball in midfield but still ca n't find that killer pass to split the argentina defense .
23. min .
argentina look more dangerous than the dutch going forward but still ca n't find a way through 24. min .
argentina substitution coloccini is on for burdisso after a knee injury 26. min .
tevez dribbles past two dutch defenders and wins a corner .
27. min .
riquleme fires in a bending shot from the corner and van der saar punches over the bar .
28. min .
yellow for kuyt kuyt is booked for pushing tevez as he makes another dazzling run .
28. min .
argentina hit the post off riquelme 's low free kick into the box .
29. min .
rodriguez blasts a shot from outside the box and misses by only centimeters .
argentina are in control and look like scoring .
serbia and montenegro 2 goal from sasa ilic on 20 minutes 32. min .
half an hour gone and argentina are dominating proceedings .
messi is in the thick of things seems to be relishing the opportunity to play a full game .
33. min .
argentina have another great chance but rodriguez shoots into the side netting from close range .
35. min .
sneijder has a crack from 35 meters out .
blocked by ayala .
36. min .
tevez wins argentina 's 7th corner as he takes on the dutch defense .
38. min .
the dutch have managed to slow the game down and gain more control .
40. min .
tevez wins another corner .
once again he takes on the dutch defense .
41. min .
messi tries a through ball into the box but tevez fails to read his intentions and van der saar claims it .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane scores on 36 minutes 42. min .
yellow card for ooijer ooijer gets booked for a tackle from behind on riquelme .
45. min .
one minute stoppage time added 45 + 1. min .
messi shoots from outside the box. van der saar makes a good save .
half time in frankfurt half time in the game between the netherlands and argentina .
the dutch put in a disciplined performance and defended well against the skillful argentineans .
tevez in particular troubled the dutch defense and messi showed glimpses of his great skill .
we can look forward to an interesting second half as both teams go looking for the win .
46. min .
second half kicks off second half kicks off in frankfurt .
47. min .
van persie takes a free kick from 35 meters out and blasts the ball high and wide into the stand .
48. min .
yellow for de kler dutch player de kler is carded for elbowing an opponent .
50. min .
a tactical game in the second half with tevez continuing to shine .
52. min .
kuyt floats a ball into the argentina box but well claimed by the keeper .
53. min .
messi and riquleme play a clever one-two to split open the dutch defense and riquelme 's shot goes just centimeters wide .
55. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez who shoots over the bar .
argentina are looking very dangerous and holland are struggling to keep them in check .
56. min .
dutch substitution babel is brought on to replace ruud van nistelroy .
57. min .
yellow card for cambiasso kuyt draws a foul 35 meters out and cambiasso is booked .
kuyt is holland 's most active player at the moment .
58. min .
van der vaart hits a poor free kick and draws jeers from the crowd .
60. min .
an hour gone and argentina still have the upper hand creating more chances and looking more likely to score but holland are defending well .
62. min .
the dutch have made a few poor passes at the back and handed the ball to argentina .
it could prove costly .
65. min .
riquelme takes on three dutch defenders and is barely stopped in the box .
65. min .
tevez tries an overhead kick in the box but fails to make proper contact .
67. min .
van der vaart makes a great run into the box and cocu 's shot is well blocked by abbondanzieri and pushed out for a corner .
holland 's best chance of the second half .
69. min .
cocu has another attempt on goal but his shot goes right and wide .
70. min .
nessi substituted cruz is brought on for messi who struggled in the second half against the strong dutch defense .
71. min .
the pace of the game has dropped considerably .
the dutch are happy to stay on level terms and argentina are looking forward to the next round .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane levels for ivory coast in 67th minute 73. min .
tevez draws a great save from van der saar 76. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez outside the box .
his shot is blocked .
78. min .
holland are defending in numbers trying to shut down the argentineans .
79. min .
de kler floats a cross in from the left .
foul called on babel .
80. min .
argentina substitution aimar is brought on to replace riquelme .
81. min .
both teams seem to have settled for a draw as we head into the final ten minutes .
84. min .
holland have more control of the ball but lack the drive to go forward .
85. min .
van der vaart tries another free-kick but once again he shoots wide of the goal .
88. min .
a cross into the argentina box misses the dutch and argentina stay on level terms .
90. min .
corner for holland is cleared well by argentina .
90. min .
yellow card yellow card for mascherano serbia and montenegro 2 kalou puts ivory coast ahead 90 + 2. min .
tevez almost breaks the deadlock but his shot goes over the bar in the dying seconds of the game .
full time in frankfurt the netherlands hold argentina to a goalless draw in a tactical game by two of the tournament 's top teams .
argentina had most of the play and the better chances but could n't make the most of their superiority .
the dutch will be happy not to have lost and look forward to their clash against portugal .
argentina now face mexico .
serbia and montenegro ivory coast come from behind to win 3:2 send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

yellow for kuyt kuyt is booked for pushing tevez as he makes another dazzling run .
28. min .
argentina hit the post off riquelme 's low free kick into the box .
29. min .
rodriguez blasts a shot from outside the box and misses by only centimeters .
argentina are in control and look like scoring .
serbia and montenegro 2 goal from sasa ilic on 20 minutes 32. min .
half an hour gone and argentina are dominating proceedings .
messi is in the thick of things seems to be relishing the opportunity to play a full game .
33. min .
argentina have another great chance but rodriguez shoots into the side netting from close range .
35. min .
sneijder has a crack from 35 meters out .
blocked by ayala .
36. min .
tevez wins argentina 's 7th corner as he takes on the dutch defense .
38. min .
the dutch have managed to slow the game down and gain more control .
40. min .
tevez wins another corner .
once again he takes on the dutch defense .
41. min .
messi tries a through ball into the box but tevez fails to read his intentions and van der saar claims it .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane scores on 36 minutes 42. min .
yellow card for ooijer ooijer gets booked for a tackle from behind on riquelme .
45. min .
one minute stoppage time added 45 + 1. min .
messi shoots from outside the box. van der saar makes a good save .
half time in frankfurt half time in the game between the netherlands and argentina .
the dutch put in a disciplined performance and defended well against the skillful argentineans .
tevez in particular troubled the dutch defense and messi showed glimpses of his great skill .
we can look forward to an interesting second half as both teams go looking for the win .
46. min .
second half kicks off second half kicks off in frankfurt .
47. min .
van persie takes a free kick from 35 meters out and blasts the ball high and wide into the stand .
48. min .
yellow for de kler dutch player de kler is carded for elbowing an opponent .
50. min .
a tactical game in the second half with tevez continuing to shine .
52. min .
kuyt floats a ball into the argentina box but well claimed by the keeper .
53. min .
messi and riquleme play a clever one-two to split open the dutch defense and riquelme 's shot goes just centimeters wide .
55. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez who shoots over the bar .
argentina are looking very dangerous and holland are struggling to keep them in check .
56. min .
dutch substitution babel is brought on to replace ruud van nistelroy .
57. min .
yellow card for cambiasso kuyt draws a foul 35 meters out and cambiasso is booked .
kuyt is holland 's most active player at the moment .
58. min .
van der vaart hits a poor free kick and draws jeers from the crowd .
60. min .
an hour gone and argentina still have the upper hand creating more chances and looking more likely to score but holland are defending well .
62. min .
the dutch have made a few poor passes at the back and handed the ball to argentina .
it could prove costly .
65. min .
riquelme takes on three dutch defenders and is barely stopped in the box .
65. min .
tevez tries an overhead kick in the box but fails to make proper contact .
67. min .
van der vaart makes a great run into the box and cocu 's shot is well blocked by abbondanzieri and pushed out for a corner .
holland 's best chance of the second half .
69. min .
cocu has another attempt on goal but his shot goes right and wide .
70. min .
nessi substituted cruz is brought on for messi who struggled in the second half against the strong dutch defense .
71. min .
the pace of the game has dropped considerably .
the dutch are happy to stay on level terms and argentina are looking forward to the next round .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane levels for ivory coast in 67th minute 73. min .
tevez draws a great save from van der saar 76. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez outside the box .
his shot is blocked .
78. min .
holland are defending in numbers trying to shut down the argentineans .
79. min .
de kler floats a cross in from the left .
foul called on babel .
80. min .
argentina substitution aimar is brought on to replace riquelme .
81. min .
both teams seem to have settled for a draw as we head into the final ten minutes .
84. min .
holland have more control of the ball but lack the drive to go forward .
85. min .
van der vaart tries another free-kick but once again he shoots wide of the goal .
88. min .
a cross into the argentina box misses the dutch and argentina stay on level terms .
90. min .
corner for holland is cleared well by argentina .
90. min .
yellow card yellow card for mascherano serbia and montenegro 2 kalou puts ivory coast ahead 90 + 2. min .
tevez almost breaks the deadlock but his shot goes over the bar in the dying seconds of the game .
full time in frankfurt the netherlands hold argentina to a goalless draw in a tactical game by two of the tournament 's top teams .
argentina had most of the play and the better chances but could n't make the most of their superiority .
the dutch will be happy not to have lost and look forward to their clash against portugal .
argentina now face mexico .
serbia and montenegro ivory coast come from behind to win 3:2 send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands -pipe- news -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 01.10.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de news -pipe- 21.06.2006 live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands netherlands 0:0 argentina ivory coast 3:2 serbia & montenegro team line-ups the netherlands -lrb- 4-3-3 -rrb- 1-edwin van der sar ; 2-kew jaliens , 3-khalid boulahrouz , 13-andre ooijer , 15-tim de cler ; 20-wesley sneijder , 10-rafael van der vaart 8-philip cocu ; 7-dirk kuijt , 9-ruud van nistelrooy , 17-robin van persie coach : marco van basten argentina -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 1-roberto abbondanzieri ; 21-nicolas burdisso , 2-roberto ayala , 15-gabriel milito , 17-leandro cufre ; 5-esteban cambiasso , 8-javier mascherano , 10-juan roman riquelme , 18-maxi rodriguez ; 19-lionel messi , 11-carlos tevez coach : jose pekerman referee : luis medina cantalejo -lrb- spain -rrb- linesmen : victoriano giraldez carrasco -lrb- spain -rrb- , pedro medina hernandez -lrb- spain -rrb- ivory coast -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 23-boubacar barry ; 21-emmanuel eboue , 17-cyrille domoraud , 3-arthur boka , 6-blaise kouassi ; 5-didier zokora , 19-gneri yaya toure , 2-kanga akale , 18-abelkader keita ; 9-arouna kone , 15-aruna dindane coach : henri michel serbia & montenegro -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 1-dragoslav jevric ; 14-nenad djordjevic , 6-goran gavrancic , 20-mladen krstajic , 15-milan dudic ; 2-ivan ergic , 4-igor duljaj , 10-dejan stankovic , 11-predrag djordjevic ; 22-sasa ilic , 19-nikola zigic coach : ilija petkovic referee : marco rodriguez -lrb- mexico -rrb- linesmen : jose luis camargo -lrb- mexico -rrb- , leonel leal -lrb- costa rica -rrb- 1. min .
kick-off in frankfurt the dutch have made five changes due to yellow cards picked up in the fist two games .
argentina have also 5 different players on the pitch including the teenage sensation lionel messi .
2. min .
the dutch go on the attack .
van nistelroy is penalized for pushing an opponent .
3. min .
netherlands take control early on but argentina defend well and keep the dutch out .
5. min .
first corner of the game for argentina .
riquelme supplies the cross and van persie clears for another corner .
6. min. van der sar easily deals with the corner and sets up an attack. van nistelroy fails to make the most of it and it goes out for goal kick .
8. min .
messi plays a wonderful through ball to cambiasso and boulahrouz makes a last second stretch to clear for a corner .
10. min .
the game is being played in midfield at the moment as both teams try to build up attacks but as yet to no avail .
12. min .
first corner for holland. van persie takes it but blown for a foul by a dutch player .
15. min .
quarter of an hour played and not much goal mouth action to speak of .
a pretty slow start to the game .
17. min .
argentina string a number of passes together and tevez 's shot from outside the box goes wide of the post .
messi involved in the attack much to the delight of the argentina fans .
18. min .
holland have their first shot on goal .
well saved by abbondanzieri .
serbia and montenegro 1 zigic pute serbia and montenegro in the lead on 10 minutes .
21. min .
the dutch have control of the ball in midfield but still ca n't find that killer pass to split the argentina defense .
23. min .
argentina look more dangerous than the dutch going forward but still ca n't find a way through 24. min .
argentina substitution coloccini is on for burdisso after a knee injury 26. min .
tevez dribbles past two dutch defenders and wins a corner .
27. min .
riquleme fires in a bending shot from the corner and van der saar punches over the bar .
28. min .
yellow for kuyt kuyt is booked for pushing tevez as he makes another dazzling run .
28. min .
argentina hit the post off riquelme 's low free kick into the box .
29. min .

argentina are in control and look like scoring .

us expected to pledge to respect human rights at summit -pipe- europe -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 24.09.2010 home news germany europe map world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de europe -pipe- 21.06.2006 us expected to pledge to respect human rights at summit großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : pressure to close the cuban camp is mounting us president george w. bush meets with the 25-nation european union wednesday in a summit expected to show that the two sides closing ranks over respecting human rights while fighting terrorism . bush is set to pledge that the united states will respect human rights in his war on terror , according to the draft of a final statement for the eu-us summit wednesday that arrives on the heels of european complaints over us treatment of prisoners at guantanamo bay . bush was greeted upon arriving in vienna tuesday by austrian chancellor and current european union president wolfgang schuessel , who had earlier in the day said : " we ca n't have an area where law does not apply , " referring to the us camp in cuba , where hundreds of terror suspects have been held without charge . european governments and rights groups have called on the united states to shut down guantanamo for detaining inmates in legal limbo . the draft of the joint statement by bush and european union leaders says : " consistent with our common values , we will ensure that measures taken to combat terrorism comply fully with our international obligations , including human rights law , refugee law and international humanitarian law . " we attach great importance to our ongoing in-depth dialogue and our common fight against terrorism and our respected domestic and international legal obligations , " according to extracts of the text read to afp . papering over differences the text does not specifically mention guantanamo , which the united states insists is needed in the war against terror . but it appears to show that the eu and the united states will be seeking in vienna to paper over their differences , in a movement of reconciliation that has continued since the two sides bickered deeply over the us invasion of iraq in 2003 . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the us and the eu hope to paper over differences at the summit the united states has refused to join in the kyoto protocol to limit greenhouse gases but the draft text , which is still being worked on one diplomat cautioned , says : " we will work more closely to address the serious and long term challenge of climate change , biodiversity loss , and air pollution and will act with resolve and urgency to reduce greenhouse gas emissions . " eu states have also criticized the united states for cia flights that allegedly stop in european countries on their way to delivering prisoners for torture . washington insists however that all cia flights are in accordance with us and other nations ' laws , particularly against torture . a strong relationship us national security advisor stephen hadley told reporters last week in washington that the summit was " an opportunity to reaffirm the strong relationship between the united states and the european union . " bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the us wants more help in iraq the united states and the eu now have a common line on trying to get iran to curb its nuclear ambitions , with washington even ready to join in eu-led talks with the islamic republic if tehran agrees to suspend uranium enrichment . on monday , bush turned up the pressure on iran , warning of " progressively stronger political and economic sanctions " if it refuses to freeze sensitive nuclear activities in return for talks . the united states and its partners - britain , france and germany , as well as russia and china - have made iran 's suspension of nuclear fuel work that could be weapons-related a condition for starting talks . the eu and the united states are world economic leaders and major partners , with $ 1.7 billion -lrb- 1.3 billion euros -rrb- per day in trade . bush hopes european leaders will improve their offer on agricultural trade to help bring about a breakthrough in stalled global trade talks , a white house official said tuesday . dw staff -lrb- jb -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de eu parliamentarians call for tribunal to replace guantanamo eu parliamentarians are stepping up the pressure on european governments to get the united states to shut down its controversial prison at guantanamo bay and set up an international tribunal in its place .
-lrb- june 15 , 2006 -rrb- eu , us present united front ahead of vienna summit vienna is gearing up to host the next eu-us summit on wednesday .
while the relationship between the two powers is often described as " complex , " this time , it seems there is consensus on the main issues up for discussion .
-lrb- june 20 , 2006 -rrb- " bremen taliban " release anticipated a turkish man living in bremen is expected to be allowed to return to germany from the us military base in guantanamo bay .
german authorities may have delayed his release by years , according to media reports .
-lrb- march 29 , 2006 -rrb- audios and videos on the topic bush and eu leaders meet in vienna feedback what do you think of the summit ?
please include your name and country in your reply .

postcard from europe : technology overtakes prague 's taxi drivers uk prepares for the pope it simply is n't cricket are the gay games necessary ?
love parade - the end of an era europe keep up with the latest in europe .

" we attach great importance to our ongoing in-depth dialogue and our common fight against terrorism and our respected domestic and international legal obligations , " according to extracts of the text read to afp . papering over differences the text does not specifically mention guantanamo , which the united states insists is needed in the war against terror . but it appears to show that the eu and the united states will be seeking in vienna to paper over their differences , in a movement of reconciliation that has continued since the two sides bickered deeply over the us invasion of iraq in 2003 . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the us and the eu hope to paper over differences at the summit the united states has refused to join in the kyoto protocol to limit greenhouse gases but the draft text , which is still being worked on one diplomat cautioned , says : " we will work more closely to address the serious and long term challenge of climate change , biodiversity loss , and air pollution and will act with resolve and urgency to reduce greenhouse gas emissions . " eu states have also criticized the united states for cia flights that allegedly stop in european countries on their way to delivering prisoners for torture . washington insists however that all cia flights are in accordance with us and other nations ' laws , particularly against torture . a strong relationship us national security advisor stephen hadley told reporters last week in washington that the summit was " an opportunity to reaffirm the strong relationship between the united states and the european union . " bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the us wants more help in iraq the united states and the eu now have a common line on trying to get iran to curb its nuclear ambitions , with washington even ready to join in eu-led talks with the islamic republic if tehran agrees to suspend uranium enrichment . on monday , bush turned up the pressure on iran , warning of " progressively stronger political and economic sanctions " if it refuses to freeze sensitive nuclear activities in return for talks . the united states and its partners - britain , france and germany , as well as russia and china - have made iran 's suspension of nuclear fuel work that could be weapons-related a condition for starting talks . the eu and the united states are world economic leaders and major partners , with $ 1.7 billion -lrb- 1.3 billion euros -rrb- per day in trade . bush hopes european leaders will improve their offer on agricultural trade to help bring about a breakthrough in stalled global trade talks , a white house official said tuesday . dw staff -lrb- jb -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de eu parliamentarians call for tribunal to replace guantanamo eu parliamentarians are stepping up the pressure on european governments to get the united states to shut down its controversial prison at guantanamo bay and set up an international tribunal in its place .
-lrb- june 15 , 2006 -rrb- eu , us present united front ahead of vienna summit vienna is gearing up to host the next eu-us summit on wednesday .
while the relationship between the two powers is often described as " complex , " this time , it seems there is consensus on the main issues up for discussion .
