" we chose -lrb- the rheinisches landesmuseum -rrb- as our media and fan center because many of the guests from japan who are coming to bonn during the world cup also want to take a bit of culture back with them , " said masato watanabe , a representative of the japanese football association . g-jamps serves as a central meeting point not only for japanese visitors and journalists but also for anybody interested in the japanese team .
but soccer is just the beginning .
courses , performances and presentations are being offered throughout the world cup in cooperation with the german-japanese society - everything from flower arranging and kimonos to martial arts , go -lrb- a japanese board game -rrb- and origami is on the program . the museum 's restaurant features both japanese and local cuisine and , in the spirit of intercultural understanding , sushi is only on offer when the german team plays . sausage a n d beer bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : fans were waiting with pens and hopeful smiles when the team left their hotel to go to practice a japanese beer-maker is an official sponsor of the country 's team and its presence ca n't be overlooked at g-jamps .
but visitors from japan are eager to take advantage of the opportunity to get to know elements of german culture while they are in the country .
it is not surprising that beer and sausage are among the musts . " most of the japanese guests speak good english and those who do n't bring pictures with them of german dishes they would like to try , " said paul hofmann , a server at haus daufenbach .
through connections with the united nations , located in bonn , the combined restaurant and hotel also has numerous guests from other un nations , including yemen , ecuador , and ethiopia . michael thomas from zum gequetschen -lrb- which could be roughly translated as " at the squeezed " -rrb- , a popular restaurant in the city center featuring traditional german cuisine , said that around 50 percent of international guests this month are from japan . " the japanese customers drink less and meals are more communal , " he said .
" they 'll order one dish and four plates and share it . " home comfort bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : both sushi and sausage are availabe here at the blue samurai 's media and fan headquarters but heavy german dishes on a daily basis get to be too much after a while .
according to a server at a bonn sushi bar , some of the japanese visitors also search out more familiar tastes in between the sauerkraut and bratwurst . " the japanese noodle house around the corner has many japanese guests , " she said .
" they prefer warm dishes and sushi is more of a snack .
they come here first to eat sushi and then they go over to the noodle house for miso soup , tempura and other warm things . " big stadium or big scree n bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the rising sun is visible all day long in bonn to welcome the team and their fans well nourished , rested and ready to go , blue samurai fans have several options when it comes to watching their team in action .
the best bet is to visit the stadium in bonn , where the team trains .
times are made public and entry is free - quite a deal , considering the hundreds of euros people pay to see the same team in a live game .
the only disadvantage , of course , is the absence of an opponent . those who want to see the games but do n't have tickets can still enjoy the stadium atmosphere by going to the big screen set up on one of bonn 's two large , open market squares .
there the cheapest seat goes for 11 euros -lrb- 13.50 dollars -rrb- , which makes the slightly smaller screen at the pub around the corner look a bit more appealing . megunu and musaku , two soccer fans from japan , were on their way to view the blue samurai during a training session at bonn 's stadium .
they had met as tourists in barcelona and decided to continue on together to germany for the world cup .
when asked about the blue samurai 's performance , musaku did n't beat around the bush . " the players are very good , but the coach is bad , " he said . o n e poi n t for japa n japan 's national coach , zico , is a soccer legend from brazil . " in my opinion it 's better to face brazil in this round rather than later in the k.o. round , " zico was quoted as saying in die zeit .
" better now and then again the finals .
whoever wants to achieve something at the world cup has to be prepared for everything . " after losing to australia last week 3-1 and tying with croatia 0-0 on sunday , the blue samurai will come up against zico 's native brazil on thursday , june 22 at 7 p.m.
utc . kate bowen send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de a tale of two cities - tokyo and berlin an art exhibition showcases more than a century of german-japanese artistic exchange opened last week at berlin 's national gallery .
it features everything from dada and mavo to giant polka dots and sleeping containers .
-lrb- june 15 , 2006 -rrb- japan survive croatia challenge but chances of progress slim japan and croatia battled to a goalless draw in nurenberg on sunday which left both nations with a slim chance of reaching the second round of the world cup .
-lrb- june 18 , 2006 -rrb- japan coach zico drafts in ogasawara for crucial croatia clash japan coach zico is looking to kashima antlers skipper mitsuo ogasawara to bolster his flagging attack in the make-or-break world cup match against croatia on sunday .
-lrb- june 18 , 2006 -rrb- audios and videos on the topic world cup reporter : turning japanese 9800 picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures interviews the stars have their say world cup stars talk to dw-world.de about the tournament .

new wave of mafia arrests in sicily -pipe- europe -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 28.09.2010 home news germany europe map world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de europe -pipe- 21.06.2006 new wave of mafia arrests in sicily großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : many top bosses like bernardo provenzano have been in hiding for decades in a crackdown following the seizure of a top mafia boss , italian officials arrested 45 suspects including clan leaders . italy announced a new blow against the sicilian mafia with 45 arrests this week including 16 alleged clan leaders , two months after the man said to be the network 's top boss was seized in a major coup . announcing the latest arrests , a jubilant piero grasso , the state attorney leading italy 's anti-mafia campaign , said : " cosa nostra is down on its knees . " grasso told the italian news agency ansa the investigation had uncovered evidence " linking mafia cells with businessmen and politicians , " including a list of candidates in recent elections which the crime group considered reliable . the suspects were captured during a dawn raid by 500 armed officers searching the mediterranean island .
first reports said 52 had been captured , including 13 clan bosses , but later statements revised the figures . some still at-large seven further suspects for whom warrants were issued in palermo were still at large late tuesday as a large-scale operation codenamed " gotha " continued a long-term campaign to smash the mafia 's organized crime network . the 52 arrest warrants issued by anti-mafia investigative magistrates carried charges of extortion and participating in mafia-linked associations . tuesday 's haul included 16 alleged clan chiefs each said to have held sway over his own sector of palermo .
bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : about 500 armed officers stormed the island they included antonino rotolo , 60 , francesco bonura , 64 , and antonino cina , 61 , whose arrests are considered particularly significant because of their allegedly lead role in running mafia operations . top boss nabbed the arrests follow the capture this spring of the organization 's top boss , a breakthrough for italian police .
bernardo provenzano , 73 , alleged to have been the man at the very pinnacle of the sicilian mafia empire , was arrested on april 11 after 43 years on the run . " the capture of provenzano and all that arose from it gives us a significant advantage for the future of sicily and its democratic life , " said italian interior minister giuliano amato tuesday . " we have n't yet won the war , there 's still a lot to do , " he said .
" the struggle against the mafia continues to be a priority for our country . " modern technology led to arrests grasso said the latest operation was the result of a probe which had enabled police to " piece together the current organizational chart of palermo 's mafia association . " investigators relied on numerous secretly recorded conversations between suspects that took place inside a garage in palermo used as a meeting place .
also used as evidence were documents , later decoded , found among provenzano 's personal things .
bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : mafia boss bernardo provenzano was captured in april " thanks to modern technology , it was possible to record an impressive number of conversations " that shed light on the structure and organization of the palermo mafia 's leadership , grasso said . palermo 's anti-mafia unit now has hundreds of hours of intercepted conversation that took place over two years , all recorded in the little hideaway in which the alleged crime bosses " openly and calmly discussed their criminal business . " having installed a scrambling device , they thought their conversations were protected from police eavesdropping . meanwhile salvatore cuffaro , centre-right president of sicily region re-elected last month , was interviewed by prosecutors for the second time in a trial in which he is accused of engaging in activities favoring cosa nostra . dw staff / afp -lrb- jb -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de suspected mafia killer arrested in germany suspected boss of the italian mafia has been arrested in northern germany , according to police officials .
-lrb- jan .
3 , 2005 -rrb- mob ladies : women 's roles in the italian mafia are growing in italy , the first-ever study on women in italian organized crime reveals that women are rising up the ranks to leadership positions .
this is both because the mafia is changing , and women are changing the mafia .
-lrb- may 9 , 2004 -rrb- godfather country gets a makeover italy 's distribution of former mafia-controlled land and assets to sicilian farmers has not just created jobs and revived the region , but also helped clean up sicily 's notorious gangster image .
-lrb- april 16 , 2004 -rrb- feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

us expected to pledge to respect human rights at summit -pipe- europe -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 25.09.2010 home news germany europe map world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de europe -pipe- 21.06.2006 us expected to pledge to respect human rights at summit großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : pressure to close the cuban camp is mounting us president george w. bush meets with the 25-nation european union wednesday in a summit expected to show that the two sides closing ranks over respecting human rights while fighting terrorism . bush is set to pledge that the united states will respect human rights in his war on terror , according to the draft of a final statement for the eu-us summit wednesday that arrives on the heels of european complaints over us treatment of prisoners at guantanamo bay . bush was greeted upon arriving in vienna tuesday by austrian chancellor and current european union president wolfgang schuessel , who had earlier in the day said : " we ca n't have an area where law does not apply , " referring to the us camp in cuba , where hundreds of terror suspects have been held without charge . european governments and rights groups have called on the united states to shut down guantanamo for detaining inmates in legal limbo . the draft of the joint statement by bush and european union leaders says : " consistent with our common values , we will ensure that measures taken to combat terrorism comply fully with our international obligations , including human rights law , refugee law and international humanitarian law . " we attach great importance to our ongoing in-depth dialogue and our common fight against terrorism and our respected domestic and international legal obligations , " according to extracts of the text read to afp . papering over differences the text does not specifically mention guantanamo , which the united states insists is needed in the war against terror . but it appears to show that the eu and the united states will be seeking in vienna to paper over their differences , in a movement of reconciliation that has continued since the two sides bickered deeply over the us invasion of iraq in 2003 . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the us and the eu hope to paper over differences at the summit the united states has refused to join in the kyoto protocol to limit greenhouse gases but the draft text , which is still being worked on one diplomat cautioned , says : " we will work more closely to address the serious and long term challenge of climate change , biodiversity loss , and air pollution and will act with resolve and urgency to reduce greenhouse gas emissions . " eu states have also criticized the united states for cia flights that allegedly stop in european countries on their way to delivering prisoners for torture . washington insists however that all cia flights are in accordance with us and other nations ' laws , particularly against torture . a strong relationship us national security advisor stephen hadley told reporters last week in washington that the summit was " an opportunity to reaffirm the strong relationship between the united states and the european union . " bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the us wants more help in iraq the united states and the eu now have a common line on trying to get iran to curb its nuclear ambitions , with washington even ready to join in eu-led talks with the islamic republic if tehran agrees to suspend uranium enrichment . on monday , bush turned up the pressure on iran , warning of " progressively stronger political and economic sanctions " if it refuses to freeze sensitive nuclear activities in return for talks . the united states and its partners - britain , france and germany , as well as russia and china - have made iran 's suspension of nuclear fuel work that could be weapons-related a condition for starting talks . the eu and the united states are world economic leaders and major partners , with $ 1.7 billion -lrb- 1.3 billion euros -rrb- per day in trade . bush hopes european leaders will improve their offer on agricultural trade to help bring about a breakthrough in stalled global trade talks , a white house official said tuesday . dw staff -lrb- jb -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de eu parliamentarians call for tribunal to replace guantanamo eu parliamentarians are stepping up the pressure on european governments to get the united states to shut down its controversial prison at guantanamo bay and set up an international tribunal in its place .
-lrb- june 15 , 2006 -rrb- eu , us present united front ahead of vienna summit vienna is gearing up to host the next eu-us summit on wednesday .
while the relationship between the two powers is often described as " complex , " this time , it seems there is consensus on the main issues up for discussion .
-lrb- june 20 , 2006 -rrb- " bremen taliban " release anticipated a turkish man living in bremen is expected to be allowed to return to germany from the us military base in guantanamo bay .
german authorities may have delayed his release by years , according to media reports .
-lrb- march 29 , 2006 -rrb- audios and videos on the topic bush and eu leaders meet in vienna feedback what do you think of the summit ?

live ticker : portugal 2:1 mexico -pipe- news -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 01.04.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de news -pipe- 21.06.2006 live ticker : portugal 2:1 mexico review all the details with the dw-world.de live ticker . fi n al group d matches portgual vs mexico a n d a n gola vs ira n portugal 2:1 mexico team li n e-ups portugal -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- 1-ricardo ; 13-miguel , 16-ricardo carvalho , 5-fernando meira , 3-marco caneira ; 8-armando petit , 18-maniche , 19-tiago , 7-luis figo , 11-simao sabrosa ; 23-helder postiga mexico -lrb- 5-3-2 -rrb- 1-oswaldo sanchez ; 16-mario mendez , 4-rafael marquez , 5-ricardo osorio , 3-carlos salcido , 14-gonzalo pineda ; 22-francisco rodriguez , 23-luis perez , 8-pavel pardo ; 17-jose fonseca , 19-omar bravo referee : lubos michel -lrb- slovakia -rrb- linesmen : roman slysko -lrb- slovakia -rrb- martin balko -lrb- slovakia -rrb- ira n -lrb- 4-4-1-1 -rrb- 1-ebrahim mirzapour ; 13-hosein kaebi , 5-rahman rezaei , 3-sohrab bakhtiarizadeh , 20-mohammad nosrati ; 2-mehdi mahdavikia , 7-ferydoon zandi , 21-mehrzad madanchi , 14-andranik taymoorian ; 9-vahid hashemian ; 10-ali daei coach : branko ivankovic a n gola -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- 1-joao ricardo ; 20-loco , 3-jamba , 5-kali , 21-delgado ; 17-ze kalanga , 6-miloy , 7-figueiredo , 11-mateus , 14-mendonca ; 10-akwa coach : luis oliveira goncalves referee : mark shield -lrb- australia -rrb- linesmen : nathan gibson -lrb- australia -rrb- , ben wilson -lrb- australia -rrb- kick off betwee n portugal a n d mexico 1. min .
mexico go on the attack from the start .
portugal are missing five of their top players including deco , pauletta and ronaldo 2. min .
mexico have a great chance to score but the portuguese keeper manages to keep the ball out .
4. min .
portugal have their first foray forward but mexico clear and send the ball downfield .
6. min .
goal ! ! ! !
maniche 's scores for portugal ..
6. min .
beautiful goal for portugal .
simao made a darting run on the left side and crossed the ball in the back of the mexican defense to set up maniche who slotted home from inside the box .
no chance for sanchez in the mexican goal .
8. min .
portugal are on top now .
mexico shocked by the early goal .
they need at least a draw to be sure of qualifying for the next round .
10. min .
portugal are passing the ball around in defense waiting for their opportunity to go forward .
mexico are clearly stunned .
12. min .
portugal play a ball into the box after some neat passing play around the area but mexico clear the danger .
13. min .
a tactical game at the moment with both sides giving each other lots of space to pass the ball 15. min .
fifteen minutes gone and the fast and furious start has tailed off somewhat .
portugal happy with their lead and mexico trying to get back in the game .
17. min .
mexico float a ball into the box but it 's easily cleared .
18. min .
mexico are going nowhere .
long balls from the back are easily tackled by the solid portuguese defense .
20. min .
figo gains a corner and takes it himself .
the ball comes back to the midfielder who darts into the box but his cross is caught by sanchez .
21. min .
yellow for francisco rodriguez maniche makes a run deep into the mexican half and is brought down on the edge of the box by rodriguez .
23. min .
the free kick is driven straight into the wall and goes out for corner for portugal .
23. min .
penalty for portugal penalty for a handball in the box by marquez 24. min .
goal for portugal simao scores from the penalty spot with a powerful and well placed strike .
25. min .
portugal are cruising now .
two goals up after 25 minutes with five top players out and mexico now have to have an eye on the game between iran and angola .
27. min .
portugal almost go three up .
postiga heads towards goal and his shot is saved and bounces into the path of tiago but he ca n't get over the ball and it flies over the bar .
29. min .
ricardo makes a great save for portugal after bravo latches on the end of a cross .
portugal lucky not to have conceded a goal .
30. min .
goal for mexico fonseca jumps unchallenged in the box and heads home for mexico from a corner .
what a game now ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! 32. min .
the game is really open now .
portugal were cruising but mexico kept battling and are now on the attack again but it comes to nothing .
34. min .
miguel dances into the box and almost gets past his man but it 's cleared for a corner and mexico head out and play the ball downfield .
37. min .
the game has dropped in pace slightly after the past few minutes of end to end action .
38. min .
free-kick from simao low and hard into the box but mexico 's salcido clears for a corner .
39. min .
fonseca is free in the box and heads towards goal but he 's ruled offside .
40. min .
mexico need another goal to book their place in the next round .
and at the moment it could go either way with both teams playing flowing , attacking football .
41. min .
miguel drives into the mexican half and plays a lovely crossfield pass to figo .
the captain supplies tiago who blasts towards goal but hits a mexican defender .
43. min .
maniche tries a long-range shot from 35 meters but no problem for sanchez .
44. min .
wonderful strike from pardo from outside the box draws great save from ricardo .
45. min .
mexico almost grab the equalizer as fonseca tries to get on the end of a cross but clatters into ricardo who needs treatment .
45 + 1. min .
portugal are riding their luck at the moment and are fortunate to still be ahead .
ricardo is back on his feet for portugal .
45 + 1. min .
one minute of stoppage time to be played .
45 + 2. min .
half time half time in gelsenkirchen after a highly entertaining and exhilarating 45 minutes .
portugal deservedly took the lead through maniche and doubled it with simao 's penalty .
mexico took a long time to recover from the shock but clawed a goal back through fonseca and were unlucky not to have equalized before the break .
we can look forward to an entertaining second half as mexico go in search of that all important goal .
46. min .
second half kicks off 47. min .
mexico start the second knowing they need a goal to be safe .
49. min .
mexico are pushing forward looking for a goal but portugal remain solid at the back and clear the danger .
50. min .
fonseca almost through on the edge of the box but could n't control the ball .
51. min .
fonseca is everywhere at the moment and gains a free kick for mexico 40 meters out 52. min .
petit fires the ball in and it whizzes just past the post for a portugal goal kick .
53. min .
portugal have control of the ball now and attempt their first real attack of the second half .
but mexico are defending well .
55. min .
fonseca has a shot on goal from the edge of the box after a lovely lay-off from bravo but it is easily saved by ricardo .
57. min .
penalty for mexico penalty for mexico after perez is brought down in the box 58. min .
penalty missed bravo 's penalty goes high and wide and portugal count themselves lucky .
60. min .
mexico have gotten over the missed penalty and are pushing forward for the equalizer .
60. min .
perez sent off ! !
perez is sent off for diving in the box after the whole stadium thought mexico had been awarded another penalty .
mexico are down to ten men and have an uphill battle now .
63. min .
mexico are still in control of the game and bravo misses a golden opportunity with only the keeper to beat as mexico break the offside trap .
65. min .
mexico deserve to be on level terms now but they have simply not taken their chances .
66. min .
tiago has a shot on goal from outside the box but his shot goes left and wide . 68. min .
angola have taken the lead against iran and mexico are now level on points with the africans but just ahead on goal difference 70. min .
substitutio n nuno gomes comes on for postiga 71. min .
substitio n castro comes on for pineda for mexico 72. min .
substitute gomes almost scores for portugal but blasts the ball over the bar from five meters out .
74. min .
mexico are still pushing forward knowing that angola are leading and breathing down their necks .
75. min .
mendez wins a corner for mexico but the ball is cleared .
ten men mexico definitely have the upper hand but ca n't manage to score and risk leaving themselves open at the back .
77. min .
portugal are really taking their time on free kicks much to the dislike of the mexican fans in the stadium .
79. min .
mexico are throwing everything forward now but with a man down they are finding the going tough against a strong portuguese defense .
80. min .
portugal substitution figo is substituted for luis boa morte 82. min .
iran have equalized against angola which means that mexico can breathe easy again .
as things stand they are through behind portugal .
83. min .
marquez crashes into his own goalkeeper as he clears a square ball across the box .
sanchez needs treatment but is back on his feet .
85. min .
mexico are starting to look tired safe in the knowledge that they are probably through to the next round .
86. min .
portugal are passing the ball around in defense playing down the remaining minutes but mexico are still fighting for the equalizer 88. min .
boa morte yellow card boa morte is carded by the referee 89. min .
mexico free kick flashes across goal but no-one there to put it in .
90. min .
as the game enters stoppage time mexico continue to attack in search of the goal they deserve after fine play in the second half .
90 + 2. min .
3 minutes of stoppage time added .
90 + 3. min .
full time in gelsenkirchen portugal hang on for a narrow victory portugal manage to hang on against a brave ten man mexico , which missed a penalty and a number of other fantastic opportunities to score and are made to pay for those squandered chances .
but despite the loss the mexicans are though to the next round along with group winners portugal . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 04.07.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 21.06.2006 no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : juan riquelme , right , and kew jaliens go for the ball two-time world cup winners argentina reached a goalless draw with the netherlands to finish top of group c in a tight , furiously-paced game in frankfurt on wednesday . the dutch team , who like the argentines posted two victories over group rivals serbia and montenegro and ivory coast , finished in second place on goal difference and will play group d winners portugal in nuremberg on sunday .
the argentines will meet mexico in leipzig in the second round on saturday . argentina had a raft of chances throughout the match , and dutch coach marco van basten had two fine first-half clearances by defender khalid boulahrouz and one outstanding save late in the game by edwin van der sar to thank for a clean sheet . messi , tevez create havoc argentine strikers lionel messi and carlos tevez , along with midfield duo maxi rodriguez and juan riquelme , caused havoc in the dutch defense early on with their tight combinations of fast , accurate passing and blistering counter-attacking speed . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : netherlands ' khalid boulahrouz , left , and argentina 's lionel messi challenge for the ball teenage sensation messi made his mark in the eighth minute , playing a dangerous through ball into the area , which boulahrouz just managed to get his foot to ahead of the onrushing esteban cambiasso and nicolas burdisso . man-of-the-match tevez had a chance just after the quarter-hour , turning inside phillip cocu and unleashing a powerful left-footed shot just past the outside post of captain van der sar , who was winning his 112th cap to draw level on all-time appearances for the oranje with frank de boer . the netherlands ' best chance came a minute later , but dirk kuyt drilled a shot just wide . van der sar was then called into action in the 27th minute to punch away a swerving riquelme corner . from the ensuing corner kuyt brought down tevez on the edge of the box and the dutch fans had the imposing 1.91m frame of boulahrouz to thank again as he lunged to fend off the free-kick from tevez 's feet onto the post and away .
rodriguez then watched in agony as his blistering half-volley beat van der sar but drifted late and shaved off the post . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : flying van der sar saved the day for the dutch on the stroke of half-time , van der sar saved a messi shot after the barcelona striker was allowed far too much time in front of goal . the second-half started with riquleme taking advantage of the dutch defense standing off to fire a shot that narrowly missed goal , and rodriguez following up shortly after with a shot that flew high . van der sar saves the day but the dutch did manage to clamp down on the argentineans , wesley sneijder and cocu - winning his 100th cap - dropping into deeper positions to nullify the threat of the free-running tevez . but the netherlands were obviously lacking the creative spark provided by the rested arjen robben , giovanni van bronkhorst and mark van bommel . that said , the dutch pressure almost paid off in the 67th minute , cocu going close after good work by rafael van der vart .
with messi and riquelme both replaced by coach jose pekerman , the game fizzled out somewhat and swung towards the dutch . but it was fittingly left to the record-equaling van der sar to save the day for the dutch , defying his 35 years to superbly palm away a great strike by tevez in the 73rd minute . the oranje army again invaded frankfurt for the match with airlines in the netherlands laying on 32 flights to the german city on wednesday . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : oranje fans were out in full force officially only 6,200 fans came with a ticket but it was estimated that 25,000 fans would be in the 48,000-seater stadium and up to 40,000 more in the city . there was also a sizeable number of argentine supporters , many sporting the no. 10 shirt favored by diego maradona , with flags and scarves tied to their wrists .
maradona himself was seen in the stands along with his daughter , passionately cheering on the argentine side . the elephants claw back the other " group of death " game saw a spirited ivory coast coming from behind to beat serbia & montenegro 3-2 .
the elephants fought back from two goals down to clinch their first world cup win in an entertaining and fiercely-fought battle on wednesday in munich , played in pouring rain , to avoid ending bottom of group c. despite being eliminated from the world cup , both heavily-changed teams went at it hammer and tongs from the start before a capacity 66,000 crowd in a bid to restore their pride .
although ivory coast had the best of the play in the first ten minutes , their trio of newcomers at the back were caught out by long high balls from serbia and montenegro 's . serbia , seeking self-respect after a 6-0 drubbing by argentina , took the lead in the 10th minute with striker nikola zigic slotting in the ball after a long pass by dejan stankovic .
they built up on the result in the 19th minute after a botched clearance by ivory coast stand-in captain cyrille domoraud was seized by sasa ilic . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ivory coast players celebrate after their third goal the ivorians however made up in the 36th minute with arune dindane neatly netting a twice-taken penalty .
the strengthened ivorians dominated in the second half and dindane once again showed his class by heading in a kader keita cross in the 67th minute . the ivorians were n't finished as yet when kalou stepped up to score and seal a historic victory for ivory coast . dw staff / afp -lrb- sp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de argentina beat up serbia and montenegro argentina proved why some consider them a world cup title contender , displaying their speed and precision passing in a 6-0 rout of their group c opponents .
-lrb- june 20 , 2006 -rrb- dutch victory breaks hearts in ivory coast with everything at stake in the " group of death , " the ivory coast gave the holland a run for their money throughout a pulsating match that saw seven yellow cards before ending 2-1 in the netherlands ' favor .
-lrb- june 16 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands review all the action from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker 9800 picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures a nation expects dw-world.de presents germany 's 2006 world cup squad .

no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 31.10.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 21.06.2006 no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : juan riquelme , right , and kew jaliens go for the ball two-time world cup winners argentina reached a goalless draw with the netherlands to finish top of group c in a tight , furiously-paced game in frankfurt on wednesday . the dutch team , who like the argentines posted two victories over group rivals serbia and montenegro and ivory coast , finished in second place on goal difference and will play group d winners portugal in nuremberg on sunday .
the argentines will meet mexico in leipzig in the second round on saturday . argentina had a raft of chances throughout the match , and dutch coach marco van basten had two fine first-half clearances by defender khalid boulahrouz and one outstanding save late in the game by edwin van der sar to thank for a clean sheet . messi , tevez create havoc argentine strikers lionel messi and carlos tevez , along with midfield duo maxi rodriguez and juan riquelme , caused havoc in the dutch defense early on with their tight combinations of fast , accurate passing and blistering counter-attacking speed . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : netherlands ' khalid boulahrouz , left , and argentina 's lionel messi challenge for the ball teenage sensation messi made his mark in the eighth minute , playing a dangerous through ball into the area , which boulahrouz just managed to get his foot to ahead of the onrushing esteban cambiasso and nicolas burdisso . man-of-the-match tevez had a chance just after the quarter-hour , turning inside phillip cocu and unleashing a powerful left-footed shot just past the outside post of captain van der sar , who was winning his 112th cap to draw level on all-time appearances for the oranje with frank de boer . the netherlands ' best chance came a minute later , but dirk kuyt drilled a shot just wide . van der sar was then called into action in the 27th minute to punch away a swerving riquelme corner . from the ensuing corner kuyt brought down tevez on the edge of the box and the dutch fans had the imposing 1.91m frame of boulahrouz to thank again as he lunged to fend off the free-kick from tevez 's feet onto the post and away .
rodriguez then watched in agony as his blistering half-volley beat van der sar but drifted late and shaved off the post . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : flying van der sar saved the day for the dutch on the stroke of half-time , van der sar saved a messi shot after the barcelona striker was allowed far too much time in front of goal . the second-half started with riquleme taking advantage of the dutch defense standing off to fire a shot that narrowly missed goal , and rodriguez following up shortly after with a shot that flew high . van der sar saves the day but the dutch did manage to clamp down on the argentineans , wesley sneijder and cocu - winning his 100th cap - dropping into deeper positions to nullify the threat of the free-running tevez . but the netherlands were obviously lacking the creative spark provided by the rested arjen robben , giovanni van bronkhorst and mark van bommel . that said , the dutch pressure almost paid off in the 67th minute , cocu going close after good work by rafael van der vart .
with messi and riquelme both replaced by coach jose pekerman , the game fizzled out somewhat and swung towards the dutch . but it was fittingly left to the record-equaling van der sar to save the day for the dutch , defying his 35 years to superbly palm away a great strike by tevez in the 73rd minute . the oranje army again invaded frankfurt for the match with airlines in the netherlands laying on 32 flights to the german city on wednesday . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : oranje fans were out in full force officially only 6,200 fans came with a ticket but it was estimated that 25,000 fans would be in the 48,000-seater stadium and up to 40,000 more in the city . there was also a sizeable number of argentine supporters , many sporting the no. 10 shirt favored by diego maradona , with flags and scarves tied to their wrists .
maradona himself was seen in the stands along with his daughter , passionately cheering on the argentine side . the elephants claw back the other " group of death " game saw a spirited ivory coast coming from behind to beat serbia & montenegro 3-2 .
the elephants fought back from two goals down to clinch their first world cup win in an entertaining and fiercely-fought battle on wednesday in munich , played in pouring rain , to avoid ending bottom of group c. despite being eliminated from the world cup , both heavily-changed teams went at it hammer and tongs from the start before a capacity 66,000 crowd in a bid to restore their pride .
although ivory coast had the best of the play in the first ten minutes , their trio of newcomers at the back were caught out by long high balls from serbia and montenegro 's . serbia , seeking self-respect after a 6-0 drubbing by argentina , took the lead in the 10th minute with striker nikola zigic slotting in the ball after a long pass by dejan stankovic .
they built up on the result in the 19th minute after a botched clearance by ivory coast stand-in captain cyrille domoraud was seized by sasa ilic . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ivory coast players celebrate after their third goal the ivorians however made up in the 36th minute with arune dindane neatly netting a twice-taken penalty .
the strengthened ivorians dominated in the second half and dindane once again showed his class by heading in a kader keita cross in the 67th minute . the ivorians were n't finished as yet when kalou stepped up to score and seal a historic victory for ivory coast . dw staff / afp -lrb- sp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de argentina beat up serbia and montenegro argentina proved why some consider them a world cup title contender , displaying their speed and precision passing in a 6-0 rout of their group c opponents .
-lrb- june 20 , 2006 -rrb- dutch victory breaks hearts in ivory coast with everything at stake in the " group of death , " the ivory coast gave the holland a run for their money throughout a pulsating match that saw seven yellow cards before ending 2-1 in the netherlands ' favor .

live ticker : portugal 2:1 mexico -pipe- news -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 05.05.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de news -pipe- 21.06.2006 live ticker : portugal 2:1 mexico review all the details with the dw-world.de live ticker . fi n al group d matches portgual vs mexico a n d a n gola vs ira n portugal 2:1 mexico team li n e-ups portugal -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- 1-ricardo ; 13-miguel , 16-ricardo carvalho , 5-fernando meira , 3-marco caneira ; 8-armando petit , 18-maniche , 19-tiago , 7-luis figo , 11-simao sabrosa ; 23-helder postiga mexico -lrb- 5-3-2 -rrb- 1-oswaldo sanchez ; 16-mario mendez , 4-rafael marquez , 5-ricardo osorio , 3-carlos salcido , 14-gonzalo pineda ; 22-francisco rodriguez , 23-luis perez , 8-pavel pardo ; 17-jose fonseca , 19-omar bravo referee : lubos michel -lrb- slovakia -rrb- linesmen : roman slysko -lrb- slovakia -rrb- martin balko -lrb- slovakia -rrb- ira n -lrb- 4-4-1-1 -rrb- 1-ebrahim mirzapour ; 13-hosein kaebi , 5-rahman rezaei , 3-sohrab bakhtiarizadeh , 20-mohammad nosrati ; 2-mehdi mahdavikia , 7-ferydoon zandi , 21-mehrzad madanchi , 14-andranik taymoorian ; 9-vahid hashemian ; 10-ali daei coach : branko ivankovic a n gola -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- 1-joao ricardo ; 20-loco , 3-jamba , 5-kali , 21-delgado ; 17-ze kalanga , 6-miloy , 7-figueiredo , 11-mateus , 14-mendonca ; 10-akwa coach : luis oliveira goncalves referee : mark shield -lrb- australia -rrb- linesmen : nathan gibson -lrb- australia -rrb- , ben wilson -lrb- australia -rrb- kick off betwee n portugal a n d mexico 1. min .
mexico go on the attack from the start .
portugal are missing five of their top players including deco , pauletta and ronaldo 2. min .
mexico have a great chance to score but the portuguese keeper manages to keep the ball out .
4. min .
portugal have their first foray forward but mexico clear and send the ball downfield .
6. min .
goal ! ! ! !
maniche 's scores for portugal ..
6. min .
beautiful goal for portugal .
simao made a darting run on the left side and crossed the ball in the back of the mexican defense to set up maniche who slotted home from inside the box .
no chance for sanchez in the mexican goal .
8. min .
portugal are on top now .
mexico shocked by the early goal .
they need at least a draw to be sure of qualifying for the next round .
10. min .
portugal are passing the ball around in defense waiting for their opportunity to go forward .
mexico are clearly stunned .
12. min .
portugal play a ball into the box after some neat passing play around the area but mexico clear the danger .
13. min .
a tactical game at the moment with both sides giving each other lots of space to pass the ball 15. min .
fifteen minutes gone and the fast and furious start has tailed off somewhat .
portugal happy with their lead and mexico trying to get back in the game .
17. min .
mexico float a ball into the box but it 's easily cleared .
18. min .
mexico are going nowhere .
long balls from the back are easily tackled by the solid portuguese defense .
20. min .
figo gains a corner and takes it himself .
the ball comes back to the midfielder who darts into the box but his cross is caught by sanchez .
21. min .
yellow for francisco rodriguez maniche makes a run deep into the mexican half and is brought down on the edge of the box by rodriguez .
23. min .
the free kick is driven straight into the wall and goes out for corner for portugal .
23. min .
penalty for portugal penalty for a handball in the box by marquez 24. min .
goal for portugal simao scores from the penalty spot with a powerful and well placed strike .
25. min .
portugal are cruising now .
two goals up after 25 minutes with five top players out and mexico now have to have an eye on the game between iran and angola .
27. min .
portugal almost go three up .
postiga heads towards goal and his shot is saved and bounces into the path of tiago but he ca n't get over the ball and it flies over the bar .
29. min .
ricardo makes a great save for portugal after bravo latches on the end of a cross .
portugal lucky not to have conceded a goal .
30. min .
goal for mexico fonseca jumps unchallenged in the box and heads home for mexico from a corner .
what a game now ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! 32. min .
the game is really open now .
portugal were cruising but mexico kept battling and are now on the attack again but it comes to nothing .
34. min .
miguel dances into the box and almost gets past his man but it 's cleared for a corner and mexico head out and play the ball downfield .
37. min .
the game has dropped in pace slightly after the past few minutes of end to end action .
38. min .
free-kick from simao low and hard into the box but mexico 's salcido clears for a corner .
39. min .
fonseca is free in the box and heads towards goal but he 's ruled offside .
40. min .
mexico need another goal to book their place in the next round .
and at the moment it could go either way with both teams playing flowing , attacking football .
41. min .
miguel drives into the mexican half and plays a lovely crossfield pass to figo .
the captain supplies tiago who blasts towards goal but hits a mexican defender .
43. min .
maniche tries a long-range shot from 35 meters but no problem for sanchez .
44. min .
wonderful strike from pardo from outside the box draws great save from ricardo .
45. min .
mexico almost grab the equalizer as fonseca tries to get on the end of a cross but clatters into ricardo who needs treatment .
45 + 1. min .
portugal are riding their luck at the moment and are fortunate to still be ahead .
ricardo is back on his feet for portugal .
45 + 1. min .
one minute of stoppage time to be played .
45 + 2. min .
half time half time in gelsenkirchen after a highly entertaining and exhilarating 45 minutes .
portugal deservedly took the lead through maniche and doubled it with simao 's penalty .
mexico took a long time to recover from the shock but clawed a goal back through fonseca and were unlucky not to have equalized before the break .
we can look forward to an entertaining second half as mexico go in search of that all important goal .
46. min .
second half kicks off 47. min .
mexico start the second knowing they need a goal to be safe .
49. min .
mexico are pushing forward looking for a goal but portugal remain solid at the back and clear the danger .
50. min .
fonseca almost through on the edge of the box but could n't control the ball .
51. min .

petit fires the ball in and it whizzes just past the post for a portugal goal kick .
53. min .
portugal have control of the ball now and attempt their first real attack of the second half .
but mexico are defending well .
55. min .
fonseca has a shot on goal from the edge of the box after a lovely lay-off from bravo but it is easily saved by ricardo .
57. min .
penalty for mexico penalty for mexico after perez is brought down in the box 58. min .
penalty missed bravo 's penalty goes high and wide and portugal count themselves lucky .
60. min .
mexico have gotten over the missed penalty and are pushing forward for the equalizer .
60. min .
perez sent off ! !
perez is sent off for diving in the box after the whole stadium thought mexico had been awarded another penalty .
mexico are down to ten men and have an uphill battle now .
63. min .
mexico are still in control of the game and bravo misses a golden opportunity with only the keeper to beat as mexico break the offside trap .
65. min .
mexico deserve to be on level terms now but they have simply not taken their chances .
66. min .
tiago has a shot on goal from outside the box but his shot goes left and wide . 68. min .
angola have taken the lead against iran and mexico are now level on points with the africans but just ahead on goal difference 70. min .
substitutio n nuno gomes comes on for postiga 71. min .
substitio n castro comes on for pineda for mexico 72. min .
substitute gomes almost scores for portugal but blasts the ball over the bar from five meters out .
74. min .
mexico are still pushing forward knowing that angola are leading and breathing down their necks .
75. min .
mendez wins a corner for mexico but the ball is cleared .
ten men mexico definitely have the upper hand but ca n't manage to score and risk leaving themselves open at the back .
77. min .
portugal are really taking their time on free kicks much to the dislike of the mexican fans in the stadium .
79. min .
mexico are throwing everything forward now but with a man down they are finding the going tough against a strong portuguese defense .
80. min .
portugal substitution figo is substituted for luis boa morte 82. min .
iran have equalized against angola which means that mexico can breathe easy again .
as things stand they are through behind portugal .
83. min .

sanchez needs treatment but is back on his feet .
85. min .
mexico are starting to look tired safe in the knowledge that they are probably through to the next round .
86. min .
portugal are passing the ball around in defense playing down the remaining minutes but mexico are still fighting for the equalizer 88. min .
boa morte yellow card boa morte is carded by the referee 89. min .
mexico free kick flashes across goal but no-one there to put it in .
90. min .
as the game enters stoppage time mexico continue to attack in search of the goal they deserve after fine play in the second half .
90 + 2. min .
3 minutes of stoppage time added .
90 + 3. min .
full time in gelsenkirchen portugal hang on for a narrow victory portugal manage to hang on against a brave ten man mexico , which missed a penalty and a number of other fantastic opportunities to score and are made to pay for those squandered chances .
but despite the loss the mexicans are though to the next round along with group winners portugal . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic 9800 radio news listen to world headlines from the top of the hour dw-world.de check out our latest interactive web features dw screensaver social bookmarking our rss feeds dw widgets integrated search dw on facebook newsletters netvibes.com the way you want it mobile optimized for pdas newsletters news in your inbox audio / video podcasts © dw 2011 deutsche welle is not responsible for the content of external websites .

kick-off in frankfurt the dutch have made five changes due to yellow cards picked up in the fist two games .
argentina have also 5 different players on the pitch including the teenage sensation lionel messi .
2. min .
the dutch go on the attack .
van nistelroy is penalized for pushing an opponent .
3. min .
netherlands take control early on but argentina defend well and keep the dutch out .
5. min .
first corner of the game for argentina .
riquelme supplies the cross and van persie clears for another corner .
6. min. van der sar easily deals with the corner and sets up an attack. van nistelroy fails to make the most of it and it goes out for goal kick .
8. min .
messi plays a wonderful through ball to cambiasso and boulahrouz makes a last second stretch to clear for a corner .
10. min .
the game is being played in midfield at the moment as both teams try to build up attacks but as yet to no avail .
12. min .
first corner for holland. van persie takes it but blown for a foul by a dutch player .
15. min .
quarter of an hour played and not much goal mouth action to speak of .
a pretty slow start to the game .
17. min .
argentina string a number of passes together and tevez 's shot from outside the box goes wide of the post .
messi involved in the attack much to the delight of the argentina fans .
18. min .
holland have their first shot on goal .
well saved by abbondanzieri .
serbia and montenegro 1 zigic pute serbia and montenegro in the lead on 10 minutes .
21. min .
the dutch have control of the ball in midfield but still ca n't find that killer pass to split the argentina defense .
23. min .

27. min .

28. min .

28. min .
argentina hit the post off riquelme 's low free kick into the box .
29. min .
rodriguez blasts a shot from outside the box and misses by only centimeters .
argentina are in control and look like scoring .
serbia and montenegro 2 goal from sasa ilic on 20 minutes 32. min .

45. min .

messi shoots from outside the box. van der saar makes a good save .
half time in frankfurt half time in the game between the netherlands and argentina .
the dutch put in a disciplined performance and defended well against the skillful argentineans .
tevez in particular troubled the dutch defense and messi showed glimpses of his great skill .
we can look forward to an interesting second half as both teams go looking for the win .

second half kicks off second half kicks off in frankfurt .

62. min .

67. min .

69. min .

70. min .

71. min .

the dutch are happy to stay on level terms and argentina are looking forward to the next round .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane levels for ivory coast in 67th minute 73. min .
tevez draws a great save from van der saar 76. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez outside the box .
his shot is blocked .
78. min .
holland are defending in numbers trying to shut down the argentineans .
79. min .
de kler floats a cross in from the left .
foul called on babel .
80. min .
argentina substitution aimar is brought on to replace riquelme .
81. min .
both teams seem to have settled for a draw as we head into the final ten minutes .
84. min .
holland have more control of the ball but lack the drive to go forward .
85. min .
van der vaart tries another free-kick but once again he shoots wide of the goal .
88. min .
a cross into the argentina box misses the dutch and argentina stay on level terms .
90. min .
corner for holland is cleared well by argentina .
90. min .
yellow card yellow card for mascherano serbia and montenegro 2 kalou puts ivory coast ahead 90 + 2. min .
tevez almost breaks the deadlock but his shot goes over the bar in the dying seconds of the game .
full time in frankfurt the netherlands hold argentina to a goalless draw in a tactical game by two of the tournament 's top teams .
argentina had most of the play and the better chances but could n't make the most of their superiority .
the dutch will be happy not to have lost and look forward to their clash against portugal .
argentina now face mexico .

kick-off in frankfurt the dutch have made five changes due to yellow cards picked up in the fist two games .
argentina have also 5 different players on the pitch including the teenage sensation lionel messi .
2. min .
the dutch go on the attack .
van nistelroy is penalized for pushing an opponent .
3. min .
netherlands take control early on but argentina defend well and keep the dutch out .
5. min .
first corner of the game for argentina .
riquelme supplies the cross and van persie clears for another corner .
6. min. van der sar easily deals with the corner and sets up an attack. van nistelroy fails to make the most of it and it goes out for goal kick .
8. min .
messi plays a wonderful through ball to cambiasso and boulahrouz makes a last second stretch to clear for a corner .
10. min .
the game is being played in midfield at the moment as both teams try to build up attacks but as yet to no avail .
12. min .
first corner for holland. van persie takes it but blown for a foul by a dutch player .
15. min .
quarter of an hour played and not much goal mouth action to speak of .
a pretty slow start to the game .
17. min .
argentina string a number of passes together and tevez 's shot from outside the box goes wide of the post .
messi involved in the attack much to the delight of the argentina fans .
18. min .
holland have their first shot on goal .
well saved by abbondanzieri .
serbia and montenegro 1 zigic pute serbia and montenegro in the lead on 10 minutes .
21. min .
the dutch have control of the ball in midfield but still ca n't find that killer pass to split the argentina defense .
23. min .
argentina look more dangerous than the dutch going forward but still ca n't find a way through 24. min .
argentina substitution coloccini is on for burdisso after a knee injury 26. min .
tevez dribbles past two dutch defenders and wins a corner .
27. min .
riquleme fires in a bending shot from the corner and van der saar punches over the bar .
28. min .
yellow for kuyt kuyt is booked for pushing tevez as he makes another dazzling run .
28. min .
argentina hit the post off riquelme 's low free kick into the box .
29. min .
rodriguez blasts a shot from outside the box and misses by only centimeters .
argentina are in control and look like scoring .
serbia and montenegro 2 goal from sasa ilic on 20 minutes 32. min .
half an hour gone and argentina are dominating proceedings .
messi is in the thick of things seems to be relishing the opportunity to play a full game .
33. min .
argentina have another great chance but rodriguez shoots into the side netting from close range .
35. min .
sneijder has a crack from 35 meters out .
blocked by ayala .
36. min .
tevez wins argentina 's 7th corner as he takes on the dutch defense .
38. min .
the dutch have managed to slow the game down and gain more control .
40. min .
tevez wins another corner .
once again he takes on the dutch defense .
41. min .
messi tries a through ball into the box but tevez fails to read his intentions and van der saar claims it .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane scores on 36 minutes 42. min .
yellow card for ooijer ooijer gets booked for a tackle from behind on riquelme .
45. min .
one minute stoppage time added 45 + 1. min .
messi shoots from outside the box. van der saar makes a good save .
half time in frankfurt half time in the game between the netherlands and argentina .
the dutch put in a disciplined performance and defended well against the skillful argentineans .
tevez in particular troubled the dutch defense and messi showed glimpses of his great skill .
we can look forward to an interesting second half as both teams go looking for the win .
46. min .
second half kicks off second half kicks off in frankfurt .
47. min .
van persie takes a free kick from 35 meters out and blasts the ball high and wide into the stand .
48. min .
yellow for de kler dutch player de kler is carded for elbowing an opponent .
50. min .
a tactical game in the second half with tevez continuing to shine .
52. min .
kuyt floats a ball into the argentina box but well claimed by the keeper .
53. min .
messi and riquleme play a clever one-two to split open the dutch defense and riquelme 's shot goes just centimeters wide .
55. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez who shoots over the bar .
argentina are looking very dangerous and holland are struggling to keep them in check .
56. min .
dutch substitution babel is brought on to replace ruud van nistelroy .
57. min .
yellow card for cambiasso kuyt draws a foul 35 meters out and cambiasso is booked .
kuyt is holland 's most active player at the moment .
58. min .
van der vaart hits a poor free kick and draws jeers from the crowd .
60. min .
an hour gone and argentina still have the upper hand creating more chances and looking more likely to score but holland are defending well .
62. min .
the dutch have made a few poor passes at the back and handed the ball to argentina .
it could prove costly .
65. min .
riquelme takes on three dutch defenders and is barely stopped in the box .
65. min .
tevez tries an overhead kick in the box but fails to make proper contact .
67. min .
van der vaart makes a great run into the box and cocu 's shot is well blocked by abbondanzieri and pushed out for a corner .
holland 's best chance of the second half .
69. min .
cocu has another attempt on goal but his shot goes right and wide .
70. min .
nessi substituted cruz is brought on for messi who struggled in the second half against the strong dutch defense .
71. min .
the pace of the game has dropped considerably .
the dutch are happy to stay on level terms and argentina are looking forward to the next round .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane levels for ivory coast in 67th minute 73. min .

portugal sail to group d top spot with 2-1 win over mexico -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 05.07.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 21.06.2006 portugal sail to group d top spot with 2-1 win over mexico großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : portugal 's maniche , center , wins against mexican goalie oswaldo sanchez portugal beat mexico 2-1 wednesday to seal top spot in group d , while world cup debutant angola and iran reached a one-all draw in leipzig , bringing group d matches to an end . the results leave portugal top with nine points , mexico second with four , angola third with two and iran bottom with one . portugal took to the field in gelsenkirchen without some of their top names , including deco , christiano ronaldo and pauletta who were all rested because they had picked up yellow cards in the opening phase of the competition . but the portuguese got off to a dream start .
just six minutes into the game , maniche supplied simao sabrosa , who made a great run on the left and passed back to maniche who struck home from close range . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : mexico goalie oswaldo sanchez capitulates as portugal 's simao scores portugal then increased their lead after 24 minutes when mexico 's captain rafael marquez handled the ball in the area .
winger simao stepped up to blast the ball past mexican goalkeeper oswaldo sanchez and portugal were in control of the game . mexico knew they needed a draw to be absolutely sure of qualifying for the next round and pulled one back five minutes later when man of the match fonseca headed home from a pavel pardo corner .
fonseca nearly drew the sides level six minutes before the break when he latched on the end of an omar branco cross , but his header went just wide of the post . portugal battles ten-men mexico after the break , mexico kept up the pressure , with fonseca involved in most of the action .
on 56 minutes bravo got on the end of a pardo cross and slid the ball to fonseca but the shot was too weak to get past ricardo . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : a mexican fan in gelsenkirchen just a minute later mexico had their best chance to level the game when they were awarded a penalty after miguel handled the ball in the box .
but bravo blasted the ball high into the crowd . things then went from bad to worse for mexico when luis perez was sent off in the 61st minute for a second yellow card after he was judged to have dived in the box in search of a penalty . down to ten men , mexico kept up the pressure for the remaining half hour and bravo 's miserable afternoon continued as he raced into the box in the 64th minute and then blasted the ball into the stand from 12 meters out . try as they might mexico simply could n't find the back of the net and as news came in from leipzig that angola were being held to a draw , the mexicans switched down a gear . all in all , an entertaining match and now both sides can look forward to a mouth-watering next round game against either the netherlands or on form argentina . it was a 10th successive victory for portugal coach luiz felipe scolari , who led brazil to world cup glory four years ago with seven straight wins . " ten wins in the world cup is the kind of thing that would mark anybody 's life , especially mine , " the brazilian said . iran hold angola to draw to end world cup dreams in the group 's other game , iran dominated the first half against angola who needed a win and help from portugal to have any chance of progressing to the next round . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : angola 's akwa in a duel for the ball with iran 's sohrab bakhtiarizadeh angola took the lead in the 60th minute through flavio and with portugal ahead against mexico only goal difference separated them from a place in the round of the last sixteen . but iranian defender sohrab bakhtiarizadeh headed firmly home in the 75th minute to seal the draw and end angola 's hopes . dw staff -lrb- jm -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de deco and ronaldo break iran 's resolve as portugal win 2-0 portugal qualified for the world cup knock-out stages for the first time in 40 years on saturday with a 2-0 win over iran .
goals from cristiano ronaldo and deco sealed the victory .
-lrb- june 17 , 2006 -rrb- world cup 2006 click here for dw-world.de 's complete world cup coverage live ticker : portugal 2:1 mexico review all the action from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker 9800 picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures a nation expects dw-world.de presents germany 's 2006 world cup squad .

portugal sail to group d top spot with 2-1 win over mexico -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 28.09.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 21.06.2006 portugal sail to group d top spot with 2-1 win over mexico großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : portugal 's maniche , center , wins against mexican goalie oswaldo sanchez portugal beat mexico 2-1 wednesday to seal top spot in group d , while world cup debutant angola and iran reached a one-all draw in leipzig , bringing group d matches to an end . the results leave portugal top with nine points , mexico second with four , angola third with two and iran bottom with one . portugal took to the field in gelsenkirchen without some of their top names , including deco , christiano ronaldo and pauletta who were all rested because they had picked up yellow cards in the opening phase of the competition . but the portuguese got off to a dream start .
just six minutes into the game , maniche supplied simao sabrosa , who made a great run on the left and passed back to maniche who struck home from close range . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : mexico goalie oswaldo sanchez capitulates as portugal 's simao scores portugal then increased their lead after 24 minutes when mexico 's captain rafael marquez handled the ball in the area .
winger simao stepped up to blast the ball past mexican goalkeeper oswaldo sanchez and portugal were in control of the game . mexico knew they needed a draw to be absolutely sure of qualifying for the next round and pulled one back five minutes later when man of the match fonseca headed home from a pavel pardo corner .
fonseca nearly drew the sides level six minutes before the break when he latched on the end of an omar branco cross , but his header went just wide of the post . portugal battles ten-men mexico after the break , mexico kept up the pressure , with fonseca involved in most of the action .
on 56 minutes bravo got on the end of a pardo cross and slid the ball to fonseca but the shot was too weak to get past ricardo . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : a mexican fan in gelsenkirchen just a minute later mexico had their best chance to level the game when they were awarded a penalty after miguel handled the ball in the box .
but bravo blasted the ball high into the crowd . things then went from bad to worse for mexico when luis perez was sent off in the 61st minute for a second yellow card after he was judged to have dived in the box in search of a penalty . down to ten men , mexico kept up the pressure for the remaining half hour and bravo 's miserable afternoon continued as he raced into the box in the 64th minute and then blasted the ball into the stand from 12 meters out . try as they might mexico simply could n't find the back of the net and as news came in from leipzig that angola were being held to a draw , the mexicans switched down a gear . all in all , an entertaining match and now both sides can look forward to a mouth-watering next round game against either the netherlands or on form argentina . it was a 10th successive victory for portugal coach luiz felipe scolari , who led brazil to world cup glory four years ago with seven straight wins . " ten wins in the world cup is the kind of thing that would mark anybody 's life , especially mine , " the brazilian said . iran hold angola to draw to end world cup dreams in the group 's other game , iran dominated the first half against angola who needed a win and help from portugal to have any chance of progressing to the next round . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : angola 's akwa in a duel for the ball with iran 's sohrab bakhtiarizadeh angola took the lead in the 60th minute through flavio and with portugal ahead against mexico only goal difference separated them from a place in the round of the last sixteen . but iranian defender sohrab bakhtiarizadeh headed firmly home in the 75th minute to seal the draw and end angola 's hopes . dw staff -lrb- jm -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de deco and ronaldo break iran 's resolve as portugal win 2-0 portugal qualified for the world cup knock-out stages for the first time in 40 years on saturday with a 2-0 win over iran .
goals from cristiano ronaldo and deco sealed the victory .
-lrb- june 17 , 2006 -rrb- world cup 2006 click here for dw-world.de 's complete world cup coverage live ticker : portugal 2:1 mexico review all the action from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands -pipe- news -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 02.04.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
