germany 's imperial frequent flyer -pipe- news -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 21.06.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de in focus : offsides from the fringe when baring it all is not enough world cup host city residents told to behave germany 's mascots play the shame game could goleo 's musical career spell the end for pille ? news -pipe- 21.06.2006 germany 's imperial frequent flyer großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : is germany 's beloved kaiser from outer space ?
is german soccer legend franz beckenbauer really a human being ?
or is he merely a science fiction invention ?
he does seem capable of beaming himself to different galaxies at the speed of light . sweating at home in front of the tv set watching a world cup game has at least one advantage over sweating collectively at the stadium : you actually get to see more .
after trying to lip-read the obscenities a player is throwing at the referee , you can compare your own beer belly with a horde of face-painted , shirtless soccer freaks .
and still , only a few seconds later , you can hang out with the spanish royal couple or the otherwise sleepy german chancellor trying to get in touch with her inner beast . as you move from game to game and from city to city , you also get to admire one world cup attendee , for whom defying the laws of physics is turning into a favorite pastime .
franz beckenbauer , german soccer legend and president of the soccer championship organizing committee , is the only world cup celebrity that seems capable of being at different places at the same time .
you can see him in almost every city , at almost every game .
the man is a genius . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : beckenbauer 's bavarian star trek friends so how does he do it ?
is he in possession of an intergalactic star trek beamer ?
did he hire an army of look-alikes ?
or does he have an exclusive deal with overbearing magician david copperfield ? apparently , not .
in-between games , beckenbauer - whose popular teutonic nickname is " kaiser " -lrb- emperor -rrb- - gets to do what most soccer fans would be too drunk to even contemplate at the end of a match .
he hops on augusta 109 , his regally named helicopter , and flies off to wherever his cosmopolitan heart may take him .
hasta la vista , gelsenkirchen !
konichiwa , hamburg ! everywhere you turn the sun-tanned , gray-haired bavarian " emperor " feels to most germans like a friend of the family , not only because he bears visual and dialectological resemblance to bavarian folksy prime minister stoiber , but also because he is no stranger to advertising gigs . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : bavarian prime minister stoiber -lrb- or a franz beckenbauer look-alike ? -rrb-
one of his most prolific campaigns has been for a german cell phone provider known for expensive-looking and alluring celebrity ads .
german couch potatoes who have a profound relationship with their remote controls have discovered that there are days on which they can start watching a beckenbauer commercial on one channel , switch to the middle of it on a different channel , and still make it to grand finale on a third . along with veronica ferres - a blond german actress with the spanish sounding name - and anna netrebko - a russian opera diva with the body of a greek goddess - germans have seen beckenbauer do all sorts of things in those commercials : getting bottles out of his wine cellar for a plaster fest with his raucous soccer buddies ; yakking away on his cell phone ; hanging out at the north pole ; mugging the unsuspecting father christmas and even flying in a chopper over soccer-mad germany . helicopters are , it seems , his thing . an imperial catfight bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : russian soprano anna netrebko is beckenbauer 's comrade-in-advertising but this is where things get a little complicated with the chopper-flying tsar .
another telecom giant , which practically bought the entire german national soccer league by acquiring exclusive broadcasting rights to its games , is now reportedly planning to hire the " emperor " as its soccer expert for 15 million euros -lrb- $ 19 million -rrb- . according to media report , that 's the reason why beckenbauer 's contract with that cell phone provider will most likely end after the world cup .
in the business world , that 's called stiff competition or conflict of interest .
in the real world , it 's called : somebody 's getting jealous .
everybody wants a piece of kaiser franz . and in order to make it all these world cup games without getting stuck in traffic or getting ambushed by gangs of screaming fans , beckenbauer will have to keep flying on board augusta 109 . " when you really want to get to know the country , you need a chopper , " beckenbauer recently told a reporter . emergency landing bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : attention , crew !
his imperial majesty needs to use the loo according to hans ostler , who 's been beckenbauer 's chauffer in the air for the past eight years , the " emperor " is a good passenger .
he usually wants to get from a to b and does n't make a big deal about it . except on those rare but painful occasions , which require an emergency landing : for example , when nature calls .
the " emperor " is - at least as far as his physiological needs are concerned - a mere mortal , after all . " we must take care of everything before takeoff , " beckenbauer said .
" unless it 's really urgent .
in that case we have to land in some forest and then go up again .
it 's happened before .
it sure did . " toma tasovac send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de paris hilton 's urge brings fame to bavarian farm it 's usually a simple life for the folks in the rural bavarian hamlet of glonn .
but an unexpected visit from a certain infamous socialite gave their town a dose of celebrity .
-lrb- may 12 , 2006 -rrb- offsides from the fringe click here for more world cup-related quirky stories on dw-world.de. happy birthday to ' the kaiser ' as german soccer legend franz beckenbauer turns 60 on sunday , germany is honoring him for his accomplishments both on and off the pitch .
-lrb- sept .
11 , 2005 -rrb- 9801 radio news listen to world headlines from the top of the hour dw-world.de check out our latest interactive web features dw screensaver social bookmarking our rss feeds dw widgets integrated search dw on facebook newsletters netvibes.com the way you want it mobile optimized for pdas newsletters news in your inbox audio / video podcasts © dw 2011 deutsche welle is not responsible for the content of external websites .

he hops on augusta 109 , his regally named helicopter , and flies off to wherever his cosmopolitan heart may take him .
hasta la vista , gelsenkirchen !
konichiwa , hamburg ! everywhere you turn the sun-tanned , gray-haired bavarian " emperor " feels to most germans like a friend of the family , not only because he bears visual and dialectological resemblance to bavarian folksy prime minister stoiber , but also because he is no stranger to advertising gigs . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : bavarian prime minister stoiber -lrb- or a franz beckenbauer look-alike ? -rrb-
one of his most prolific campaigns has been for a german cell phone provider known for expensive-looking and alluring celebrity ads .
german couch potatoes who have a profound relationship with their remote controls have discovered that there are days on which they can start watching a beckenbauer commercial on one channel , switch to the middle of it on a different channel , and still make it to grand finale on a third . along with veronica ferres - a blond german actress with the spanish sounding name - and anna netrebko - a russian opera diva with the body of a greek goddess - germans have seen beckenbauer do all sorts of things in those commercials : getting bottles out of his wine cellar for a plaster fest with his raucous soccer buddies ; yakking away on his cell phone ; hanging out at the north pole ; mugging the unsuspecting father christmas and even flying in a chopper over soccer-mad germany . helicopters are , it seems , his thing . an imperial catfight bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : russian soprano anna netrebko is beckenbauer 's comrade-in-advertising but this is where things get a little complicated with the chopper-flying tsar .
another telecom giant , which practically bought the entire german national soccer league by acquiring exclusive broadcasting rights to its games , is now reportedly planning to hire the " emperor " as its soccer expert for 15 million euros -lrb- $ 19 million -rrb- . according to media report , that 's the reason why beckenbauer 's contract with that cell phone provider will most likely end after the world cup .
in the business world , that 's called stiff competition or conflict of interest .
in the real world , it 's called : somebody 's getting jealous .
everybody wants a piece of kaiser franz . and in order to make it all these world cup games without getting stuck in traffic or getting ambushed by gangs of screaming fans , beckenbauer will have to keep flying on board augusta 109 . " when you really want to get to know the country , you need a chopper , " beckenbauer recently told a reporter . emergency landing bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : attention , crew !
his imperial majesty needs to use the loo according to hans ostler , who 's been beckenbauer 's chauffer in the air for the past eight years , the " emperor " is a good passenger .
he usually wants to get from a to b and does n't make a big deal about it . except on those rare but painful occasions , which require an emergency landing : for example , when nature calls .
the " emperor " is - at least as far as his physiological needs are concerned - a mere mortal , after all . " we must take care of everything before takeoff , " beckenbauer said .
" unless it 's really urgent .
in that case we have to land in some forest and then go up again .
it 's happened before .
it sure did . " toma tasovac send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de paris hilton 's urge brings fame to bavarian farm it 's usually a simple life for the folks in the rural bavarian hamlet of glonn .
but an unexpected visit from a certain infamous socialite gave their town a dose of celebrity .
-lrb- may 12 , 2006 -rrb- offsides from the fringe click here for more world cup-related quirky stories on dw-world.de. happy birthday to ' the kaiser ' as german soccer legend franz beckenbauer turns 60 on sunday , germany is honoring him for his accomplishments both on and off the pitch .
-lrb- sept .
11 , 2005 -rrb- feedback how does beckenbauer keep his calm in your opinion ?
please include your name and country in your reply .

germany 's imperial frequent flyer -pipe- news -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 22.12.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de in focus : offsides from the fringe when baring it all is not enough world cup host city residents told to behave germany 's mascots play the shame game could goleo 's musical career spell the end for pille ? news -pipe- 21.06.2006 germany 's imperial frequent flyer großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : is germany 's beloved kaiser from outer space ?
is german soccer legend franz beckenbauer really a human being ?
or is he merely a science fiction invention ?
he does seem capable of beaming himself to different galaxies at the speed of light . sweating at home in front of the tv set watching a world cup game has at least one advantage over sweating collectively at the stadium : you actually get to see more .
after trying to lip-read the obscenities a player is throwing at the referee , you can compare your own beer belly with a horde of face-painted , shirtless soccer freaks .
and still , only a few seconds later , you can hang out with the spanish royal couple or the otherwise sleepy german chancellor trying to get in touch with her inner beast . as you move from game to game and from city to city , you also get to admire one world cup attendee , for whom defying the laws of physics is turning into a favorite pastime .
franz beckenbauer , german soccer legend and president of the soccer championship organizing committee , is the only world cup celebrity that seems capable of being at different places at the same time .
you can see him in almost every city , at almost every game .
the man is a genius . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : beckenbauer 's bavarian star trek friends so how does he do it ?
is he in possession of an intergalactic star trek beamer ?
did he hire an army of look-alikes ?
or does he have an exclusive deal with overbearing magician david copperfield ? apparently , not .
in-between games , beckenbauer - whose popular teutonic nickname is " kaiser " -lrb- emperor -rrb- - gets to do what most soccer fans would be too drunk to even contemplate at the end of a match .
he hops on augusta 109 , his regally named helicopter , and flies off to wherever his cosmopolitan heart may take him .
hasta la vista , gelsenkirchen !
konichiwa , hamburg ! everywhere you turn the sun-tanned , gray-haired bavarian " emperor " feels to most germans like a friend of the family , not only because he bears visual and dialectological resemblance to bavarian folksy prime minister stoiber , but also because he is no stranger to advertising gigs . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : bavarian prime minister stoiber -lrb- or a franz beckenbauer look-alike ? -rrb-
one of his most prolific campaigns has been for a german cell phone provider known for expensive-looking and alluring celebrity ads .
german couch potatoes who have a profound relationship with their remote controls have discovered that there are days on which they can start watching a beckenbauer commercial on one channel , switch to the middle of it on a different channel , and still make it to grand finale on a third . along with veronica ferres - a blond german actress with the spanish sounding name - and anna netrebko - a russian opera diva with the body of a greek goddess - germans have seen beckenbauer do all sorts of things in those commercials : getting bottles out of his wine cellar for a plaster fest with his raucous soccer buddies ; yakking away on his cell phone ; hanging out at the north pole ; mugging the unsuspecting father christmas and even flying in a chopper over soccer-mad germany . helicopters are , it seems , his thing . an imperial catfight bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : russian soprano anna netrebko is beckenbauer 's comrade-in-advertising but this is where things get a little complicated with the chopper-flying tsar .
another telecom giant , which practically bought the entire german national soccer league by acquiring exclusive broadcasting rights to its games , is now reportedly planning to hire the " emperor " as its soccer expert for 15 million euros -lrb- $ 19 million -rrb- . according to media report , that 's the reason why beckenbauer 's contract with that cell phone provider will most likely end after the world cup .
in the business world , that 's called stiff competition or conflict of interest .
in the real world , it 's called : somebody 's getting jealous .
everybody wants a piece of kaiser franz . and in order to make it all these world cup games without getting stuck in traffic or getting ambushed by gangs of screaming fans , beckenbauer will have to keep flying on board augusta 109 . " when you really want to get to know the country , you need a chopper , " beckenbauer recently told a reporter . emergency landing bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : attention , crew !
his imperial majesty needs to use the loo according to hans ostler , who 's been beckenbauer 's chauffer in the air for the past eight years , the " emperor " is a good passenger .
he usually wants to get from a to b and does n't make a big deal about it . except on those rare but painful occasions , which require an emergency landing : for example , when nature calls .
the " emperor " is - at least as far as his physiological needs are concerned - a mere mortal , after all . " we must take care of everything before takeoff , " beckenbauer said .
" unless it 's really urgent .
in that case we have to land in some forest and then go up again .
it 's happened before .
it sure did . " toma tasovac send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de paris hilton 's urge brings fame to bavarian farm it 's usually a simple life for the folks in the rural bavarian hamlet of glonn .
but an unexpected visit from a certain infamous socialite gave their town a dose of celebrity .
-lrb- may 12 , 2006 -rrb- offsides from the fringe click here for more world cup-related quirky stories on dw-world.de. happy birthday to ' the kaiser ' as german soccer legend franz beckenbauer turns 60 on sunday , germany is honoring him for his accomplishments both on and off the pitch .
-lrb- sept .
11 , 2005 -rrb- feedback how does beckenbauer keep his calm in your opinion ?
please include your name and country in your reply .

live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands -pipe- news -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 26.01.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de news -pipe- 21.06.2006 live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands netherlands 0:0 argentina ivory coast 3:2 serbia & montenegro team line-ups the netherlands -lrb- 4-3-3 -rrb- 1-edwin van der sar ; 2-kew jaliens , 3-khalid boulahrouz , 13-andre ooijer , 15-tim de cler ; 20-wesley sneijder , 10-rafael van der vaart 8-philip cocu ; 7-dirk kuijt , 9-ruud van nistelrooy , 17-robin van persie coach : marco van basten argentina -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 1-roberto abbondanzieri ; 21-nicolas burdisso , 2-roberto ayala , 15-gabriel milito , 17-leandro cufre ; 5-esteban cambiasso , 8-javier mascherano , 10-juan roman riquelme , 18-maxi rodriguez ; 19-lionel messi , 11-carlos tevez coach : jose pekerman referee : luis medina cantalejo -lrb- spain -rrb- linesmen : victoriano giraldez carrasco -lrb- spain -rrb- , pedro medina hernandez -lrb- spain -rrb- ivory coast -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 23-boubacar barry ; 21-emmanuel eboue , 17-cyrille domoraud , 3-arthur boka , 6-blaise kouassi ; 5-didier zokora , 19-gneri yaya toure , 2-kanga akale , 18-abelkader keita ; 9-arouna kone , 15-aruna dindane coach : henri michel serbia & montenegro -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 1-dragoslav jevric ; 14-nenad djordjevic , 6-goran gavrancic , 20-mladen krstajic , 15-milan dudic ; 2-ivan ergic , 4-igor duljaj , 10-dejan stankovic , 11-predrag djordjevic ; 22-sasa ilic , 19-nikola zigic coach : ilija petkovic referee : marco rodriguez -lrb- mexico -rrb- linesmen : jose luis camargo -lrb- mexico -rrb- , leonel leal -lrb- costa rica -rrb- 1. min .
kick-off in frankfurt the dutch have made five changes due to yellow cards picked up in the fist two games .
argentina have also 5 different players on the pitch including the teenage sensation lionel messi .
2. min .
the dutch go on the attack .
van nistelroy is penalized for pushing an opponent .
3. min .
netherlands take control early on but argentina defend well and keep the dutch out .
5. min .
first corner of the game for argentina .
riquelme supplies the cross and van persie clears for another corner .
6. min. van der sar easily deals with the corner and sets up an attack. van nistelroy fails to make the most of it and it goes out for goal kick .
8. min .
messi plays a wonderful through ball to cambiasso and boulahrouz makes a last second stretch to clear for a corner .
10. min .
the game is being played in midfield at the moment as both teams try to build up attacks but as yet to no avail .
12. min .
first corner for holland. van persie takes it but blown for a foul by a dutch player .
15. min .
quarter of an hour played and not much goal mouth action to speak of .
a pretty slow start to the game .
17. min .
argentina string a number of passes together and tevez 's shot from outside the box goes wide of the post .
messi involved in the attack much to the delight of the argentina fans .
18. min .
holland have their first shot on goal .
well saved by abbondanzieri .
serbia and montenegro 1 zigic pute serbia and montenegro in the lead on 10 minutes .
21. min .
the dutch have control of the ball in midfield but still ca n't find that killer pass to split the argentina defense .
23. min .
argentina look more dangerous than the dutch going forward but still ca n't find a way through 24. min .
argentina substitution coloccini is on for burdisso after a knee injury 26. min .
tevez dribbles past two dutch defenders and wins a corner .
27. min .
riquleme fires in a bending shot from the corner and van der saar punches over the bar .
28. min .
yellow for kuyt kuyt is booked for pushing tevez as he makes another dazzling run .
28. min .
argentina hit the post off riquelme 's low free kick into the box .
29. min .
rodriguez blasts a shot from outside the box and misses by only centimeters .
argentina are in control and look like scoring .
serbia and montenegro 2 goal from sasa ilic on 20 minutes 32. min .
half an hour gone and argentina are dominating proceedings .
messi is in the thick of things seems to be relishing the opportunity to play a full game .
33. min .
argentina have another great chance but rodriguez shoots into the side netting from close range .
35. min .
sneijder has a crack from 35 meters out .
blocked by ayala .
36. min .
tevez wins argentina 's 7th corner as he takes on the dutch defense .
38. min .
the dutch have managed to slow the game down and gain more control .
40. min .
tevez wins another corner .
once again he takes on the dutch defense .
41. min .
messi tries a through ball into the box but tevez fails to read his intentions and van der saar claims it .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane scores on 36 minutes 42. min .
yellow card for ooijer ooijer gets booked for a tackle from behind on riquelme .
45. min .
one minute stoppage time added 45 + 1. min .
messi shoots from outside the box. van der saar makes a good save .
half time in frankfurt half time in the game between the netherlands and argentina .
the dutch put in a disciplined performance and defended well against the skillful argentineans .
tevez in particular troubled the dutch defense and messi showed glimpses of his great skill .
we can look forward to an interesting second half as both teams go looking for the win .
46. min .
second half kicks off second half kicks off in frankfurt .
47. min .
van persie takes a free kick from 35 meters out and blasts the ball high and wide into the stand .
48. min .
yellow for de kler dutch player de kler is carded for elbowing an opponent .
50. min .
a tactical game in the second half with tevez continuing to shine .
52. min .
kuyt floats a ball into the argentina box but well claimed by the keeper .
53. min .
messi and riquleme play a clever one-two to split open the dutch defense and riquelme 's shot goes just centimeters wide .
55. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez who shoots over the bar .
argentina are looking very dangerous and holland are struggling to keep them in check .
56. min .
dutch substitution babel is brought on to replace ruud van nistelroy .
57. min .
yellow card for cambiasso kuyt draws a foul 35 meters out and cambiasso is booked .
kuyt is holland 's most active player at the moment .
58. min .
van der vaart hits a poor free kick and draws jeers from the crowd .
60. min .
an hour gone and argentina still have the upper hand creating more chances and looking more likely to score but holland are defending well .
62. min .
the dutch have made a few poor passes at the back and handed the ball to argentina .
it could prove costly .
65. min .
riquelme takes on three dutch defenders and is barely stopped in the box .
65. min .
tevez tries an overhead kick in the box but fails to make proper contact .
67. min .
van der vaart makes a great run into the box and cocu 's shot is well blocked by abbondanzieri and pushed out for a corner .
holland 's best chance of the second half .
69. min .
cocu has another attempt on goal but his shot goes right and wide .
70. min .
nessi substituted cruz is brought on for messi who struggled in the second half against the strong dutch defense .
71. min .
the pace of the game has dropped considerably .
the dutch are happy to stay on level terms and argentina are looking forward to the next round .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane levels for ivory coast in 67th minute 73. min .
tevez draws a great save from van der saar 76. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez outside the box .
his shot is blocked .
78. min .
holland are defending in numbers trying to shut down the argentineans .
79. min .
de kler floats a cross in from the left .
foul called on babel .
80. min .
argentina substitution aimar is brought on to replace riquelme .
81. min .
both teams seem to have settled for a draw as we head into the final ten minutes .
84. min .
holland have more control of the ball but lack the drive to go forward .
85. min .
van der vaart tries another free-kick but once again he shoots wide of the goal .
88. min .
a cross into the argentina box misses the dutch and argentina stay on level terms .
90. min .
corner for holland is cleared well by argentina .
90. min .
yellow card yellow card for mascherano serbia and montenegro 2 kalou puts ivory coast ahead 90 + 2. min .
tevez almost breaks the deadlock but his shot goes over the bar in the dying seconds of the game .
full time in frankfurt the netherlands hold argentina to a goalless draw in a tactical game by two of the tournament 's top teams .
argentina had most of the play and the better chances but could n't make the most of their superiority .
the dutch will be happy not to have lost and look forward to their clash against portugal .
argentina now face mexico .
serbia and montenegro ivory coast come from behind to win 3:2 send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands -pipe- news -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 04.10.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de news -pipe- 21.06.2006 live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands netherlands 0:0 argentina ivory coast 3:2 serbia & montenegro team line-ups the netherlands -lrb- 4-3-3 -rrb- 1-edwin van der sar ; 2-kew jaliens , 3-khalid boulahrouz , 13-andre ooijer , 15-tim de cler ; 20-wesley sneijder , 10-rafael van der vaart 8-philip cocu ; 7-dirk kuijt , 9-ruud van nistelrooy , 17-robin van persie coach : marco van basten argentina -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 1-roberto abbondanzieri ; 21-nicolas burdisso , 2-roberto ayala , 15-gabriel milito , 17-leandro cufre ; 5-esteban cambiasso , 8-javier mascherano , 10-juan roman riquelme , 18-maxi rodriguez ; 19-lionel messi , 11-carlos tevez coach : jose pekerman referee : luis medina cantalejo -lrb- spain -rrb- linesmen : victoriano giraldez carrasco -lrb- spain -rrb- , pedro medina hernandez -lrb- spain -rrb- ivory coast -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 23-boubacar barry ; 21-emmanuel eboue , 17-cyrille domoraud , 3-arthur boka , 6-blaise kouassi ; 5-didier zokora , 19-gneri yaya toure , 2-kanga akale , 18-abelkader keita ; 9-arouna kone , 15-aruna dindane coach : henri michel serbia & montenegro -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 1-dragoslav jevric ; 14-nenad djordjevic , 6-goran gavrancic , 20-mladen krstajic , 15-milan dudic ; 2-ivan ergic , 4-igor duljaj , 10-dejan stankovic , 11-predrag djordjevic ; 22-sasa ilic , 19-nikola zigic coach : ilija petkovic referee : marco rodriguez -lrb- mexico -rrb- linesmen : jose luis camargo -lrb- mexico -rrb- , leonel leal -lrb- costa rica -rrb- 1. min .
kick-off in frankfurt the dutch have made five changes due to yellow cards picked up in the fist two games .
argentina have also 5 different players on the pitch including the teenage sensation lionel messi .
2. min .
the dutch go on the attack .
van nistelroy is penalized for pushing an opponent .
3. min .
netherlands take control early on but argentina defend well and keep the dutch out .
5. min .
first corner of the game for argentina .
riquelme supplies the cross and van persie clears for another corner .
6. min. van der sar easily deals with the corner and sets up an attack. van nistelroy fails to make the most of it and it goes out for goal kick .
8. min .
messi plays a wonderful through ball to cambiasso and boulahrouz makes a last second stretch to clear for a corner .
10. min .
the game is being played in midfield at the moment as both teams try to build up attacks but as yet to no avail .
12. min .
first corner for holland. van persie takes it but blown for a foul by a dutch player .
15. min .
quarter of an hour played and not much goal mouth action to speak of .
a pretty slow start to the game .
17. min .
argentina string a number of passes together and tevez 's shot from outside the box goes wide of the post .
messi involved in the attack much to the delight of the argentina fans .
18. min .
holland have their first shot on goal .
well saved by abbondanzieri .
serbia and montenegro 1 zigic pute serbia and montenegro in the lead on 10 minutes .
21. min .
the dutch have control of the ball in midfield but still ca n't find that killer pass to split the argentina defense .
23. min .
argentina look more dangerous than the dutch going forward but still ca n't find a way through 24. min .
argentina substitution coloccini is on for burdisso after a knee injury 26. min .
tevez dribbles past two dutch defenders and wins a corner .
27. min .
riquleme fires in a bending shot from the corner and van der saar punches over the bar .
28. min .
yellow for kuyt kuyt is booked for pushing tevez as he makes another dazzling run .
28. min .
argentina hit the post off riquelme 's low free kick into the box .
29. min .
rodriguez blasts a shot from outside the box and misses by only centimeters .
argentina are in control and look like scoring .
serbia and montenegro 2 goal from sasa ilic on 20 minutes 32. min .
half an hour gone and argentina are dominating proceedings .
messi is in the thick of things seems to be relishing the opportunity to play a full game .
33. min .
argentina have another great chance but rodriguez shoots into the side netting from close range .
35. min .
sneijder has a crack from 35 meters out .
blocked by ayala .
36. min .
tevez wins argentina 's 7th corner as he takes on the dutch defense .
38. min .
the dutch have managed to slow the game down and gain more control .
40. min .
tevez wins another corner .
once again he takes on the dutch defense .
41. min .
messi tries a through ball into the box but tevez fails to read his intentions and van der saar claims it .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane scores on 36 minutes 42. min .
yellow card for ooijer ooijer gets booked for a tackle from behind on riquelme .
45. min .
one minute stoppage time added 45 + 1. min .
messi shoots from outside the box. van der saar makes a good save .
half time in frankfurt half time in the game between the netherlands and argentina .
the dutch put in a disciplined performance and defended well against the skillful argentineans .
tevez in particular troubled the dutch defense and messi showed glimpses of his great skill .
we can look forward to an interesting second half as both teams go looking for the win .
46. min .
second half kicks off second half kicks off in frankfurt .
47. min .
van persie takes a free kick from 35 meters out and blasts the ball high and wide into the stand .
48. min .
yellow for de kler dutch player de kler is carded for elbowing an opponent .
50. min .
a tactical game in the second half with tevez continuing to shine .
52. min .
kuyt floats a ball into the argentina box but well claimed by the keeper .
53. min .
messi and riquleme play a clever one-two to split open the dutch defense and riquelme 's shot goes just centimeters wide .
55. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez who shoots over the bar .
argentina are looking very dangerous and holland are struggling to keep them in check .
56. min .
dutch substitution babel is brought on to replace ruud van nistelroy .
57. min .
yellow card for cambiasso kuyt draws a foul 35 meters out and cambiasso is booked .
kuyt is holland 's most active player at the moment .
58. min .
van der vaart hits a poor free kick and draws jeers from the crowd .
60. min .
an hour gone and argentina still have the upper hand creating more chances and looking more likely to score but holland are defending well .
62. min .
the dutch have made a few poor passes at the back and handed the ball to argentina .
it could prove costly .
65. min .
riquelme takes on three dutch defenders and is barely stopped in the box .
65. min .
tevez tries an overhead kick in the box but fails to make proper contact .
67. min .
van der vaart makes a great run into the box and cocu 's shot is well blocked by abbondanzieri and pushed out for a corner .
holland 's best chance of the second half .
69. min .
cocu has another attempt on goal but his shot goes right and wide .
70. min .
nessi substituted cruz is brought on for messi who struggled in the second half against the strong dutch defense .
71. min .
the pace of the game has dropped considerably .
the dutch are happy to stay on level terms and argentina are looking forward to the next round .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane levels for ivory coast in 67th minute 73. min .
tevez draws a great save from van der saar 76. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez outside the box .
his shot is blocked .
78. min .
holland are defending in numbers trying to shut down the argentineans .
79. min .
de kler floats a cross in from the left .
foul called on babel .
80. min .
argentina substitution aimar is brought on to replace riquelme .
81. min .
both teams seem to have settled for a draw as we head into the final ten minutes .
84. min .
holland have more control of the ball but lack the drive to go forward .
85. min .
van der vaart tries another free-kick but once again he shoots wide of the goal .
88. min .
a cross into the argentina box misses the dutch and argentina stay on level terms .
90. min .
corner for holland is cleared well by argentina .
90. min .
yellow card yellow card for mascherano serbia and montenegro 2 kalou puts ivory coast ahead 90 + 2. min .
tevez almost breaks the deadlock but his shot goes over the bar in the dying seconds of the game .
full time in frankfurt the netherlands hold argentina to a goalless draw in a tactical game by two of the tournament 's top teams .
argentina had most of the play and the better chances but could n't make the most of their superiority .
the dutch will be happy not to have lost and look forward to their clash against portugal .
argentina now face mexico .

messi involved in the attack much to the delight of the argentina fans .
18. min .
holland have their first shot on goal .
well saved by abbondanzieri .
serbia and montenegro 1 zigic pute serbia and montenegro in the lead on 10 minutes .
21. min .
the dutch have control of the ball in midfield but still ca n't find that killer pass to split the argentina defense .
23. min .
argentina look more dangerous than the dutch going forward but still ca n't find a way through 24. min .
argentina substitution coloccini is on for burdisso after a knee injury 26. min .
tevez dribbles past two dutch defenders and wins a corner .
27. min .
riquleme fires in a bending shot from the corner and van der saar punches over the bar .
28. min .
yellow for kuyt kuyt is booked for pushing tevez as he makes another dazzling run .
28. min .
argentina hit the post off riquelme 's low free kick into the box .
29. min .
rodriguez blasts a shot from outside the box and misses by only centimeters .
argentina are in control and look like scoring .
serbia and montenegro 2 goal from sasa ilic on 20 minutes 32. min .
half an hour gone and argentina are dominating proceedings .
messi is in the thick of things seems to be relishing the opportunity to play a full game .
33. min .
argentina have another great chance but rodriguez shoots into the side netting from close range .
35. min .
sneijder has a crack from 35 meters out .
blocked by ayala .
36. min .
tevez wins argentina 's 7th corner as he takes on the dutch defense .
38. min .
the dutch have managed to slow the game down and gain more control .
40. min .
tevez wins another corner .
once again he takes on the dutch defense .
41. min .
messi tries a through ball into the box but tevez fails to read his intentions and van der saar claims it .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane scores on 36 minutes 42. min .
yellow card for ooijer ooijer gets booked for a tackle from behind on riquelme .
45. min .
one minute stoppage time added 45 + 1. min .
messi shoots from outside the box. van der saar makes a good save .
half time in frankfurt half time in the game between the netherlands and argentina .
the dutch put in a disciplined performance and defended well against the skillful argentineans .
tevez in particular troubled the dutch defense and messi showed glimpses of his great skill .
we can look forward to an interesting second half as both teams go looking for the win .
46. min .
second half kicks off second half kicks off in frankfurt .
47. min .
van persie takes a free kick from 35 meters out and blasts the ball high and wide into the stand .
48. min .
yellow for de kler dutch player de kler is carded for elbowing an opponent .
50. min .
a tactical game in the second half with tevez continuing to shine .
52. min .
kuyt floats a ball into the argentina box but well claimed by the keeper .
53. min .
messi and riquleme play a clever one-two to split open the dutch defense and riquelme 's shot goes just centimeters wide .
55. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez who shoots over the bar .
argentina are looking very dangerous and holland are struggling to keep them in check .
56. min .
dutch substitution babel is brought on to replace ruud van nistelroy .
57. min .
yellow card for cambiasso kuyt draws a foul 35 meters out and cambiasso is booked .
kuyt is holland 's most active player at the moment .
58. min .
van der vaart hits a poor free kick and draws jeers from the crowd .
60. min .
an hour gone and argentina still have the upper hand creating more chances and looking more likely to score but holland are defending well .
62. min .
the dutch have made a few poor passes at the back and handed the ball to argentina .
it could prove costly .
65. min .
riquelme takes on three dutch defenders and is barely stopped in the box .
65. min .
tevez tries an overhead kick in the box but fails to make proper contact .
67. min .
van der vaart makes a great run into the box and cocu 's shot is well blocked by abbondanzieri and pushed out for a corner .
holland 's best chance of the second half .
69. min .
cocu has another attempt on goal but his shot goes right and wide .
70. min .
nessi substituted cruz is brought on for messi who struggled in the second half against the strong dutch defense .
71. min .
the pace of the game has dropped considerably .
the dutch are happy to stay on level terms and argentina are looking forward to the next round .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane levels for ivory coast in 67th minute 73. min .
tevez draws a great save from van der saar 76. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez outside the box .
his shot is blocked .
78. min .
holland are defending in numbers trying to shut down the argentineans .
79. min .
de kler floats a cross in from the left .
foul called on babel .
80. min .
argentina substitution aimar is brought on to replace riquelme .
81. min .
both teams seem to have settled for a draw as we head into the final ten minutes .
84. min .
holland have more control of the ball but lack the drive to go forward .
85. min .
van der vaart tries another free-kick but once again he shoots wide of the goal .
88. min .
a cross into the argentina box misses the dutch and argentina stay on level terms .
90. min .
corner for holland is cleared well by argentina .
90. min .
yellow card yellow card for mascherano serbia and montenegro 2 kalou puts ivory coast ahead 90 + 2. min .
tevez almost breaks the deadlock but his shot goes over the bar in the dying seconds of the game .
full time in frankfurt the netherlands hold argentina to a goalless draw in a tactical game by two of the tournament 's top teams .
argentina had most of the play and the better chances but could n't make the most of their superiority .
the dutch will be happy not to have lost and look forward to their clash against portugal .
argentina now face mexico .
serbia and montenegro ivory coast come from behind to win 3:2 send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic 9801 radio news listen to world headlines from the top of the hour dw-world.de check out our latest interactive web features dw screensaver social bookmarking our rss feeds dw widgets integrated search dw on facebook newsletters netvibes.com the way you want it mobile optimized for pdas newsletters news in your inbox audio / video podcasts © dw 2011 deutsche welle is not responsible for the content of external websites .

no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 22.06.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 21.06.2006 no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : juan riquelme , right , and kew jaliens go for the ball two-time world cup winners argentina reached a goalless draw with the netherlands to finish top of group c in a tight , furiously-paced game in frankfurt on wednesday . the dutch team , who like the argentines posted two victories over group rivals serbia and montenegro and ivory coast , finished in second place on goal difference and will play group d winners portugal in nuremberg on sunday .
the argentines will meet mexico in leipzig in the second round on saturday . argentina had a raft of chances throughout the match , and dutch coach marco van basten had two fine first-half clearances by defender khalid boulahrouz and one outstanding save late in the game by edwin van der sar to thank for a clean sheet . messi , tevez create havoc argentine strikers lionel messi and carlos tevez , along with midfield duo maxi rodriguez and juan riquelme , caused havoc in the dutch defense early on with their tight combinations of fast , accurate passing and blistering counter-attacking speed . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : netherlands ' khalid boulahrouz , left , and argentina 's lionel messi challenge for the ball teenage sensation messi made his mark in the eighth minute , playing a dangerous through ball into the area , which boulahrouz just managed to get his foot to ahead of the onrushing esteban cambiasso and nicolas burdisso . man-of-the-match tevez had a chance just after the quarter-hour , turning inside phillip cocu and unleashing a powerful left-footed shot just past the outside post of captain van der sar , who was winning his 112th cap to draw level on all-time appearances for the oranje with frank de boer . the netherlands ' best chance came a minute later , but dirk kuyt drilled a shot just wide . van der sar was then called into action in the 27th minute to punch away a swerving riquelme corner . from the ensuing corner kuyt brought down tevez on the edge of the box and the dutch fans had the imposing 1.91m frame of boulahrouz to thank again as he lunged to fend off the free-kick from tevez 's feet onto the post and away .
rodriguez then watched in agony as his blistering half-volley beat van der sar but drifted late and shaved off the post . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : flying van der sar saved the day for the dutch on the stroke of half-time , van der sar saved a messi shot after the barcelona striker was allowed far too much time in front of goal . the second-half started with riquleme taking advantage of the dutch defense standing off to fire a shot that narrowly missed goal , and rodriguez following up shortly after with a shot that flew high . van der sar saves the day but the dutch did manage to clamp down on the argentineans , wesley sneijder and cocu - winning his 100th cap - dropping into deeper positions to nullify the threat of the free-running tevez . but the netherlands were obviously lacking the creative spark provided by the rested arjen robben , giovanni van bronkhorst and mark van bommel . that said , the dutch pressure almost paid off in the 67th minute , cocu going close after good work by rafael van der vart .
with messi and riquelme both replaced by coach jose pekerman , the game fizzled out somewhat and swung towards the dutch . but it was fittingly left to the record-equaling van der sar to save the day for the dutch , defying his 35 years to superbly palm away a great strike by tevez in the 73rd minute . the oranje army again invaded frankfurt for the match with airlines in the netherlands laying on 32 flights to the german city on wednesday . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : oranje fans were out in full force officially only 6,200 fans came with a ticket but it was estimated that 25,000 fans would be in the 48,000-seater stadium and up to 40,000 more in the city . there was also a sizeable number of argentine supporters , many sporting the no. 10 shirt favored by diego maradona , with flags and scarves tied to their wrists .
maradona himself was seen in the stands along with his daughter , passionately cheering on the argentine side . the elephants claw back the other " group of death " game saw a spirited ivory coast coming from behind to beat serbia & montenegro 3-2 .
the elephants fought back from two goals down to clinch their first world cup win in an entertaining and fiercely-fought battle on wednesday in munich , played in pouring rain , to avoid ending bottom of group c. despite being eliminated from the world cup , both heavily-changed teams went at it hammer and tongs from the start before a capacity 66,000 crowd in a bid to restore their pride .
although ivory coast had the best of the play in the first ten minutes , their trio of newcomers at the back were caught out by long high balls from serbia and montenegro 's . serbia , seeking self-respect after a 6-0 drubbing by argentina , took the lead in the 10th minute with striker nikola zigic slotting in the ball after a long pass by dejan stankovic .
they built up on the result in the 19th minute after a botched clearance by ivory coast stand-in captain cyrille domoraud was seized by sasa ilic . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ivory coast players celebrate after their third goal the ivorians however made up in the 36th minute with arune dindane neatly netting a twice-taken penalty .
the strengthened ivorians dominated in the second half and dindane once again showed his class by heading in a kader keita cross in the 67th minute . the ivorians were n't finished as yet when kalou stepped up to score and seal a historic victory for ivory coast . dw staff / afp -lrb- sp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de argentina beat up serbia and montenegro argentina proved why some consider them a world cup title contender , displaying their speed and precision passing in a 6-0 rout of their group c opponents .
-lrb- june 20 , 2006 -rrb- dutch victory breaks hearts in ivory coast with everything at stake in the " group of death , " the ivory coast gave the holland a run for their money throughout a pulsating match that saw seven yellow cards before ending 2-1 in the netherlands ' favor .
-lrb- june 16 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands review all the action from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker 9801 picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures a nation expects dw-world.de presents germany 's 2006 world cup squad .

no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 22.01.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 21.06.2006 no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : juan riquelme , right , and kew jaliens go for the ball two-time world cup winners argentina reached a goalless draw with the netherlands to finish top of group c in a tight , furiously-paced game in frankfurt on wednesday . the dutch team , who like the argentines posted two victories over group rivals serbia and montenegro and ivory coast , finished in second place on goal difference and will play group d winners portugal in nuremberg on sunday .
the argentines will meet mexico in leipzig in the second round on saturday . argentina had a raft of chances throughout the match , and dutch coach marco van basten had two fine first-half clearances by defender khalid boulahrouz and one outstanding save late in the game by edwin van der sar to thank for a clean sheet . messi , tevez create havoc argentine strikers lionel messi and carlos tevez , along with midfield duo maxi rodriguez and juan riquelme , caused havoc in the dutch defense early on with their tight combinations of fast , accurate passing and blistering counter-attacking speed . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : netherlands ' khalid boulahrouz , left , and argentina 's lionel messi challenge for the ball teenage sensation messi made his mark in the eighth minute , playing a dangerous through ball into the area , which boulahrouz just managed to get his foot to ahead of the onrushing esteban cambiasso and nicolas burdisso . man-of-the-match tevez had a chance just after the quarter-hour , turning inside phillip cocu and unleashing a powerful left-footed shot just past the outside post of captain van der sar , who was winning his 112th cap to draw level on all-time appearances for the oranje with frank de boer . the netherlands ' best chance came a minute later , but dirk kuyt drilled a shot just wide . van der sar was then called into action in the 27th minute to punch away a swerving riquelme corner . from the ensuing corner kuyt brought down tevez on the edge of the box and the dutch fans had the imposing 1.91m frame of boulahrouz to thank again as he lunged to fend off the free-kick from tevez 's feet onto the post and away .
rodriguez then watched in agony as his blistering half-volley beat van der sar but drifted late and shaved off the post . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : flying van der sar saved the day for the dutch on the stroke of half-time , van der sar saved a messi shot after the barcelona striker was allowed far too much time in front of goal . the second-half started with riquleme taking advantage of the dutch defense standing off to fire a shot that narrowly missed goal , and rodriguez following up shortly after with a shot that flew high . van der sar saves the day but the dutch did manage to clamp down on the argentineans , wesley sneijder and cocu - winning his 100th cap - dropping into deeper positions to nullify the threat of the free-running tevez . but the netherlands were obviously lacking the creative spark provided by the rested arjen robben , giovanni van bronkhorst and mark van bommel . that said , the dutch pressure almost paid off in the 67th minute , cocu going close after good work by rafael van der vart .
with messi and riquelme both replaced by coach jose pekerman , the game fizzled out somewhat and swung towards the dutch . but it was fittingly left to the record-equaling van der sar to save the day for the dutch , defying his 35 years to superbly palm away a great strike by tevez in the 73rd minute . the oranje army again invaded frankfurt for the match with airlines in the netherlands laying on 32 flights to the german city on wednesday . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : oranje fans were out in full force officially only 6,200 fans came with a ticket but it was estimated that 25,000 fans would be in the 48,000-seater stadium and up to 40,000 more in the city . there was also a sizeable number of argentine supporters , many sporting the no. 10 shirt favored by diego maradona , with flags and scarves tied to their wrists .
maradona himself was seen in the stands along with his daughter , passionately cheering on the argentine side . the elephants claw back the other " group of death " game saw a spirited ivory coast coming from behind to beat serbia & montenegro 3-2 .
the elephants fought back from two goals down to clinch their first world cup win in an entertaining and fiercely-fought battle on wednesday in munich , played in pouring rain , to avoid ending bottom of group c. despite being eliminated from the world cup , both heavily-changed teams went at it hammer and tongs from the start before a capacity 66,000 crowd in a bid to restore their pride .
although ivory coast had the best of the play in the first ten minutes , their trio of newcomers at the back were caught out by long high balls from serbia and montenegro 's . serbia , seeking self-respect after a 6-0 drubbing by argentina , took the lead in the 10th minute with striker nikola zigic slotting in the ball after a long pass by dejan stankovic .
they built up on the result in the 19th minute after a botched clearance by ivory coast stand-in captain cyrille domoraud was seized by sasa ilic . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ivory coast players celebrate after their third goal the ivorians however made up in the 36th minute with arune dindane neatly netting a twice-taken penalty .
the strengthened ivorians dominated in the second half and dindane once again showed his class by heading in a kader keita cross in the 67th minute . the ivorians were n't finished as yet when kalou stepped up to score and seal a historic victory for ivory coast . dw staff / afp -lrb- sp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de argentina beat up serbia and montenegro argentina proved why some consider them a world cup title contender , displaying their speed and precision passing in a 6-0 rout of their group c opponents .
-lrb- june 20 , 2006 -rrb- dutch victory breaks hearts in ivory coast with everything at stake in the " group of death , " the ivory coast gave the holland a run for their money throughout a pulsating match that saw seven yellow cards before ending 2-1 in the netherlands ' favor .
-lrb- june 16 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands review all the action from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 22.12.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 21.06.2006 no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : juan riquelme , right , and kew jaliens go for the ball two-time world cup winners argentina reached a goalless draw with the netherlands to finish top of group c in a tight , furiously-paced game in frankfurt on wednesday . the dutch team , who like the argentines posted two victories over group rivals serbia and montenegro and ivory coast , finished in second place on goal difference and will play group d winners portugal in nuremberg on sunday .
the argentines will meet mexico in leipzig in the second round on saturday . argentina had a raft of chances throughout the match , and dutch coach marco van basten had two fine first-half clearances by defender khalid boulahrouz and one outstanding save late in the game by edwin van der sar to thank for a clean sheet . messi , tevez create havoc argentine strikers lionel messi and carlos tevez , along with midfield duo maxi rodriguez and juan riquelme , caused havoc in the dutch defense early on with their tight combinations of fast , accurate passing and blistering counter-attacking speed . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : netherlands ' khalid boulahrouz , left , and argentina 's lionel messi challenge for the ball teenage sensation messi made his mark in the eighth minute , playing a dangerous through ball into the area , which boulahrouz just managed to get his foot to ahead of the onrushing esteban cambiasso and nicolas burdisso . man-of-the-match tevez had a chance just after the quarter-hour , turning inside phillip cocu and unleashing a powerful left-footed shot just past the outside post of captain van der sar , who was winning his 112th cap to draw level on all-time appearances for the oranje with frank de boer . the netherlands ' best chance came a minute later , but dirk kuyt drilled a shot just wide . van der sar was then called into action in the 27th minute to punch away a swerving riquelme corner . from the ensuing corner kuyt brought down tevez on the edge of the box and the dutch fans had the imposing 1.91m frame of boulahrouz to thank again as he lunged to fend off the free-kick from tevez 's feet onto the post and away .
rodriguez then watched in agony as his blistering half-volley beat van der sar but drifted late and shaved off the post . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : flying van der sar saved the day for the dutch on the stroke of half-time , van der sar saved a messi shot after the barcelona striker was allowed far too much time in front of goal . the second-half started with riquleme taking advantage of the dutch defense standing off to fire a shot that narrowly missed goal , and rodriguez following up shortly after with a shot that flew high . van der sar saves the day but the dutch did manage to clamp down on the argentineans , wesley sneijder and cocu - winning his 100th cap - dropping into deeper positions to nullify the threat of the free-running tevez . but the netherlands were obviously lacking the creative spark provided by the rested arjen robben , giovanni van bronkhorst and mark van bommel . that said , the dutch pressure almost paid off in the 67th minute , cocu going close after good work by rafael van der vart .
with messi and riquelme both replaced by coach jose pekerman , the game fizzled out somewhat and swung towards the dutch . but it was fittingly left to the record-equaling van der sar to save the day for the dutch , defying his 35 years to superbly palm away a great strike by tevez in the 73rd minute . the oranje army again invaded frankfurt for the match with airlines in the netherlands laying on 32 flights to the german city on wednesday . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : oranje fans were out in full force officially only 6,200 fans came with a ticket but it was estimated that 25,000 fans would be in the 48,000-seater stadium and up to 40,000 more in the city . there was also a sizeable number of argentine supporters , many sporting the no. 10 shirt favored by diego maradona , with flags and scarves tied to their wrists .
maradona himself was seen in the stands along with his daughter , passionately cheering on the argentine side . the elephants claw back the other " group of death " game saw a spirited ivory coast coming from behind to beat serbia & montenegro 3-2 .
the elephants fought back from two goals down to clinch their first world cup win in an entertaining and fiercely-fought battle on wednesday in munich , played in pouring rain , to avoid ending bottom of group c. despite being eliminated from the world cup , both heavily-changed teams went at it hammer and tongs from the start before a capacity 66,000 crowd in a bid to restore their pride .
although ivory coast had the best of the play in the first ten minutes , their trio of newcomers at the back were caught out by long high balls from serbia and montenegro 's . serbia , seeking self-respect after a 6-0 drubbing by argentina , took the lead in the 10th minute with striker nikola zigic slotting in the ball after a long pass by dejan stankovic .
they built up on the result in the 19th minute after a botched clearance by ivory coast stand-in captain cyrille domoraud was seized by sasa ilic . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ivory coast players celebrate after their third goal the ivorians however made up in the 36th minute with arune dindane neatly netting a twice-taken penalty .
the strengthened ivorians dominated in the second half and dindane once again showed his class by heading in a kader keita cross in the 67th minute . the ivorians were n't finished as yet when kalou stepped up to score and seal a historic victory for ivory coast . dw staff / afp -lrb- sp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de argentina beat up serbia and montenegro argentina proved why some consider them a world cup title contender , displaying their speed and precision passing in a 6-0 rout of their group c opponents .
-lrb- june 20 , 2006 -rrb- dutch victory breaks hearts in ivory coast with everything at stake in the " group of death , " the ivory coast gave the holland a run for their money throughout a pulsating match that saw seven yellow cards before ending 2-1 in the netherlands ' favor .
-lrb- june 16 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands review all the action from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 01.10.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 21.06.2006 no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : juan riquelme , right , and kew jaliens go for the ball two-time world cup winners argentina reached a goalless draw with the netherlands to finish top of group c in a tight , furiously-paced game in frankfurt on wednesday . the dutch team , who like the argentines posted two victories over group rivals serbia and montenegro and ivory coast , finished in second place on goal difference and will play group d winners portugal in nuremberg on sunday .
the argentines will meet mexico in leipzig in the second round on saturday . argentina had a raft of chances throughout the match , and dutch coach marco van basten had two fine first-half clearances by defender khalid boulahrouz and one outstanding save late in the game by edwin van der sar to thank for a clean sheet . messi , tevez create havoc argentine strikers lionel messi and carlos tevez , along with midfield duo maxi rodriguez and juan riquelme , caused havoc in the dutch defense early on with their tight combinations of fast , accurate passing and blistering counter-attacking speed . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : netherlands ' khalid boulahrouz , left , and argentina 's lionel messi challenge for the ball teenage sensation messi made his mark in the eighth minute , playing a dangerous through ball into the area , which boulahrouz just managed to get his foot to ahead of the onrushing esteban cambiasso and nicolas burdisso . man-of-the-match tevez had a chance just after the quarter-hour , turning inside phillip cocu and unleashing a powerful left-footed shot just past the outside post of captain van der sar , who was winning his 112th cap to draw level on all-time appearances for the oranje with frank de boer . the netherlands ' best chance came a minute later , but dirk kuyt drilled a shot just wide . van der sar was then called into action in the 27th minute to punch away a swerving riquelme corner . from the ensuing corner kuyt brought down tevez on the edge of the box and the dutch fans had the imposing 1.91m frame of boulahrouz to thank again as he lunged to fend off the free-kick from tevez 's feet onto the post and away .
rodriguez then watched in agony as his blistering half-volley beat van der sar but drifted late and shaved off the post . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : flying van der sar saved the day for the dutch on the stroke of half-time , van der sar saved a messi shot after the barcelona striker was allowed far too much time in front of goal . the second-half started with riquleme taking advantage of the dutch defense standing off to fire a shot that narrowly missed goal , and rodriguez following up shortly after with a shot that flew high . van der sar saves the day but the dutch did manage to clamp down on the argentineans , wesley sneijder and cocu - winning his 100th cap - dropping into deeper positions to nullify the threat of the free-running tevez . but the netherlands were obviously lacking the creative spark provided by the rested arjen robben , giovanni van bronkhorst and mark van bommel . that said , the dutch pressure almost paid off in the 67th minute , cocu going close after good work by rafael van der vart .
with messi and riquelme both replaced by coach jose pekerman , the game fizzled out somewhat and swung towards the dutch . but it was fittingly left to the record-equaling van der sar to save the day for the dutch , defying his 35 years to superbly palm away a great strike by tevez in the 73rd minute . the oranje army again invaded frankfurt for the match with airlines in the netherlands laying on 32 flights to the german city on wednesday . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : oranje fans were out in full force officially only 6,200 fans came with a ticket but it was estimated that 25,000 fans would be in the 48,000-seater stadium and up to 40,000 more in the city . there was also a sizeable number of argentine supporters , many sporting the no. 10 shirt favored by diego maradona , with flags and scarves tied to their wrists .
maradona himself was seen in the stands along with his daughter , passionately cheering on the argentine side . the elephants claw back the other " group of death " game saw a spirited ivory coast coming from behind to beat serbia & montenegro 3-2 .
the elephants fought back from two goals down to clinch their first world cup win in an entertaining and fiercely-fought battle on wednesday in munich , played in pouring rain , to avoid ending bottom of group c. despite being eliminated from the world cup , both heavily-changed teams went at it hammer and tongs from the start before a capacity 66,000 crowd in a bid to restore their pride .
although ivory coast had the best of the play in the first ten minutes , their trio of newcomers at the back were caught out by long high balls from serbia and montenegro 's . serbia , seeking self-respect after a 6-0 drubbing by argentina , took the lead in the 10th minute with striker nikola zigic slotting in the ball after a long pass by dejan stankovic .
they built up on the result in the 19th minute after a botched clearance by ivory coast stand-in captain cyrille domoraud was seized by sasa ilic . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ivory coast players celebrate after their third goal the ivorians however made up in the 36th minute with arune dindane neatly netting a twice-taken penalty .
the strengthened ivorians dominated in the second half and dindane once again showed his class by heading in a kader keita cross in the 67th minute . the ivorians were n't finished as yet when kalou stepped up to score and seal a historic victory for ivory coast . dw staff / afp -lrb- sp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de argentina beat up serbia and montenegro argentina proved why some consider them a world cup title contender , displaying their speed and precision passing in a 6-0 rout of their group c opponents .
-lrb- june 20 , 2006 -rrb- dutch victory breaks hearts in ivory coast with everything at stake in the " group of death , " the ivory coast gave the holland a run for their money throughout a pulsating match that saw seven yellow cards before ending 2-1 in the netherlands ' favor .
-lrb- june 16 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands review all the action from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .
