program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 21.06.2006 no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : juan riquelme , right , and kew jaliens go for the ball two-time world cup winners argentina reached a goalless draw with the netherlands to finish top of group c in a tight , furiously-paced game in frankfurt on wednesday . the dutch team , who like the argentines posted two victories over group rivals serbia and montenegro and ivory coast , finished in second place on goal difference and will play group d winners portugal in nuremberg on sunday .
the argentines will meet mexico in leipzig in the second round on saturday . argentina had a raft of chances throughout the match , and dutch coach marco van basten had two fine first-half clearances by defender khalid boulahrouz and one outstanding save late in the game by edwin van der sar to thank for a clean sheet . messi , tevez create havoc argentine strikers lionel messi and carlos tevez , along with midfield duo maxi rodriguez and juan riquelme , caused havoc in the dutch defense early on with their tight combinations of fast , accurate passing and blistering counter-attacking speed . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : netherlands ' khalid boulahrouz , left , and argentina 's lionel messi challenge for the ball teenage sensation messi made his mark in the eighth minute , playing a dangerous through ball into the area , which boulahrouz just managed to get his foot to ahead of the onrushing esteban cambiasso and nicolas burdisso . man-of-the-match tevez had a chance just after the quarter-hour , turning inside phillip cocu and unleashing a powerful left-footed shot just past the outside post of captain van der sar , who was winning his 112th cap to draw level on all-time appearances for the oranje with frank de boer . the netherlands ' best chance came a minute later , but dirk kuyt drilled a shot just wide . van der sar was then called into action in the 27th minute to punch away a swerving riquelme corner . from the ensuing corner kuyt brought down tevez on the edge of the box and the dutch fans had the imposing 1.91m frame of boulahrouz to thank again as he lunged to fend off the free-kick from tevez 's feet onto the post and away .
rodriguez then watched in agony as his blistering half-volley beat van der sar but drifted late and shaved off the post . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : flying van der sar saved the day for the dutch on the stroke of half-time , van der sar saved a messi shot after the barcelona striker was allowed far too much time in front of goal . the second-half started with riquleme taking advantage of the dutch defense standing off to fire a shot that narrowly missed goal , and rodriguez following up shortly after with a shot that flew high . van der sar saves the day but the dutch did manage to clamp down on the argentineans , wesley sneijder and cocu - winning his 100th cap - dropping into deeper positions to nullify the threat of the free-running tevez . but the netherlands were obviously lacking the creative spark provided by the rested arjen robben , giovanni van bronkhorst and mark van bommel . that said , the dutch pressure almost paid off in the 67th minute , cocu going close after good work by rafael van der vart .
with messi and riquelme both replaced by coach jose pekerman , the game fizzled out somewhat and swung towards the dutch . but it was fittingly left to the record-equaling van der sar to save the day for the dutch , defying his 35 years to superbly palm away a great strike by tevez in the 73rd minute . the oranje army again invaded frankfurt for the match with airlines in the netherlands laying on 32 flights to the german city on wednesday . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : oranje fans were out in full force officially only 6,200 fans came with a ticket but it was estimated that 25,000 fans would be in the 48,000-seater stadium and up to 40,000 more in the city . there was also a sizeable number of argentine supporters , many sporting the no. 10 shirt favored by diego maradona , with flags and scarves tied to their wrists .
maradona himself was seen in the stands along with his daughter , passionately cheering on the argentine side . the elephants claw back the other " group of death " game saw a spirited ivory coast coming from behind to beat serbia & montenegro 3-2 .
the elephants fought back from two goals down to clinch their first world cup win in an entertaining and fiercely-fought battle on wednesday in munich , played in pouring rain , to avoid ending bottom of group c. despite being eliminated from the world cup , both heavily-changed teams went at it hammer and tongs from the start before a capacity 66,000 crowd in a bid to restore their pride .
although ivory coast had the best of the play in the first ten minutes , their trio of newcomers at the back were caught out by long high balls from serbia and montenegro 's . serbia , seeking self-respect after a 6-0 drubbing by argentina , took the lead in the 10th minute with striker nikola zigic slotting in the ball after a long pass by dejan stankovic .
they built up on the result in the 19th minute after a botched clearance by ivory coast stand-in captain cyrille domoraud was seized by sasa ilic . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ivory coast players celebrate after their third goal the ivorians however made up in the 36th minute with arune dindane neatly netting a twice-taken penalty .
the strengthened ivorians dominated in the second half and dindane once again showed his class by heading in a kader keita cross in the 67th minute . the ivorians were n't finished as yet when kalou stepped up to score and seal a historic victory for ivory coast . dw staff / afp -lrb- sp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de argentina beat up serbia and montenegro argentina proved why some consider them a world cup title contender , displaying their speed and precision passing in a 6-0 rout of their group c opponents .
-lrb- june 20 , 2006 -rrb- dutch victory breaks hearts in ivory coast with everything at stake in the " group of death , " the ivory coast gave the holland a run for their money throughout a pulsating match that saw seven yellow cards before ending 2-1 in the netherlands ' favor .
-lrb- june 16 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands review all the action from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply . picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures a nation expects dw-world.de presents germany 's 2006 world cup squad .

no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 24.03.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 21.06.2006 no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : juan riquelme , right , and kew jaliens go for the ball two-time world cup winners argentina reached a goalless draw with the netherlands to finish top of group c in a tight , furiously-paced game in frankfurt on wednesday . the dutch team , who like the argentines posted two victories over group rivals serbia and montenegro and ivory coast , finished in second place on goal difference and will play group d winners portugal in nuremberg on sunday .
the argentines will meet mexico in leipzig in the second round on saturday . argentina had a raft of chances throughout the match , and dutch coach marco van basten had two fine first-half clearances by defender khalid boulahrouz and one outstanding save late in the game by edwin van der sar to thank for a clean sheet . messi , tevez create havoc argentine strikers lionel messi and carlos tevez , along with midfield duo maxi rodriguez and juan riquelme , caused havoc in the dutch defense early on with their tight combinations of fast , accurate passing and blistering counter-attacking speed . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : netherlands ' khalid boulahrouz , left , and argentina 's lionel messi challenge for the ball teenage sensation messi made his mark in the eighth minute , playing a dangerous through ball into the area , which boulahrouz just managed to get his foot to ahead of the onrushing esteban cambiasso and nicolas burdisso . man-of-the-match tevez had a chance just after the quarter-hour , turning inside phillip cocu and unleashing a powerful left-footed shot just past the outside post of captain van der sar , who was winning his 112th cap to draw level on all-time appearances for the oranje with frank de boer . the netherlands ' best chance came a minute later , but dirk kuyt drilled a shot just wide . van der sar was then called into action in the 27th minute to punch away a swerving riquelme corner . from the ensuing corner kuyt brought down tevez on the edge of the box and the dutch fans had the imposing 1.91m frame of boulahrouz to thank again as he lunged to fend off the free-kick from tevez 's feet onto the post and away .
rodriguez then watched in agony as his blistering half-volley beat van der sar but drifted late and shaved off the post . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : flying van der sar saved the day for the dutch on the stroke of half-time , van der sar saved a messi shot after the barcelona striker was allowed far too much time in front of goal . the second-half started with riquleme taking advantage of the dutch defense standing off to fire a shot that narrowly missed goal , and rodriguez following up shortly after with a shot that flew high . van der sar saves the day but the dutch did manage to clamp down on the argentineans , wesley sneijder and cocu - winning his 100th cap - dropping into deeper positions to nullify the threat of the free-running tevez . but the netherlands were obviously lacking the creative spark provided by the rested arjen robben , giovanni van bronkhorst and mark van bommel . that said , the dutch pressure almost paid off in the 67th minute , cocu going close after good work by rafael van der vart .
with messi and riquelme both replaced by coach jose pekerman , the game fizzled out somewhat and swung towards the dutch . but it was fittingly left to the record-equaling van der sar to save the day for the dutch , defying his 35 years to superbly palm away a great strike by tevez in the 73rd minute . the oranje army again invaded frankfurt for the match with airlines in the netherlands laying on 32 flights to the german city on wednesday . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : oranje fans were out in full force officially only 6,200 fans came with a ticket but it was estimated that 25,000 fans would be in the 48,000-seater stadium and up to 40,000 more in the city . there was also a sizeable number of argentine supporters , many sporting the no. 10 shirt favored by diego maradona , with flags and scarves tied to their wrists .
maradona himself was seen in the stands along with his daughter , passionately cheering on the argentine side . the elephants claw back the other " group of death " game saw a spirited ivory coast coming from behind to beat serbia & montenegro 3-2 .
the elephants fought back from two goals down to clinch their first world cup win in an entertaining and fiercely-fought battle on wednesday in munich , played in pouring rain , to avoid ending bottom of group c. despite being eliminated from the world cup , both heavily-changed teams went at it hammer and tongs from the start before a capacity 66,000 crowd in a bid to restore their pride .
although ivory coast had the best of the play in the first ten minutes , their trio of newcomers at the back were caught out by long high balls from serbia and montenegro 's . serbia , seeking self-respect after a 6-0 drubbing by argentina , took the lead in the 10th minute with striker nikola zigic slotting in the ball after a long pass by dejan stankovic .
they built up on the result in the 19th minute after a botched clearance by ivory coast stand-in captain cyrille domoraud was seized by sasa ilic . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ivory coast players celebrate after their third goal the ivorians however made up in the 36th minute with arune dindane neatly netting a twice-taken penalty .
the strengthened ivorians dominated in the second half and dindane once again showed his class by heading in a kader keita cross in the 67th minute . the ivorians were n't finished as yet when kalou stepped up to score and seal a historic victory for ivory coast . dw staff / afp -lrb- sp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de argentina beat up serbia and montenegro argentina proved why some consider them a world cup title contender , displaying their speed and precision passing in a 6-0 rout of their group c opponents .
-lrb- june 20 , 2006 -rrb- dutch victory breaks hearts in ivory coast with everything at stake in the " group of death , " the ivory coast gave the holland a run for their money throughout a pulsating match that saw seven yellow cards before ending 2-1 in the netherlands ' favor .
-lrb- june 16 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands review all the action from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker feedback send us an e-mail .

no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 29.12.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 21.06.2006 no goals , but plenty of action in argentine-dutch clash großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : juan riquelme , right , and kew jaliens go for the ball two-time world cup winners argentina reached a goalless draw with the netherlands to finish top of group c in a tight , furiously-paced game in frankfurt on wednesday . the dutch team , who like the argentines posted two victories over group rivals serbia and montenegro and ivory coast , finished in second place on goal difference and will play group d winners portugal in nuremberg on sunday .
the argentines will meet mexico in leipzig in the second round on saturday . argentina had a raft of chances throughout the match , and dutch coach marco van basten had two fine first-half clearances by defender khalid boulahrouz and one outstanding save late in the game by edwin van der sar to thank for a clean sheet . messi , tevez create havoc argentine strikers lionel messi and carlos tevez , along with midfield duo maxi rodriguez and juan riquelme , caused havoc in the dutch defense early on with their tight combinations of fast , accurate passing and blistering counter-attacking speed . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : netherlands ' khalid boulahrouz , left , and argentina 's lionel messi challenge for the ball teenage sensation messi made his mark in the eighth minute , playing a dangerous through ball into the area , which boulahrouz just managed to get his foot to ahead of the onrushing esteban cambiasso and nicolas burdisso . man-of-the-match tevez had a chance just after the quarter-hour , turning inside phillip cocu and unleashing a powerful left-footed shot just past the outside post of captain van der sar , who was winning his 112th cap to draw level on all-time appearances for the oranje with frank de boer . the netherlands ' best chance came a minute later , but dirk kuyt drilled a shot just wide . van der sar was then called into action in the 27th minute to punch away a swerving riquelme corner . from the ensuing corner kuyt brought down tevez on the edge of the box and the dutch fans had the imposing 1.91m frame of boulahrouz to thank again as he lunged to fend off the free-kick from tevez 's feet onto the post and away .
rodriguez then watched in agony as his blistering half-volley beat van der sar but drifted late and shaved off the post . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : flying van der sar saved the day for the dutch on the stroke of half-time , van der sar saved a messi shot after the barcelona striker was allowed far too much time in front of goal . the second-half started with riquleme taking advantage of the dutch defense standing off to fire a shot that narrowly missed goal , and rodriguez following up shortly after with a shot that flew high . van der sar saves the day but the dutch did manage to clamp down on the argentineans , wesley sneijder and cocu - winning his 100th cap - dropping into deeper positions to nullify the threat of the free-running tevez . but the netherlands were obviously lacking the creative spark provided by the rested arjen robben , giovanni van bronkhorst and mark van bommel . that said , the dutch pressure almost paid off in the 67th minute , cocu going close after good work by rafael van der vart .
with messi and riquelme both replaced by coach jose pekerman , the game fizzled out somewhat and swung towards the dutch . but it was fittingly left to the record-equaling van der sar to save the day for the dutch , defying his 35 years to superbly palm away a great strike by tevez in the 73rd minute . the oranje army again invaded frankfurt for the match with airlines in the netherlands laying on 32 flights to the german city on wednesday . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : oranje fans were out in full force officially only 6,200 fans came with a ticket but it was estimated that 25,000 fans would be in the 48,000-seater stadium and up to 40,000 more in the city . there was also a sizeable number of argentine supporters , many sporting the no. 10 shirt favored by diego maradona , with flags and scarves tied to their wrists .
maradona himself was seen in the stands along with his daughter , passionately cheering on the argentine side . the elephants claw back the other " group of death " game saw a spirited ivory coast coming from behind to beat serbia & montenegro 3-2 .
the elephants fought back from two goals down to clinch their first world cup win in an entertaining and fiercely-fought battle on wednesday in munich , played in pouring rain , to avoid ending bottom of group c. despite being eliminated from the world cup , both heavily-changed teams went at it hammer and tongs from the start before a capacity 66,000 crowd in a bid to restore their pride .
although ivory coast had the best of the play in the first ten minutes , their trio of newcomers at the back were caught out by long high balls from serbia and montenegro 's . serbia , seeking self-respect after a 6-0 drubbing by argentina , took the lead in the 10th minute with striker nikola zigic slotting in the ball after a long pass by dejan stankovic .
they built up on the result in the 19th minute after a botched clearance by ivory coast stand-in captain cyrille domoraud was seized by sasa ilic . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : ivory coast players celebrate after their third goal the ivorians however made up in the 36th minute with arune dindane neatly netting a twice-taken penalty .
the strengthened ivorians dominated in the second half and dindane once again showed his class by heading in a kader keita cross in the 67th minute . the ivorians were n't finished as yet when kalou stepped up to score and seal a historic victory for ivory coast . dw staff / afp -lrb- sp -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de argentina beat up serbia and montenegro argentina proved why some consider them a world cup title contender , displaying their speed and precision passing in a 6-0 rout of their group c opponents .
-lrb- june 20 , 2006 -rrb- dutch victory breaks hearts in ivory coast with everything at stake in the " group of death , " the ivory coast gave the holland a run for their money throughout a pulsating match that saw seven yellow cards before ending 2-1 in the netherlands ' favor .
-lrb- june 16 , 2006 -rrb- live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands review all the action from the game with the dw-world.de live ticker feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply . picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures a nation expects dw-world.de presents germany 's 2006 world cup squad .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de news -pipe- 21.06.2006 live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands netherlands 0:0 argentina ivory coast 3:2 serbia & montenegro team line-ups the netherlands -lrb- 4-3-3 -rrb- 1-edwin van der sar ; 2-kew jaliens , 3-khalid boulahrouz , 13-andre ooijer , 15-tim de cler ; 20-wesley sneijder , 10-rafael van der vaart 8-philip cocu ; 7-dirk kuijt , 9-ruud van nistelrooy , 17-robin van persie coach : marco van basten argentina -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 1-roberto abbondanzieri ; 21-nicolas burdisso , 2-roberto ayala , 15-gabriel milito , 17-leandro cufre ; 5-esteban cambiasso , 8-javier mascherano , 10-juan roman riquelme , 18-maxi rodriguez ; 19-lionel messi , 11-carlos tevez coach : jose pekerman referee : luis medina cantalejo -lrb- spain -rrb- linesmen : victoriano giraldez carrasco -lrb- spain -rrb- , pedro medina hernandez -lrb- spain -rrb- ivory coast -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 23-boubacar barry ; 21-emmanuel eboue , 17-cyrille domoraud , 3-arthur boka , 6-blaise kouassi ; 5-didier zokora , 19-gneri yaya toure , 2-kanga akale , 18-abelkader keita ; 9-arouna kone , 15-aruna dindane coach : henri michel serbia & montenegro -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 1-dragoslav jevric ; 14-nenad djordjevic , 6-goran gavrancic , 20-mladen krstajic , 15-milan dudic ; 2-ivan ergic , 4-igor duljaj , 10-dejan stankovic , 11-predrag djordjevic ; 22-sasa ilic , 19-nikola zigic coach : ilija petkovic referee : marco rodriguez -lrb- mexico -rrb- linesmen : jose luis camargo -lrb- mexico -rrb- , leonel leal -lrb- costa rica -rrb- 1. min .
kick-off in frankfurt the dutch have made five changes due to yellow cards picked up in the fist two games .
argentina have also 5 different players on the pitch including the teenage sensation lionel messi .
2. min .
the dutch go on the attack .
van nistelroy is penalized for pushing an opponent .
3. min .
netherlands take control early on but argentina defend well and keep the dutch out .
5. min .
first corner of the game for argentina .
riquelme supplies the cross and van persie clears for another corner .
6. min. van der sar easily deals with the corner and sets up an attack. van nistelroy fails to make the most of it and it goes out for goal kick .
8. min .
messi plays a wonderful through ball to cambiasso and boulahrouz makes a last second stretch to clear for a corner .
10. min .
the game is being played in midfield at the moment as both teams try to build up attacks but as yet to no avail .
12. min .
first corner for holland. van persie takes it but blown for a foul by a dutch player .
15. min .
quarter of an hour played and not much goal mouth action to speak of .
a pretty slow start to the game .
17. min .
argentina string a number of passes together and tevez 's shot from outside the box goes wide of the post .
messi involved in the attack much to the delight of the argentina fans .
18. min .
holland have their first shot on goal .
well saved by abbondanzieri .
serbia and montenegro 1 zigic pute serbia and montenegro in the lead on 10 minutes .
21. min .
the dutch have control of the ball in midfield but still ca n't find that killer pass to split the argentina defense .
23. min .
argentina look more dangerous than the dutch going forward but still ca n't find a way through 24. min .
argentina substitution coloccini is on for burdisso after a knee injury 26. min .
tevez dribbles past two dutch defenders and wins a corner .
27. min .
riquleme fires in a bending shot from the corner and van der saar punches over the bar .
28. min .
yellow for kuyt kuyt is booked for pushing tevez as he makes another dazzling run .
28. min .
argentina hit the post off riquelme 's low free kick into the box .
29. min .
rodriguez blasts a shot from outside the box and misses by only centimeters .
argentina are in control and look like scoring .
serbia and montenegro 2 goal from sasa ilic on 20 minutes 32. min .
half an hour gone and argentina are dominating proceedings .
messi is in the thick of things seems to be relishing the opportunity to play a full game .
33. min .
argentina have another great chance but rodriguez shoots into the side netting from close range .
35. min .
sneijder has a crack from 35 meters out .
blocked by ayala .
36. min .
tevez wins argentina 's 7th corner as he takes on the dutch defense .
38. min .
the dutch have managed to slow the game down and gain more control .
40. min .
tevez wins another corner .
once again he takes on the dutch defense .
41. min .
messi tries a through ball into the box but tevez fails to read his intentions and van der saar claims it .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane scores on 36 minutes 42. min .
yellow card for ooijer ooijer gets booked for a tackle from behind on riquelme .
45. min .
one minute stoppage time added 45 + 1. min .
messi shoots from outside the box. van der saar makes a good save .
half time in frankfurt half time in the game between the netherlands and argentina .
the dutch put in a disciplined performance and defended well against the skillful argentineans .
tevez in particular troubled the dutch defense and messi showed glimpses of his great skill .
we can look forward to an interesting second half as both teams go looking for the win .
46. min .
second half kicks off second half kicks off in frankfurt .
47. min .
van persie takes a free kick from 35 meters out and blasts the ball high and wide into the stand .
48. min .
yellow for de kler dutch player de kler is carded for elbowing an opponent .
50. min .
a tactical game in the second half with tevez continuing to shine .
52. min .
kuyt floats a ball into the argentina box but well claimed by the keeper .
53. min .
messi and riquleme play a clever one-two to split open the dutch defense and riquelme 's shot goes just centimeters wide .
55. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez who shoots over the bar .
argentina are looking very dangerous and holland are struggling to keep them in check .
56. min .
dutch substitution babel is brought on to replace ruud van nistelroy .
57. min .
yellow card for cambiasso kuyt draws a foul 35 meters out and cambiasso is booked .
kuyt is holland 's most active player at the moment .
58. min .
van der vaart hits a poor free kick and draws jeers from the crowd .
60. min .
an hour gone and argentina still have the upper hand creating more chances and looking more likely to score but holland are defending well .
62. min .
the dutch have made a few poor passes at the back and handed the ball to argentina .
it could prove costly .
65. min .
riquelme takes on three dutch defenders and is barely stopped in the box .
65. min .
tevez tries an overhead kick in the box but fails to make proper contact .
67. min .
van der vaart makes a great run into the box and cocu 's shot is well blocked by abbondanzieri and pushed out for a corner .
holland 's best chance of the second half .
69. min .
cocu has another attempt on goal but his shot goes right and wide .
70. min .
nessi substituted cruz is brought on for messi who struggled in the second half against the strong dutch defense .
71. min .
the pace of the game has dropped considerably .
the dutch are happy to stay on level terms and argentina are looking forward to the next round .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane levels for ivory coast in 67th minute 73. min .
tevez draws a great save from van der saar 76. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez outside the box .
his shot is blocked .
78. min .
holland are defending in numbers trying to shut down the argentineans .
79. min .
de kler floats a cross in from the left .
foul called on babel .
80. min .
argentina substitution aimar is brought on to replace riquelme .
81. min .
both teams seem to have settled for a draw as we head into the final ten minutes .
84. min .
holland have more control of the ball but lack the drive to go forward .
85. min .
van der vaart tries another free-kick but once again he shoots wide of the goal .
88. min .
a cross into the argentina box misses the dutch and argentina stay on level terms .
90. min .
corner for holland is cleared well by argentina .
90. min .
yellow card yellow card for mascherano serbia and montenegro 2 kalou puts ivory coast ahead 90 + 2. min .
tevez almost breaks the deadlock but his shot goes over the bar in the dying seconds of the game .
full time in frankfurt the netherlands hold argentina to a goalless draw in a tactical game by two of the tournament 's top teams .
argentina had most of the play and the better chances but could n't make the most of their superiority .
the dutch will be happy not to have lost and look forward to their clash against portugal .
argentina now face mexico .
serbia and montenegro ivory coast come from behind to win 3:2 send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .

live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands -pipe- news -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 26.04.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de news -pipe- 21.06.2006 live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands netherlands 0:0 argentina ivory coast 3:2 serbia & montenegro team line-ups the netherlands -lrb- 4-3-3 -rrb- 1-edwin van der sar ; 2-kew jaliens , 3-khalid boulahrouz , 13-andre ooijer , 15-tim de cler ; 20-wesley sneijder , 10-rafael van der vaart 8-philip cocu ; 7-dirk kuijt , 9-ruud van nistelrooy , 17-robin van persie coach : marco van basten argentina -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 1-roberto abbondanzieri ; 21-nicolas burdisso , 2-roberto ayala , 15-gabriel milito , 17-leandro cufre ; 5-esteban cambiasso , 8-javier mascherano , 10-juan roman riquelme , 18-maxi rodriguez ; 19-lionel messi , 11-carlos tevez coach : jose pekerman referee : luis medina cantalejo -lrb- spain -rrb- linesmen : victoriano giraldez carrasco -lrb- spain -rrb- , pedro medina hernandez -lrb- spain -rrb- ivory coast -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 23-boubacar barry ; 21-emmanuel eboue , 17-cyrille domoraud , 3-arthur boka , 6-blaise kouassi ; 5-didier zokora , 19-gneri yaya toure , 2-kanga akale , 18-abelkader keita ; 9-arouna kone , 15-aruna dindane coach : henri michel serbia & montenegro -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 1-dragoslav jevric ; 14-nenad djordjevic , 6-goran gavrancic , 20-mladen krstajic , 15-milan dudic ; 2-ivan ergic , 4-igor duljaj , 10-dejan stankovic , 11-predrag djordjevic ; 22-sasa ilic , 19-nikola zigic coach : ilija petkovic referee : marco rodriguez -lrb- mexico -rrb- linesmen : jose luis camargo -lrb- mexico -rrb- , leonel leal -lrb- costa rica -rrb- 1. min .
kick-off in frankfurt the dutch have made five changes due to yellow cards picked up in the fist two games .
argentina have also 5 different players on the pitch including the teenage sensation lionel messi .
2. min .
the dutch go on the attack .
van nistelroy is penalized for pushing an opponent .
3. min .
netherlands take control early on but argentina defend well and keep the dutch out .
5. min .
first corner of the game for argentina .
riquelme supplies the cross and van persie clears for another corner .
6. min. van der sar easily deals with the corner and sets up an attack. van nistelroy fails to make the most of it and it goes out for goal kick .
8. min .
messi plays a wonderful through ball to cambiasso and boulahrouz makes a last second stretch to clear for a corner .
10. min .
the game is being played in midfield at the moment as both teams try to build up attacks but as yet to no avail .
12. min .
first corner for holland. van persie takes it but blown for a foul by a dutch player .
15. min .
quarter of an hour played and not much goal mouth action to speak of .
a pretty slow start to the game .
17. min .
argentina string a number of passes together and tevez 's shot from outside the box goes wide of the post .
messi involved in the attack much to the delight of the argentina fans .
18. min .
holland have their first shot on goal .
well saved by abbondanzieri .
serbia and montenegro 1 zigic pute serbia and montenegro in the lead on 10 minutes .
21. min .
the dutch have control of the ball in midfield but still ca n't find that killer pass to split the argentina defense .
23. min .
argentina look more dangerous than the dutch going forward but still ca n't find a way through 24. min .
argentina substitution coloccini is on for burdisso after a knee injury 26. min .
tevez dribbles past two dutch defenders and wins a corner .
27. min .
riquleme fires in a bending shot from the corner and van der saar punches over the bar .
28. min .
yellow for kuyt kuyt is booked for pushing tevez as he makes another dazzling run .
28. min .
argentina hit the post off riquelme 's low free kick into the box .
29. min .
rodriguez blasts a shot from outside the box and misses by only centimeters .
argentina are in control and look like scoring .
serbia and montenegro 2 goal from sasa ilic on 20 minutes 32. min .
half an hour gone and argentina are dominating proceedings .
messi is in the thick of things seems to be relishing the opportunity to play a full game .
33. min .
argentina have another great chance but rodriguez shoots into the side netting from close range .
35. min .
sneijder has a crack from 35 meters out .
blocked by ayala .
36. min .
tevez wins argentina 's 7th corner as he takes on the dutch defense .
38. min .
the dutch have managed to slow the game down and gain more control .
40. min .
tevez wins another corner .
once again he takes on the dutch defense .
41. min .
messi tries a through ball into the box but tevez fails to read his intentions and van der saar claims it .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane scores on 36 minutes 42. min .
yellow card for ooijer ooijer gets booked for a tackle from behind on riquelme .
45. min .
one minute stoppage time added 45 + 1. min .
messi shoots from outside the box. van der saar makes a good save .
half time in frankfurt half time in the game between the netherlands and argentina .
the dutch put in a disciplined performance and defended well against the skillful argentineans .
tevez in particular troubled the dutch defense and messi showed glimpses of his great skill .
we can look forward to an interesting second half as both teams go looking for the win .
46. min .
second half kicks off second half kicks off in frankfurt .
47. min .
van persie takes a free kick from 35 meters out and blasts the ball high and wide into the stand .
48. min .
yellow for de kler dutch player de kler is carded for elbowing an opponent .
50. min .
a tactical game in the second half with tevez continuing to shine .
52. min .
kuyt floats a ball into the argentina box but well claimed by the keeper .
53. min .
messi and riquleme play a clever one-two to split open the dutch defense and riquelme 's shot goes just centimeters wide .
55. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez who shoots over the bar .
argentina are looking very dangerous and holland are struggling to keep them in check .
56. min .
dutch substitution babel is brought on to replace ruud van nistelroy .
57. min .
yellow card for cambiasso kuyt draws a foul 35 meters out and cambiasso is booked .
kuyt is holland 's most active player at the moment .
58. min .
van der vaart hits a poor free kick and draws jeers from the crowd .
60. min .
an hour gone and argentina still have the upper hand creating more chances and looking more likely to score but holland are defending well .
62. min .
the dutch have made a few poor passes at the back and handed the ball to argentina .
it could prove costly .
65. min .
riquelme takes on three dutch defenders and is barely stopped in the box .
65. min .
tevez tries an overhead kick in the box but fails to make proper contact .
67. min .
van der vaart makes a great run into the box and cocu 's shot is well blocked by abbondanzieri and pushed out for a corner .
holland 's best chance of the second half .
69. min .
cocu has another attempt on goal but his shot goes right and wide .
70. min .
nessi substituted cruz is brought on for messi who struggled in the second half against the strong dutch defense .
71. min .
the pace of the game has dropped considerably .
the dutch are happy to stay on level terms and argentina are looking forward to the next round .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane levels for ivory coast in 67th minute 73. min .
tevez draws a great save from van der saar 76. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez outside the box .
his shot is blocked .
78. min .
holland are defending in numbers trying to shut down the argentineans .
79. min .
de kler floats a cross in from the left .
foul called on babel .
80. min .
argentina substitution aimar is brought on to replace riquelme .
81. min .
both teams seem to have settled for a draw as we head into the final ten minutes .
84. min .
holland have more control of the ball but lack the drive to go forward .
85. min .
van der vaart tries another free-kick but once again he shoots wide of the goal .
88. min .
a cross into the argentina box misses the dutch and argentina stay on level terms .
90. min .
corner for holland is cleared well by argentina .
90. min .
yellow card yellow card for mascherano serbia and montenegro 2 kalou puts ivory coast ahead 90 + 2. min .
tevez almost breaks the deadlock but his shot goes over the bar in the dying seconds of the game .
full time in frankfurt the netherlands hold argentina to a goalless draw in a tactical game by two of the tournament 's top teams .
argentina had most of the play and the better chances but could n't make the most of their superiority .
the dutch will be happy not to have lost and look forward to their clash against portugal .
argentina now face mexico .
serbia and montenegro ivory coast come from behind to win 3:2 send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .

yellow for kuyt kuyt is booked for pushing tevez as he makes another dazzling run .
28. min .
argentina hit the post off riquelme 's low free kick into the box .
29. min .
rodriguez blasts a shot from outside the box and misses by only centimeters .
argentina are in control and look like scoring .
serbia and montenegro 2 goal from sasa ilic on 20 minutes 32. min .
half an hour gone and argentina are dominating proceedings .
messi is in the thick of things seems to be relishing the opportunity to play a full game .
33. min .
argentina have another great chance but rodriguez shoots into the side netting from close range .
35. min .
sneijder has a crack from 35 meters out .
blocked by ayala .
36. min .
tevez wins argentina 's 7th corner as he takes on the dutch defense .
38. min .
the dutch have managed to slow the game down and gain more control .
40. min .
tevez wins another corner .
once again he takes on the dutch defense .
41. min .
messi tries a through ball into the box but tevez fails to read his intentions and van der saar claims it .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane scores on 36 minutes 42. min .
yellow card for ooijer ooijer gets booked for a tackle from behind on riquelme .
45. min .
one minute stoppage time added 45 + 1. min .
messi shoots from outside the box. van der saar makes a good save .
half time in frankfurt half time in the game between the netherlands and argentina .
the dutch put in a disciplined performance and defended well against the skillful argentineans .
tevez in particular troubled the dutch defense and messi showed glimpses of his great skill .
we can look forward to an interesting second half as both teams go looking for the win .
46. min .
second half kicks off second half kicks off in frankfurt .
47. min .
van persie takes a free kick from 35 meters out and blasts the ball high and wide into the stand .
48. min .
yellow for de kler dutch player de kler is carded for elbowing an opponent .
50. min .
a tactical game in the second half with tevez continuing to shine .
52. min .
kuyt floats a ball into the argentina box but well claimed by the keeper .
53. min .
messi and riquleme play a clever one-two to split open the dutch defense and riquelme 's shot goes just centimeters wide .
55. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez who shoots over the bar .
argentina are looking very dangerous and holland are struggling to keep them in check .
56. min .
dutch substitution babel is brought on to replace ruud van nistelroy .
57. min .
yellow card for cambiasso kuyt draws a foul 35 meters out and cambiasso is booked .
kuyt is holland 's most active player at the moment .
58. min .
van der vaart hits a poor free kick and draws jeers from the crowd .
60. min .
an hour gone and argentina still have the upper hand creating more chances and looking more likely to score but holland are defending well .
62. min .
the dutch have made a few poor passes at the back and handed the ball to argentina .
it could prove costly .
65. min .
riquelme takes on three dutch defenders and is barely stopped in the box .
65. min .
tevez tries an overhead kick in the box but fails to make proper contact .
67. min .
van der vaart makes a great run into the box and cocu 's shot is well blocked by abbondanzieri and pushed out for a corner .
holland 's best chance of the second half .
69. min .
cocu has another attempt on goal but his shot goes right and wide .
70. min .
nessi substituted cruz is brought on for messi who struggled in the second half against the strong dutch defense .
71. min .
the pace of the game has dropped considerably .
the dutch are happy to stay on level terms and argentina are looking forward to the next round .
serbia and montenegro 2 aruna dindane levels for ivory coast in 67th minute 73. min .
tevez draws a great save from van der saar 76. min .
tevez sets up rodriguez outside the box .
his shot is blocked .
78. min .
holland are defending in numbers trying to shut down the argentineans .
79. min .
de kler floats a cross in from the left .
foul called on babel .
80. min .
argentina substitution aimar is brought on to replace riquelme .
81. min .
both teams seem to have settled for a draw as we head into the final ten minutes .
84. min .
holland have more control of the ball but lack the drive to go forward .
85. min .
van der vaart tries another free-kick but once again he shoots wide of the goal .
88. min .
a cross into the argentina box misses the dutch and argentina stay on level terms .
90. min .
corner for holland is cleared well by argentina .
90. min .
yellow card yellow card for mascherano serbia and montenegro 2 kalou puts ivory coast ahead 90 + 2. min .
tevez almost breaks the deadlock but his shot goes over the bar in the dying seconds of the game .
full time in frankfurt the netherlands hold argentina to a goalless draw in a tactical game by two of the tournament 's top teams .
argentina had most of the play and the better chances but could n't make the most of their superiority .
the dutch will be happy not to have lost and look forward to their clash against portugal .
argentina now face mexico .
serbia and montenegro ivory coast come from behind to win 3:2 send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de news -pipe- 21.06.2006 live ticker : argentina 0:0 the netherlands netherlands 0:0 argentina ivory coast 3:2 serbia & montenegro team line-ups the netherlands -lrb- 4-3-3 -rrb- 1-edwin van der sar ; 2-kew jaliens , 3-khalid boulahrouz , 13-andre ooijer , 15-tim de cler ; 20-wesley sneijder , 10-rafael van der vaart 8-philip cocu ; 7-dirk kuijt , 9-ruud van nistelrooy , 17-robin van persie coach : marco van basten argentina -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 1-roberto abbondanzieri ; 21-nicolas burdisso , 2-roberto ayala , 15-gabriel milito , 17-leandro cufre ; 5-esteban cambiasso , 8-javier mascherano , 10-juan roman riquelme , 18-maxi rodriguez ; 19-lionel messi , 11-carlos tevez coach : jose pekerman referee : luis medina cantalejo -lrb- spain -rrb- linesmen : victoriano giraldez carrasco -lrb- spain -rrb- , pedro medina hernandez -lrb- spain -rrb- ivory coast -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 23-boubacar barry ; 21-emmanuel eboue , 17-cyrille domoraud , 3-arthur boka , 6-blaise kouassi ; 5-didier zokora , 19-gneri yaya toure , 2-kanga akale , 18-abelkader keita ; 9-arouna kone , 15-aruna dindane coach : henri michel serbia & montenegro -lrb- 4-4-2 -rrb- 1-dragoslav jevric ; 14-nenad djordjevic , 6-goran gavrancic , 20-mladen krstajic , 15-milan dudic ; 2-ivan ergic , 4-igor duljaj , 10-dejan stankovic , 11-predrag djordjevic ; 22-sasa ilic , 19-nikola zigic coach : ilija petkovic referee : marco rodriguez -lrb- mexico -rrb- linesmen : jose luis camargo -lrb- mexico -rrb- , leonel leal -lrb- costa rica -rrb- 1. min .
kick-off in frankfurt the dutch have made five changes due to yellow cards picked up in the fist two games .
argentina have also 5 different players on the pitch including the teenage sensation lionel messi .
2. min .
the dutch go on the attack .
van nistelroy is penalized for pushing an opponent .
3. min .
netherlands take control early on but argentina defend well and keep the dutch out .
5. min .
first corner of the game for argentina .
riquelme supplies the cross and van persie clears for another corner .
6. min. van der sar easily deals with the corner and sets up an attack. van nistelroy fails to make the most of it and it goes out for goal kick .
8. min .
messi plays a wonderful through ball to cambiasso and boulahrouz makes a last second stretch to clear for a corner .
10. min .
the game is being played in midfield at the moment as both teams try to build up attacks but as yet to no avail .
12. min .
first corner for holland. van persie takes it but blown for a foul by a dutch player .
15. min .
quarter of an hour played and not much goal mouth action to speak of .
a pretty slow start to the game .
17. min .
argentina string a number of passes together and tevez 's shot from outside the box goes wide of the post .
messi involved in the attack much to the delight of the argentina fans .
18. min .
holland have their first shot on goal .
well saved by abbondanzieri .
serbia and montenegro 1 zigic pute serbia and montenegro in the lead on 10 minutes .
21. min .
the dutch have control of the ball in midfield but still ca n't find that killer pass to split the argentina defense .
23. min .
argentina look more dangerous than the dutch going forward but still ca n't find a way through 24. min .
argentina substitution coloccini is on for burdisso after a knee injury 26. min .
tevez dribbles past two dutch defenders and wins a corner .
27. min .
riquleme fires in a bending shot from the corner and van der saar punches over the bar .
28. min .
yellow for kuyt kuyt is booked for pushing tevez as he makes another dazzling run .
28. min .
argentina hit the post off riquelme 's low free kick into the box .
29. min .

argentina are in control and look like scoring .

live ticker : portugal 2:1 mexico -pipe- news -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 21.06.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 26.11.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de news -pipe- 21.06.2006 live ticker : portugal 2:1 mexico review all the details with the dw-world.de live ticker . fi n al group d matches portgual vs mexico a n d a n gola vs ira n portugal 2:1 mexico team li n e-ups portugal -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- 1-ricardo ; 13-miguel , 16-ricardo carvalho , 5-fernando meira , 3-marco caneira ; 8-armando petit , 18-maniche , 19-tiago , 7-luis figo , 11-simao sabrosa ; 23-helder postiga mexico -lrb- 5-3-2 -rrb- 1-oswaldo sanchez ; 16-mario mendez , 4-rafael marquez , 5-ricardo osorio , 3-carlos salcido , 14-gonzalo pineda ; 22-francisco rodriguez , 23-luis perez , 8-pavel pardo ; 17-jose fonseca , 19-omar bravo referee : lubos michel -lrb- slovakia -rrb- linesmen : roman slysko -lrb- slovakia -rrb- martin balko -lrb- slovakia -rrb- ira n -lrb- 4-4-1-1 -rrb- 1-ebrahim mirzapour ; 13-hosein kaebi , 5-rahman rezaei , 3-sohrab bakhtiarizadeh , 20-mohammad nosrati ; 2-mehdi mahdavikia , 7-ferydoon zandi , 21-mehrzad madanchi , 14-andranik taymoorian ; 9-vahid hashemian ; 10-ali daei coach : branko ivankovic a n gola -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- 1-joao ricardo ; 20-loco , 3-jamba , 5-kali , 21-delgado ; 17-ze kalanga , 6-miloy , 7-figueiredo , 11-mateus , 14-mendonca ; 10-akwa coach : luis oliveira goncalves referee : mark shield -lrb- australia -rrb- linesmen : nathan gibson -lrb- australia -rrb- , ben wilson -lrb- australia -rrb- kick off betwee n portugal a n d mexico 1. min .
mexico go on the attack from the start .
portugal are missing five of their top players including deco , pauletta and ronaldo 2. min .
mexico have a great chance to score but the portuguese keeper manages to keep the ball out .
4. min .
portugal have their first foray forward but mexico clear and send the ball downfield .
6. min .
goal ! ! ! !
maniche 's scores for portugal ..
6. min .
beautiful goal for portugal .
simao made a darting run on the left side and crossed the ball in the back of the mexican defense to set up maniche who slotted home from inside the box .
no chance for sanchez in the mexican goal .
8. min .
portugal are on top now .
mexico shocked by the early goal .
they need at least a draw to be sure of qualifying for the next round .
10. min .
portugal are passing the ball around in defense waiting for their opportunity to go forward .
mexico are clearly stunned .
12. min .
portugal play a ball into the box after some neat passing play around the area but mexico clear the danger .
13. min .
a tactical game at the moment with both sides giving each other lots of space to pass the ball 15. min .
fifteen minutes gone and the fast and furious start has tailed off somewhat .
portugal happy with their lead and mexico trying to get back in the game .
17. min .
mexico float a ball into the box but it 's easily cleared .
18. min .
mexico are going nowhere .
long balls from the back are easily tackled by the solid portuguese defense .
20. min .
figo gains a corner and takes it himself .
the ball comes back to the midfielder who darts into the box but his cross is caught by sanchez .
21. min .
yellow for francisco rodriguez maniche makes a run deep into the mexican half and is brought down on the edge of the box by rodriguez .
23. min .
the free kick is driven straight into the wall and goes out for corner for portugal .
23. min .
penalty for portugal penalty for a handball in the box by marquez 24. min .
goal for portugal simao scores from the penalty spot with a powerful and well placed strike .
25. min .
portugal are cruising now .
two goals up after 25 minutes with five top players out and mexico now have to have an eye on the game between iran and angola .
27. min .
portugal almost go three up .
postiga heads towards goal and his shot is saved and bounces into the path of tiago but he ca n't get over the ball and it flies over the bar .
29. min .
ricardo makes a great save for portugal after bravo latches on the end of a cross .
portugal lucky not to have conceded a goal .
30. min .
goal for mexico fonseca jumps unchallenged in the box and heads home for mexico from a corner .
what a game now ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! 32. min .
the game is really open now .
portugal were cruising but mexico kept battling and are now on the attack again but it comes to nothing .
34. min .
miguel dances into the box and almost gets past his man but it 's cleared for a corner and mexico head out and play the ball downfield .
37. min .
the game has dropped in pace slightly after the past few minutes of end to end action .
38. min .
free-kick from simao low and hard into the box but mexico 's salcido clears for a corner .
39. min .
fonseca is free in the box and heads towards goal but he 's ruled offside .
40. min .
mexico need another goal to book their place in the next round .
and at the moment it could go either way with both teams playing flowing , attacking football .
41. min .
miguel drives into the mexican half and plays a lovely crossfield pass to figo .
the captain supplies tiago who blasts towards goal but hits a mexican defender .
43. min .
maniche tries a long-range shot from 35 meters but no problem for sanchez .
44. min .
wonderful strike from pardo from outside the box draws great save from ricardo .
45. min .
mexico almost grab the equalizer as fonseca tries to get on the end of a cross but clatters into ricardo who needs treatment .
45 + 1. min .
portugal are riding their luck at the moment and are fortunate to still be ahead .
ricardo is back on his feet for portugal .
45 + 1. min .
one minute of stoppage time to be played .
45 + 2. min .
half time half time in gelsenkirchen after a highly entertaining and exhilarating 45 minutes .
portugal deservedly took the lead through maniche and doubled it with simao 's penalty .
mexico took a long time to recover from the shock but clawed a goal back through fonseca and were unlucky not to have equalized before the break .
we can look forward to an entertaining second half as mexico go in search of that all important goal .
46. min .
second half kicks off 47. min .
mexico start the second knowing they need a goal to be safe .
49. min .
mexico are pushing forward looking for a goal but portugal remain solid at the back and clear the danger .
50. min .
fonseca almost through on the edge of the box but could n't control the ball .
51. min .
fonseca is everywhere at the moment and gains a free kick for mexico 40 meters out 52. min .
petit fires the ball in and it whizzes just past the post for a portugal goal kick .
53. min .
portugal have control of the ball now and attempt their first real attack of the second half .
but mexico are defending well .
55. min .
fonseca has a shot on goal from the edge of the box after a lovely lay-off from bravo but it is easily saved by ricardo .
57. min .
penalty for mexico penalty for mexico after perez is brought down in the box 58. min .
penalty missed bravo 's penalty goes high and wide and portugal count themselves lucky .
60. min .
mexico have gotten over the missed penalty and are pushing forward for the equalizer .
60. min .
perez sent off ! !
perez is sent off for diving in the box after the whole stadium thought mexico had been awarded another penalty .
mexico are down to ten men and have an uphill battle now .
63. min .
mexico are still in control of the game and bravo misses a golden opportunity with only the keeper to beat as mexico break the offside trap .
65. min .
mexico deserve to be on level terms now but they have simply not taken their chances .
66. min .
tiago has a shot on goal from outside the box but his shot goes left and wide . 68. min .
angola have taken the lead against iran and mexico are now level on points with the africans but just ahead on goal difference 70. min .
substitutio n nuno gomes comes on for postiga 71. min .
substitio n castro comes on for pineda for mexico 72. min .
substitute gomes almost scores for portugal but blasts the ball over the bar from five meters out .
74. min .
mexico are still pushing forward knowing that angola are leading and breathing down their necks .
75. min .
mendez wins a corner for mexico but the ball is cleared .
ten men mexico definitely have the upper hand but ca n't manage to score and risk leaving themselves open at the back .
77. min .
portugal are really taking their time on free kicks much to the dislike of the mexican fans in the stadium .
79. min .
mexico are throwing everything forward now but with a man down they are finding the going tough against a strong portuguese defense .
80. min .
portugal substitution figo is substituted for luis boa morte 82. min .
iran have equalized against angola which means that mexico can breathe easy again .
as things stand they are through behind portugal .
83. min .
marquez crashes into his own goalkeeper as he clears a square ball across the box .
sanchez needs treatment but is back on his feet .
85. min .
mexico are starting to look tired safe in the knowledge that they are probably through to the next round .
86. min .
portugal are passing the ball around in defense playing down the remaining minutes but mexico are still fighting for the equalizer 88. min .
boa morte yellow card boa morte is carded by the referee 89. min .
mexico free kick flashes across goal but no-one there to put it in .
90. min .
as the game enters stoppage time mexico continue to attack in search of the goal they deserve after fine play in the second half .
90 + 2. min .
3 minutes of stoppage time added .
90 + 3. min .
full time in gelsenkirchen portugal hang on for a narrow victory portugal manage to hang on against a brave ten man mexico , which missed a penalty and a number of other fantastic opportunities to score and are made to pay for those squandered chances .
but despite the loss the mexicans are though to the next round along with group winners portugal . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de news -pipe- 21.06.2006 live ticker : portugal 2:1 mexico review all the details with the dw-world.de live ticker . fi n al group d matches portgual vs mexico a n d a n gola vs ira n portugal 2:1 mexico team li n e-ups portugal -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- 1-ricardo ; 13-miguel , 16-ricardo carvalho , 5-fernando meira , 3-marco caneira ; 8-armando petit , 18-maniche , 19-tiago , 7-luis figo , 11-simao sabrosa ; 23-helder postiga mexico -lrb- 5-3-2 -rrb- 1-oswaldo sanchez ; 16-mario mendez , 4-rafael marquez , 5-ricardo osorio , 3-carlos salcido , 14-gonzalo pineda ; 22-francisco rodriguez , 23-luis perez , 8-pavel pardo ; 17-jose fonseca , 19-omar bravo referee : lubos michel -lrb- slovakia -rrb- linesmen : roman slysko -lrb- slovakia -rrb- martin balko -lrb- slovakia -rrb- ira n -lrb- 4-4-1-1 -rrb- 1-ebrahim mirzapour ; 13-hosein kaebi , 5-rahman rezaei , 3-sohrab bakhtiarizadeh , 20-mohammad nosrati ; 2-mehdi mahdavikia , 7-ferydoon zandi , 21-mehrzad madanchi , 14-andranik taymoorian ; 9-vahid hashemian ; 10-ali daei coach : branko ivankovic a n gola -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- 1-joao ricardo ; 20-loco , 3-jamba , 5-kali , 21-delgado ; 17-ze kalanga , 6-miloy , 7-figueiredo , 11-mateus , 14-mendonca ; 10-akwa coach : luis oliveira goncalves referee : mark shield -lrb- australia -rrb- linesmen : nathan gibson -lrb- australia -rrb- , ben wilson -lrb- australia -rrb- kick off betwee n portugal a n d mexico 1. min .

portugal are passing the ball around in defense waiting for their opportunity to go forward .
mexico are clearly stunned .
12. min .
portugal play a ball into the box after some neat passing play around the area but mexico clear the danger .
13. min .
a tactical game at the moment with both sides giving each other lots of space to pass the ball 15. min .
fifteen minutes gone and the fast and furious start has tailed off somewhat .
portugal happy with their lead and mexico trying to get back in the game .
17. min .
mexico float a ball into the box but it 's easily cleared .
18. min .
mexico are going nowhere .
long balls from the back are easily tackled by the solid portuguese defense .
20. min .
figo gains a corner and takes it himself .
the ball comes back to the midfielder who darts into the box but his cross is caught by sanchez .
21. min .
yellow for francisco rodriguez maniche makes a run deep into the mexican half and is brought down on the edge of the box by rodriguez .
23. min .
the free kick is driven straight into the wall and goes out for corner for portugal .
23. min .
penalty for portugal penalty for a handball in the box by marquez 24. min .
goal for portugal simao scores from the penalty spot with a powerful and well placed strike .
25. min .
portugal are cruising now .
two goals up after 25 minutes with five top players out and mexico now have to have an eye on the game between iran and angola .
27. min .
portugal almost go three up .
postiga heads towards goal and his shot is saved and bounces into the path of tiago but he ca n't get over the ball and it flies over the bar .
29. min .
ricardo makes a great save for portugal after bravo latches on the end of a cross .
portugal lucky not to have conceded a goal .
30. min .
goal for mexico fonseca jumps unchallenged in the box and heads home for mexico from a corner .
what a game now ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! 32. min .
the game is really open now .
portugal were cruising but mexico kept battling and are now on the attack again but it comes to nothing .
34. min .
miguel dances into the box and almost gets past his man but it 's cleared for a corner and mexico head out and play the ball downfield .
37. min .
the game has dropped in pace slightly after the past few minutes of end to end action .
38. min .
free-kick from simao low and hard into the box but mexico 's salcido clears for a corner .
39. min .
fonseca is free in the box and heads towards goal but he 's ruled offside .
40. min .
mexico need another goal to book their place in the next round .
and at the moment it could go either way with both teams playing flowing , attacking football .
41. min .
miguel drives into the mexican half and plays a lovely crossfield pass to figo .
the captain supplies tiago who blasts towards goal but hits a mexican defender .
43. min .
maniche tries a long-range shot from 35 meters but no problem for sanchez .
44. min .
wonderful strike from pardo from outside the box draws great save from ricardo .
45. min .
mexico almost grab the equalizer as fonseca tries to get on the end of a cross but clatters into ricardo who needs treatment .
45 + 1. min .
portugal are riding their luck at the moment and are fortunate to still be ahead .
ricardo is back on his feet for portugal .
45 + 1. min .
one minute of stoppage time to be played .
45 + 2. min .
half time half time in gelsenkirchen after a highly entertaining and exhilarating 45 minutes .
portugal deservedly took the lead through maniche and doubled it with simao 's penalty .
mexico took a long time to recover from the shock but clawed a goal back through fonseca and were unlucky not to have equalized before the break .
we can look forward to an entertaining second half as mexico go in search of that all important goal .
46. min .
second half kicks off 47. min .
mexico start the second knowing they need a goal to be safe .
49. min .
mexico are pushing forward looking for a goal but portugal remain solid at the back and clear the danger .
50. min .
fonseca almost through on the edge of the box but could n't control the ball .
51. min .
fonseca is everywhere at the moment and gains a free kick for mexico 40 meters out 52. min .
petit fires the ball in and it whizzes just past the post for a portugal goal kick .
53. min .
portugal have control of the ball now and attempt their first real attack of the second half .
but mexico are defending well .
55. min .
fonseca has a shot on goal from the edge of the box after a lovely lay-off from bravo but it is easily saved by ricardo .
57. min .
penalty for mexico penalty for mexico after perez is brought down in the box 58. min .
penalty missed bravo 's penalty goes high and wide and portugal count themselves lucky .
60. min .
mexico have gotten over the missed penalty and are pushing forward for the equalizer .
60. min .
perez sent off ! !
perez is sent off for diving in the box after the whole stadium thought mexico had been awarded another penalty .
mexico are down to ten men and have an uphill battle now .
63. min .
mexico are still in control of the game and bravo misses a golden opportunity with only the keeper to beat as mexico break the offside trap .
65. min .
mexico deserve to be on level terms now but they have simply not taken their chances .
66. min .
tiago has a shot on goal from outside the box but his shot goes left and wide . 68. min .
angola have taken the lead against iran and mexico are now level on points with the africans but just ahead on goal difference 70. min .
substitutio n nuno gomes comes on for postiga 71. min .
substitio n castro comes on for pineda for mexico 72. min .
substitute gomes almost scores for portugal but blasts the ball over the bar from five meters out .
74. min .
mexico are still pushing forward knowing that angola are leading and breathing down their necks .
75. min .
mendez wins a corner for mexico but the ball is cleared .
ten men mexico definitely have the upper hand but ca n't manage to score and risk leaving themselves open at the back .
77. min .
portugal are really taking their time on free kicks much to the dislike of the mexican fans in the stadium .
79. min .
mexico are throwing everything forward now but with a man down they are finding the going tough against a strong portuguese defense .
80. min .
portugal substitution figo is substituted for luis boa morte 82. min .
iran have equalized against angola which means that mexico can breathe easy again .
as things stand they are through behind portugal .
83. min .
marquez crashes into his own goalkeeper as he clears a square ball across the box .
sanchez needs treatment but is back on his feet .
85. min .
mexico are starting to look tired safe in the knowledge that they are probably through to the next round .
86. min .
portugal are passing the ball around in defense playing down the remaining minutes but mexico are still fighting for the equalizer 88. min .
boa morte yellow card boa morte is carded by the referee 89. min .
mexico free kick flashes across goal but no-one there to put it in .
90. min .
as the game enters stoppage time mexico continue to attack in search of the goal they deserve after fine play in the second half .
90 + 2. min .
3 minutes of stoppage time added .
90 + 3. min .
full time in gelsenkirchen portugal hang on for a narrow victory portugal manage to hang on against a brave ten man mexico , which missed a penalty and a number of other fantastic opportunities to score and are made to pay for those squandered chances .
but despite the loss the mexicans are though to the next round along with group winners portugal . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .

mexico go on the attack from the start .
portugal are missing five of their top players including deco , pauletta and ronaldo 2. min .
mexico have a great chance to score but the portuguese keeper manages to keep the ball out .
4. min .
portugal have their first foray forward but mexico clear and send the ball downfield .
6. min .
goal ! ! ! !
maniche 's scores for portugal ..
6. min .
beautiful goal for portugal .
simao made a darting run on the left side and crossed the ball in the back of the mexican defense to set up maniche who slotted home from inside the box .
no chance for sanchez in the mexican goal .
8. min .
portugal are on top now .
mexico shocked by the early goal .
they need at least a draw to be sure of qualifying for the next round .
10. min .
portugal are passing the ball around in defense waiting for their opportunity to go forward .
mexico are clearly stunned .
12. min .
portugal play a ball into the box after some neat passing play around the area but mexico clear the danger .

we can look forward to an entertaining second half as mexico go in search of that all important goal .

petit fires the ball in and it whizzes just past the post for a portugal goal kick .
53. min .
portugal have control of the ball now and attempt their first real attack of the second half .
but mexico are defending well .
55. min .
fonseca has a shot on goal from the edge of the box after a lovely lay-off from bravo but it is easily saved by ricardo .
57. min .
penalty for mexico penalty for mexico after perez is brought down in the box 58. min .
penalty missed bravo 's penalty goes high and wide and portugal count themselves lucky .
60. min .
mexico have gotten over the missed penalty and are pushing forward for the equalizer .
60. min .
perez sent off ! !
perez is sent off for diving in the box after the whole stadium thought mexico had been awarded another penalty .
mexico are down to ten men and have an uphill battle now .
63. min .
mexico are still in control of the game and bravo misses a golden opportunity with only the keeper to beat as mexico break the offside trap .
65. min .
mexico deserve to be on level terms now but they have simply not taken their chances .
66. min .
tiago has a shot on goal from outside the box but his shot goes left and wide . 68. min .
angola have taken the lead against iran and mexico are now level on points with the africans but just ahead on goal difference 70. min .
substitutio n nuno gomes comes on for postiga 71. min .
substitio n castro comes on for pineda for mexico 72. min .
substitute gomes almost scores for portugal but blasts the ball over the bar from five meters out .
74. min .
mexico are still pushing forward knowing that angola are leading and breathing down their necks .
75. min .
mendez wins a corner for mexico but the ball is cleared .
ten men mexico definitely have the upper hand but ca n't manage to score and risk leaving themselves open at the back .
77. min .
portugal are really taking their time on free kicks much to the dislike of the mexican fans in the stadium .
79. min .
mexico are throwing everything forward now but with a man down they are finding the going tough against a strong portuguese defense .
80. min .
portugal substitution figo is substituted for luis boa morte 82. min .
iran have equalized against angola which means that mexico can breathe easy again .
as things stand they are through behind portugal .
83. min .
marquez crashes into his own goalkeeper as he clears a square ball across the box .
sanchez needs treatment but is back on his feet .
85. min .
mexico are starting to look tired safe in the knowledge that they are probably through to the next round .
86. min .
portugal are passing the ball around in defense playing down the remaining minutes but mexico are still fighting for the equalizer 88. min .
boa morte yellow card boa morte is carded by the referee 89. min .
mexico free kick flashes across goal but no-one there to put it in .
90. min .
as the game enters stoppage time mexico continue to attack in search of the goal they deserve after fine play in the second half .
90 + 2. min .
3 minutes of stoppage time added .
90 + 3. min .
full time in gelsenkirchen portugal hang on for a narrow victory portugal manage to hang on against a brave ten man mexico , which missed a penalty and a number of other fantastic opportunities to score and are made to pay for those squandered chances .
but despite the loss the mexicans are though to the next round along with group winners portugal . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
